original: dkyil @7b 'khor bstan nas kyang 'di mi bstan to zhes bya ba la de ltar zhugs pa'i slob ma de la yang bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil @7b 'khor bstan nas kyang 'di mi bstan to zhes bya ba la de ltar zhugs pa'i slob ma de la yang bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: And having shown the mandala, one should not show this, i.e., one should not show it to the disciple who has entered in that way.🔽Who is it?

original: gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni 'dri ba ste su zhig yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni 'dri ba ste su zhig yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the question, i.e., who is it?

original: 'di skad ston te gal te lha de rnams gang yin zhes 'dri na /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te gal te lha de rnams gang yin zhes 'dri na /
translated: This is the meaning. If one asks, “What are those deities?”

original: de'i tshe de la rnam par gses nas bstan par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe de la rnam par gses nas bstan par mi bya ste /
translated: then at that time one should not teach them by analyzing them.

original: 'di ltar dkyil 'khor gzhan dag tu ji ltar bris pa'i lha rnams so sor phye ste bstan pa bzhin du 'dir bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar dkyil 'khor gzhan dag tu ji ltar bris pa'i lha rnams so sor phye ste bstan pa bzhin du 'dir bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should not teach them here in the same way that they are taught in other mandalas by analyzing them individually.

original: de yang dkyil 'khor 'dir bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes thog ma kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las bdag gis 'dir gnas par dgod par bgyi'o zhes bdag por gsol ba btab ste /
analyzed: de yang dkyil 'khor 'dir bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes thog ma kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las bdag gis 'dir gnas par dgod par bgyi'o zhes bdag por gsol ba btab ste /
translated: Moreover, in this mandala, Bhagavat Vajrapani first made a request to all the Tathagatas, saying, “I will place myself here as the lord.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi gan du gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi gan du gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste /
translated: Then, having remained in the presence of Bhagavat Vairocana, he summoned all the Tathagatas.

original: rang gi spyi bor gzi brjid phung po'i gzugs su gzhug nas /
analyzed: rang gi spyi bor gzi brjid phung po'i gzugs su gzhug nas /
translated: Having placed them in the form of a mass of splendor on his own head,

original: dbang bskur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / lha'i khyad par lhag ma rnams kyang gnas skabs ji lta ba bzhin du bkod nas /
analyzed: dbang bskur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / lha'i khyad par lhag ma rnams kyang gnas skabs ji lta ba bzhin du bkod nas /
translated: he conferred empowerment and arranged all the Tathagatas and the remaining special deities in their respective places.

original: dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba de dag kyang de la mi bstan te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba de dag kyang de la mi bstan te /
translated: However, those who were empowered in the mandala were not shown this.

original: 'di rnam par phye ste smra bar ma byed cig ces gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di rnam par phye ste smra bar ma byed cig ces gsungs pa yin no //
translated: It is said, “Do not speak of this after analyzing it.”

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni de'i rgyu dris pa ste /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni de'i rgyu dris pa ste /
translated: Why is that? This is a question about the reason.

original: phal ba rnams kyi rang gi gsang ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: phal ba rnams kyi rang gi gsang ba bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the secret of the ordinary beings is

original: sems can log par lta ba dag kyang yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: sems can log par lta ba dag kyang yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: as stated in the lines beginning “There are also sentient beings with wrong views.”

original: sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs su bzhugs so zhes bya ba lta mi srid do zhes ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs su bzhugs so zhes bya ba lta mi srid do zhes ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not possible that the Buddha himself would remain in the form of the Bhagavat Vajrapāṇi in order to subdue sentient beings.

original: de 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: de 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is taught as follows.

original: ci 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba ma yin nam ;
analyzed: ci 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba ma yin nam ;
translated: Is it not the case that the wisdom of the Buddhas, the Bhagavats, is infallible?

original: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor du btsud cing dbang bskur du zin na ni /
analyzed: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor du btsud cing dbang bskur du zin na ni /
translated: If the Tathāgatas were initiated into the maṇḍala by Vajrapāṇi,

original: phyag na rdo rje bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ye shes chung bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ye shes chung bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: then the Tathāgatas would have less wisdom than Vajrapāṇi.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za bar 'dod pa yang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za bar 'dod pa yang /
translated: And the wisdom of the Buddhas, the Bhagavats, is asserted to be infallible.

original: gdon mi za ba'i ye shes su mi 'gyur na ;
analyzed: gdon mi za ba'i ye shes su mi 'gyur na ;
translated: If it is not the case that the vajra is the wisdom of the Tathāgatas,

original: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de lta bu yin par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhed do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de lta bu yin par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhed do //
translated: then why do the Tathāgatas accept that it is so?

original: de bas na phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba mi rigs so snyam pa de lta bu'i nyes pa 'di spang bar bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur to zhes smra bar @8a * //
analyzed: de bas na phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba mi rigs so snyam pa de lta bu'i nyes pa 'di spang bar bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur to zhes smra bar @8a * //
translated: Therefore, in order to avoid this fault, namely, that it is not proper for Vajrapāṇi to confer empowerment, it is said that in this maṇḍala, the Blessed Buddhas confer empowerment on Vajrapāṇi.

original: mi bya ste /
analyzed: mi bya ste /
translated: This is not to be said.

original: 'di ni dam tshig yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni dam tshig yin no //
translated: This is the pledge.

original: gzhan du na gang lha chen po la sogs pa la dad pa de rnams la mna'i snying po byin nas gdod bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na gang lha chen po la sogs pa la dad pa de rnams la mna'i snying po byin nas gdod bstan par bya'o //
translated: Otherwise, to those who have faith in Maheśvara and so forth, having given the essence of the mantra, it should be taught.

original: mna'i snying po 'di ni rdo rje khro bo chen po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar smras pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: mna'i snying po 'di ni rdo rje khro bo chen po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar smras pa nyid yin no //
translated: This essence of the mantra is the great wrathful vajra, and so forth, as previously stated.

original: de ltar mna'i snying po byin nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i tshogs rnams so sor phye ste bstan par bya la /
analyzed: de ltar mna'i snying po byin nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i tshogs rnams so sor phye ste bstan par bya la /
translated: Having thus given the essence of the vow, one should separate the hosts of mandala deities and reveal them.

original: de'i 'og tu dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Then one should confer initiation.

original: chu'i dbang bskur pa ni 'dir ma smos su zin gyis kyang /
analyzed: chu'i dbang bskur pa ni 'dir ma smos su zin gyis kyang /
translated: Although the conferral of the water initiation is not mentioned here,

original: rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa las rdo rje'i chus dang por dbang bskur bar bya dgos so //🔽de nas rdo rje rin po ches mtshan pa'i phreng bas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin po ches mtshan cing /
analyzed: rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa las rdo rje'i chus dang por dbang bskur bar bya dgos so // de nas rdo rje rin po ches mtshan pa'i phreng bas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin po ches mtshan cing /
translated: one should first confer initiation with the water of the vajra consecration vase.🔽Then, with the rosary marked with the vajra jewel,🔽the rosary marked with the vajra jewel, the sign, is the rosary marked with the vajra jewel.

original: rtags su byas pa'i phreng ba ni rdo rje rin po ches mtshan pa'i phreng ba ste des dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: rtags su byas pa'i phreng ba ni rdo rje rin po ches mtshan pa'i phreng ba ste des dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: One should confer initiation with that.

original: gang gi phyir mngon par mtho ba don du mi gnyer zhing phyi rol gyi lha'i go 'phang sgrub pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas rnams la sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu brgyan gyi dbang bskur bar mi rigs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mngon par mtho ba don du mi gnyer zhing phyi rol gyi lha'i go 'phang sgrub pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas rnams la sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu brgyan gyi dbang bskur bar mi rigs te /
translated: It is not proper to confer initiation with the five buddha crowns of the five buddhas on those who do not strive for the higher realms and who are not establishing the state of a god,

original: de bas na chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa'i dbang phyug ston par byed pa'i rin po che'i dbang bskur ba 'di nyid bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa'i dbang phyug ston par byed pa'i rin po che'i dbang bskur ba 'di nyid bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this very consecration of the precious one who reveals the Teacher, the unsurpassed lord of the Dharma, should be performed.

original: de bas na mngon par mtho ba'i don spyir ston pas spyi'i rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na mngon par mtho ba'i don spyir ston pas spyi'i rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the consecration of the general vajra gem is taught by the general meaning of the purpose of the higher realms.

original: de nas las kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas las kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Then, the consecration of the activity vajra should be given.

original: de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Then, the consecration of the name should be given.

original: ji ltar sbyin par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar sbyin par bya zhe na /
translated: How should it be given?

original: ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It should be done just as in the great maṇḍala of the Vajra Commitment.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “victorious over the three worlds” is explained.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni gzhan yang ngo //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni gzhan yang ngo //
translated: Then, means furthermore.

original: phyag rgya bcing ba dam bcas te //
analyzed: phyag rgya bcing ba dam bcas te //
translated: Having bound the mudra,

original: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid la phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'i sgrar gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid la phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'i sgrar gsungs te /
translated: the commitment mudra itself is called the great mudra.

original: phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa ni bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis bar mi bcad pa yin no //🔽rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa ni bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis bar mi bcad pa yin no // rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
translated: The meditation on the great seal is uninterrupted by the mode of practice.🔽Having made the binding of the vajra,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te'o //
translated: means having bound the vajra-bond.

original: ji lta bur zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bur zhe na /
translated: How?

original: mthe bo nang du sbyar nas ni //
analyzed: mthe bo nang du sbyar nas ni //
translated: Having joined the thumbs inside,

original: zhes bya ba ni mthe bong gnyis ka nang du gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mthe bong gnyis ka nang du gzhug pa'o //
translated: means having inserted both thumbs inside.

original: mdzub mo bkug ste gnyis ka bkan //
analyzed: mdzub mo bkug ste gnyis ka bkan //
translated: Having bent the index fingers, both are pressed

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi tshul du mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas mdzub mo gnyis ka'i zur gyis dgab pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi tshul du mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas mdzub mo gnyis ka'i zur gyis dgab pa yin te /
translated: means having bent the two index fingers in the manner of a vajra-fist, and having covered with the tips of the two index fingers.

original: 'di ni sems dpa'i gtsug tor zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sems dpa'i gtsug tor zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the seal called the uṣṇīṣa of the bodhisattva.

original: rdo rje bcings pa de nyid las mthe bong dang / mthe'u chung dang / gung mo rnams gshibs te rtse mor @8b byas pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa lta bu 'di ni gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje bcings pa de nyid las mthe bong dang / mthe'u chung dang / gung mo rnams gshibs te rtse mor @8b byas pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa lta bu 'di ni gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin no //
translated: From that very vajra-bond, having straightened the thumbs, ring fingers, and middle fingers, the tip is like a three-pointed vajra. This is the seal called the mass of splendor.

original: phyag rgya de gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya de gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su bya'o //
translated: These two mudras should be made in the place of the Blessed Vairochana.

original: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la mthe bong dang / mthe'u chung gnyis rgyab logs nas gcig la gcig 'khyud pa ni rig pa chen po dam pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la mthe bong dang / mthe'u chung gnyis rgyab logs nas gcig la gcig 'khyud pa ni rig pa chen po dam pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
translated: Having formed the two vajra mudras, that is, having formed the two vajra fists, with the thumbs and little fingers of one crossed behind the other, this is the mudra of the great knowledge pledge.

original: phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis kyi ngos sbrang de snying gar gtad pa ni snying po'i phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis kyi ngos sbrang de snying gar gtad pa ni snying po'i phyag rgya yin no //
translated: From this very mudra, placing the two thumbs at the heart is the mudra of the essence.

original: phyag rgya de gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya de gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar rig par bya'o //
translated: These two mudras should be known in front of the Blessed Vairochana.

original: de nyid las zhes bya ba ni rig pa chen po'i dam pa'i phyag rgya de las gung mo dang ; srin lag gi sor mo rab tu bsdams nas ni zhes bya ba shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid las zhes bya ba ni rig pa chen po'i dam pa'i phyag rgya de las gung mo dang ; srin lag gi sor mo rab tu bsdams nas ni zhes bya ba shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: From that very one means from the mudra of the great knowledge pledge, fully pressing together the middle finger and ring finger is fully concentrated.

original: ji ltar zhe na //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na //
translated: How?

original: rdo rje rin chen tshul du ni //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen tshul du ni //
translated: Having transformed into the manner of a vajra gem,

original: bsgyur nas gdong du gzhag par bya //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bsgyur nas gdong du gzhag par bya // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: one should place it on the face.

original: mthe bo 'og tu bzhag la gung mo dang srin lag gi rin po che dbang bskur pa'i gnas su gtugs par bya'o //
analyzed: mthe bo 'og tu bzhag la gung mo dang srin lag gi rin po che dbang bskur pa'i gnas su gtugs par bya'o //
translated: Placing the thumb underneath, one should touch the place of the consecration of the gem with the middle finger and the ring finger.

original: rig pa chen po dam pa'i phyag rgya de nyid snying ga'i thad kar bzhag la /
analyzed: rig pa chen po dam pa'i phyag rgya de nyid snying ga'i thad kar bzhag la /
translated: Having placed that very mudra of the sublime great knowledge at the level of the heart,

original: mthe bong sbrel ba gnyis bkrol zhing mthe'u chung lcags sgrog gi tshul du sbrel pa bskor te lag pa gnyis bkan par bya'o //
analyzed: mthe bong sbrel ba gnyis bkrol zhing mthe'u chung lcags sgrog gi tshul du sbrel pa bskor te lag pa gnyis bkan par bya'o //
translated: one should open the two joined thumbs, and having interlaced the two little fingers in the manner of an iron chain, one should open the two hands.

original: de nas mdzub mo gnyis lcags sgrog gi tshul du gcig la gcig sbrel la /
analyzed: de nas mdzub mo gnyis lcags sgrog gi tshul du gcig la gcig sbrel la /
translated: Then, having interlaced the two index fingers in the manner of an iron chain,

original: lag pa gnyis ka'i gung mo dang srin lag gshibs te gyen du bsgreng la ka ba bzhi'i tshul du gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis ka'i gung mo dang srin lag gshibs te gyen du bsgreng la ka ba bzhi'i tshul du gzhag par bya'o //
translated: one should place the two middle fingers and the two ring fingers side by side, erect, in the manner of four pillars.

original: mthe bong gnyis gung mo dang srin lag gi tshigs gsum pa'i drung du bzhag pa 'di ni me tog bzhi pa zhes bya ste padma'i rig pa dam pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: mthe bong gnyis gung mo dang srin lag gi tshigs gsum pa'i drung du bzhag pa 'di ni me tog bzhi pa zhes bya ste padma'i rig pa dam pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
translated: The two thumbs are placed at the third joint of the index and ring fingers; this is called the “four-petaled flower,” the mudra of the excellent knowledge of the lotus.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni rig pa mchog gi phyag rgya nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni rig pa mchog gi phyag rgya nyid do //
translated: “ That itself” is the mudra of the excellent knowledge.

original: lus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya //
analyzed: lus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya //
translated: “ One should rotate the body maṇḍala”

original: zhes bya ba ni spyi bo nas brtsams te g-yon logs su phab la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni spyi bo nas brtsams te g-yon logs su phab la /
translated: means that, beginning from the crown, one should bring it down to the left,

original: 'og tu rkang pa la thug gi bar du khyer te g-yas logs nas slar gyen du dkri zhing slar spyi bo'i bar du drang pa 'di ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor mchog bskor ba ste sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //🔽da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas de nyid kyis sarba bid ces bya ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya gsum pa ni /🔽sems ma rdo rje dam byas te //
analyzed: 'og tu rkang pa la thug gi bar du khyer te g-yas logs nas slar gyen du dkri zhing slar spyi bo'i bar du drang pa 'di ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor mchog bskor ba ste sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o // da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas de nyid kyis sarba bid ces bya ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya gsum pa ni / sems ma rdo rje dam byas te //
translated: and, having brought it down to the feet, one should again bring it up to the crown, rotating it to the right. This is the supreme rotation of the body maṇḍala, the mudra of the vajra cross.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
translated: Now, in that very place of Vairocana, the third mudrā of the essence mantra, “sarva-vid,” is taught by “having made the commitment of Cittavajrā,” and so on.

original: rdo rje bcings pa'i gung mo gnyis sbyar nas rtse mor byas pa ni sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //🔽de nyid kyi mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng ba ni sarba bid kyi snying po'i phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje bcings pa'i gung mo gnyis sbyar nas rtse mor byas pa ni sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro // de nyid kyi mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng ba ni sarba bid kyi snying po'i phyag rgya yin no //
translated: The vajra-binding with the tips of the two middle fingers joined is the seal of Citta-vajra.🔽The same [binding] with the two little fingers extended is the heart-seal of Sarva-vid.

original: mthe bo mthe'u chung bcings nas ni //🔽zhes bya @9a * //
analyzed: mthe bo mthe'u chung bcings nas ni // zhes bya @9a * //
translated: The two thumbs and little fingers bound

original: ba ni rig pa mchog gi rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya ston te /🔽de nyid las g-yon pa'i sor mo gsum char brkyang pa'i rtse gsum pa'i dbus ma la mdzub mo g-yas pa'i rdo rje bzhag pa ni rtse gsum pa'i dbu ma rtse zhes bya ste /
analyzed: ba ni rig pa mchog gi rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya ston te / de nyid las g-yon pa'i sor mo gsum char brkyang pa'i rtse gsum pa'i dbus ma la mdzub mo g-yas pa'i rdo rje bzhag pa ni rtse gsum pa'i dbu ma rtse zhes bya ste /
translated: is the seal of the nature of Supreme Knowledge.🔽The same [binding] with the three left fingers extended is the three-pointed vajra, with the right index finger placed on the middle of the three points.

original: dbus na rtse mo yod pas na dbu ma rtse'o //
analyzed: dbus na rtse mo yod pas na dbu ma rtse'o //
translated: It is called the middle point of the three-pointed vajra, because it has a point in the middle.

original: rdo rje'i phyag rgya bzung ba de //
analyzed: rdo rje'i phyag rgya bzung ba de //
translated: The vajra-binding held

original: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa na rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa na rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
translated: is the vajra-holder in the right hand.

original: de ltar na /🔽rdo rje'i phyag rgya bzung ba de //
analyzed: de ltar na / rdo rje'i phyag rgya bzung ba de //
translated: Thus,🔽the vajra-binding held

original: zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: is the vajra-holder.

original: 'di ni snying po gnyi ga'i spyi'i phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni snying po gnyi ga'i spyi'i phyag rgya yin no //
translated: This is the general seal of both essences.

original: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //🔽zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bcing la /
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te // zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bcing la /
translated: Having made the binding of the vajra,

original: mdzub mo g-yon pa btag ste /
analyzed: mdzub mo g-yon pa btag ste /
translated: one should place the left forefinger

original: mthe bong gi drung du bzhag la mthe bong yang de'i steng du bkug ste bzhag nas /
analyzed: mthe bong gi drung du bzhag la mthe bong yang de'i steng du bkug ste bzhag nas /
translated: beside the thumb, and the thumb should be bent over it.

original: de gnyis ka g-yas pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mos bcing ba 'di ni g-yon pa rdo rjer bcing ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de gnyis ka g-yas pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mos bcing ba 'di ni g-yon pa rdo rjer bcing ba zhes bya ste /
translated: The two are bound by the right thumb and forefinger. This is called the binding of the left vajra.

original: phyi'i rdo rje rigs kyi rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad do //
analyzed: phyi'i rdo rje rigs kyi rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad do //
translated: It is explained as the vajra fist of the external vajra family.

original: rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te //
analyzed: rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te //
translated: Having made that vajra into two,

original: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gnyis su byas na rang bzhin gyi khu tshur du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gnyis su byas na rang bzhin gyi khu tshur du 'gyur ro //
translated: if one makes two left vajra fists, it becomes the natural fist.

original: mtshan ma kun ni nges bzhag go ;
analyzed: mtshan ma kun ni nges bzhag go ;
translated: One should place all the emblems.

original: / zhes bya ba ni rgyal mtshan dang kha tvam ga la sogs pa dgod pa'o //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni rgyal mtshan dang kha tvam ga la sogs pa dgod pa'o //
translated: This means one should place the victory banner, the khaṭvāṅga, and so forth.

original: phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung ba ste //
translated: The mudras also arise.

original: zhes bya ba ni rtse gsum pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtse gsum pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is the trident, etc.🔽The extended forward placed above,

original: mdun brkyang steng du bzhag pa dang // zhes bya ba ni mdun du lag pa g-yon pa kha sdu bas te brkyang la de'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa brkyang nas bzhag pa 'di ni mdun brkyang steng du bzhag ces gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: mdun brkyang steng du bzhag pa dang // zhes bya ba ni mdun du lag pa g-yon pa kha sdu bas te brkyang la de'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa brkyang nas bzhag pa 'di ni mdun brkyang steng du bzhag ces gsungs pa ste /
translated: means that the left hand is extended forward with the palm facing down, and the right hand is extended above it. This is called the extended forward placed above.

original: rdo rje sgyu ma'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sgyu ma'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra of the wheel of Vajramāyā.🔽The index finger firmly holding the thumb,

original: mdzub mos mtheb brtan bcang ba dang // zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo dang mthe bos lag pa g-yon pa bzung la dril bu dkrol ba'i tshul du kha thur du bstan nas bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje gzhon nu'i dril bu'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mdzub mos mtheb brtan bcang ba dang // zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo dang mthe bos lag pa g-yon pa bzung la dril bu dkrol ba'i tshul du kha thur du bstan nas bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje gzhon nu'i dril bu'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: means that the left hand is held with the thumb and index finger, and the bell is placed facing downward in the manner of ringing the bell. This is the bell mudra of Vajrakumāra.

original: aom zhes bya ba spyir bzhag ste /
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba spyir bzhag ste /
translated: The syllable oṃ is placed in general.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo g-yon pa bkug la mthe bo'i rtse mor gtugs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo g-yon pa bkug la mthe bo'i rtse mor gtugs te /
translated: This means that the left index finger is bent and touches the tip of the thumb.

original: sor mo'i lhag ma gsum brkyang la dbang bkur ba'i gnas su bkan te brkyang ba de lta bu ni aom zhes bya ba spyi bor bzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: sor mo'i lhag ma gsum brkyang la dbang bkur ba'i gnas su bkan te brkyang ba de lta bu ni aom zhes bya ba spyi bor bzhag pa yin no //
translated: The remaining three fingers are extended, and the extended index finger is bent at the place of the honorific mudra.🔽This is the placement of the syllable OṀ at the crown of the head.

original: rdo rje steng du bzhag pa'o zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe bo'i steng du kha sbubs ste /
analyzed: rdo rje steng du bzhag pa'o zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe bo'i steng du kha sbubs ste /
translated: “Placing it above the vajra” means extending the right hand, and placing the left hand, with the thumb covered by the fist, upside down.

original: 'di ni brgya byin gyi gdugs kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni brgya byin gyi gdugs kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra of Indra’s parasol.

original: rab tu brkyang nas lag gnas pa //
analyzed: rab tu brkyang nas lag gnas pa //
translated: “Extending it, the hand is placed”

original: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa mdun du bkan la de'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa mdun du bkan la de'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste /
translated: means extending the left hand in front, and placing the right hand, extended, upside down on top of it.

original: kha sbubs nas bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: kha sbubs nas bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra of Vajra-Alikāli.

original: lag pa'i rgyab tu de bzhin te //
analyzed: lag pa'i rgyab tu de bzhin te //
translated: “The same on the back of the hand”

original: zhes bya ba ni lag pa @9b g-yas pa mdun du kha sbubs nas bzhag pa de'i steng du g-yon pa kha sbubs nas bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje 'od kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag pa @9b g-yas pa mdun du kha sbubs nas bzhag pa de'i steng du g-yon pa kha sbubs nas bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje 'od kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: means placing the right hand in front, upside down, and placing the left hand, upside down, on top of it. This is the mudra of Vajraprabha.

original: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la dbyug pa 'dzin pa'i tshul du mchan khung g-yon par bstan nas bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o //🔽rdo rje khu tshur de nyid kha'i thad kar sgeg pa dang bcas par bskor ba 'di ni rdo rje ser smug gi gdong bsnyer bar byed pa'i phyag rgya'o //🔽g-yon pa'i mthe bo'i steng du bzhag / ces bya ba ni g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyi mthe bo'i steng du g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bzhag pa 'di ni tshogs kyi bdag po'i sna'i gdugs kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la dbyug pa 'dzin pa'i tshul du mchan khung g-yon par bstan nas bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o // rdo rje khu tshur de nyid kha'i thad kar sgeg pa dang bcas par bskor ba 'di ni rdo rje ser smug gi gdong bsnyer bar byed pa'i phyag rgya'o // g-yon pa'i mthe bo'i steng du bzhag / ces bya ba ni g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyi mthe bo'i steng du g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bzhag pa 'di ni tshogs kyi bdag po'i sna'i gdugs kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The left hand is in a vajra fist, and is placed at the left hip, as if holding a club: this is the mudra of Vajra-danda.🔽That same vajra fist, turned to the side at the level of the mouth, is turned around with a flirtatious gesture: this is the mudra of Vajra-kapota-vaktra.

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur mgal me bskor ba'i tshul du mgo la bskor ba 'di ni rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur mgal me bskor ba'i tshul du mgo la bskor ba 'di ni rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The right hand is placed on top of the left thumb: this is the mudra of the nose-parasol of the Lord of the Ganas, with the left hand in a vajra fist and the right hand placed on top of the left thumb.🔽The left vajra fist is turned around on the head, as if whirling a firebrand: this is the mudra of Vajra-mala.

original: khu tshur g-yas pa brkyang la sbyin pa byed pa'i tshul du ston pa 'di ni rdo rje dbang gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: khu tshur g-yas pa brkyang la sbyin pa byed pa'i tshul du ston pa 'di ni rdo rje dbang gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Extending the right fist, showing it as if giving, this is the mudra of Vajradatta.🔽The supreme fist is the mudra of the sword,

original: ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog / ces bya ba la khu tshur mchog ni 'dir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje khu tshur la bya ste /
analyzed: ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog / ces bya ba la khu tshur mchog ni 'dir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje khu tshur la bya ste /
translated: the supreme fist here is the supramundane Vajramuști.

original: lag pa g-yon pa dang des ral gri 'dzin pa'i tshul du ston pa /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa dang des ral gri 'dzin pa'i tshul du ston pa /
translated: Showing the left hand and the sword held by it as if holding a sword,

original: ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog / ces bya ste /
analyzed: ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog / ces bya ste /
translated: this is the supreme fist, the mudra of the sword.

original: rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra of Vijaya.

original: g-yas pa mdun du gtun rings 'dzin //
analyzed: g-yas pa mdun du gtun rings 'dzin //
translated: The right hand in front holds a mace,

original: ces bya ba ni khu tshur g-yas pas snying khar gtun rings 'dzin pa'i tshul du ston pa ni rdo rje gtum po'i gtun rings kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni khu tshur g-yas pas snying khar gtun rings 'dzin pa'i tshul du ston pa ni rdo rje gtum po'i gtun rings kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: showing the right fist at the heart as if holding a mace, this is the mace mudra of Vajra Caṇḍa.

original: lag pa brkyang ba'ang de bzhin te //
analyzed: lag pa brkyang ba'ang de bzhin te //
translated: The extended arm is the same,

original: zhes bya ba ni dpung pa gnyis gyen du brkyang ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpung pa gnyis gyen du brkyang ste /
translated: the two shoulders extended upward,

original: ba dan 'phar ba'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni rdo rje rlung gi ba dan gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ba dan 'phar ba'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni rdo rje rlung gi ba dan gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra of the vajra wind banner.

original: g-yas pas 'od ni 'bar bar bstan //🔽zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa brkyang la 'bar ba 'phro ba'i tshul du ston pa 'di ni rdo rje me 'bar ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: g-yas pas 'od ni 'bar bar bstan // zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa brkyang la 'bar ba 'phro ba'i tshul du ston pa 'di ni rdo rje me 'bar ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The right hand shows the blazing light.🔽This is the mudra of the blazing vajra fire.

original: rdo rje khu tshur g-yon bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur g-yon bskyod pa'o //
translated: The left vajra fist shakes.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra of the vajra fear.

original: 'gying bcas mdzub mo khar mche ga / zhes bya ba ni 'gying bag dang bcas pas gnas la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bkug ste /
analyzed: 'gying bcas mdzub mo khar mche ga / zhes bya ba ni 'gying bag dang bcas pas gnas la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bkug ste /
translated: The index finger in the mouth with a flirtatious look.

original: kha'i phyogs su phag gi mche ba'i tshul du bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje lcag kyu'i mche ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: kha'i phyogs su phag gi mche ba'i tshul du bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje lcag kyu'i mche ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra of the vajra pig's tusk.

original: dbyug pa bsnun cing mnan pa dang // zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo g-yas pas bsnun pa ltar bya zhing thur du dred pa ltar gtang ba 'di ni rdo rje dus kyi dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o //🔽dpung pa bskum zhing dpyad pa dang // zhes bya ba ni dpung pa g-yon pa bskum la dpyad pa ltar bya ba 'di ni rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso @10a * //🔽bo rdo rje sna'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dbyug pa bsnun cing mnan pa dang // zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo g-yas pas bsnun pa ltar bya zhing thur du dred pa ltar gtang ba 'di ni rdo rje dus kyi dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o // dpung pa bskum zhing dpyad pa dang // zhes bya ba ni dpung pa g-yon pa bskum la dpyad pa ltar bya ba 'di ni rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso @10a * // bo rdo rje sna'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The line striking with a club and pressing means that one should make a gesture as if striking with the left vajra fist, and then release it as if it were falling down. This is the mudra of Vajra-Kāla-danda.🔽 The line the arm bent and the shoulder means that one should bend the left arm and make a gesture as if it were a shoulder. This is the mudra of Vajra-Nāsa, the chief of the vajra obstacles.

original: lag pa g-yon pas lag pa g-yas pa'i mkhrig ma nas bzung ste zhags pa 'dren pa'i tshul du drang ba 'di ni chu lha'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pas lag pa g-yas pa'i mkhrig ma nas bzung ste zhags pa 'dren pa'i tshul du drang ba 'di ni chu lha'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The line the left hand holding the right wrist means that one should hold the right wrist with the left hand, and then draw it as if drawing a noose. This is the mudra of Varuṇa's noose.🔽 In order to show what was implicitly included in the mandala before,

original: gang sngar dkyil 'khor la dgos pa rnams shugs kyis sbyar ba de bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gang sngar dkyil 'khor la dgos pa rnams shugs kyis sbyar ba de bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: it is said:

original: dkyil 'khor kun du brtag pa ni //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun du brtag pa ni // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: All mandalas should be imagined,

original: brtag pa ni bya ba'o //
analyzed: brtag pa ni bya ba'o //
translated: imagined means to be done.

original: gang du zhe na dkyil 'khor du'o //🔽ci phyogs cig tu bya'am zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na dkyil 'khor du'o // ci phyogs cig tu bya'am zhe na /
translated: Where? In the mandala.🔽In which direction?

original: ma yin te kun du'o //
analyzed: ma yin te kun du'o //
translated: Not in one direction, but everywhere.

original: ji ltar bya ba zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bya ba zhe na /
translated: How?

original: g-yon pas rdo rje bzung nas so //
analyzed: g-yon pas rdo rje bzung nas so //
translated: Holding the vajra in the left hand.

original: zhes bya ba ste lag pa g-yon pas las kyi rdo rje bzung la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste lag pa g-yon pas las kyi rdo rje bzung la /
translated: That is, holding the karma-vajra in the left hand,

original: thig gdab pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad slob dpon gyis bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thig gdab pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad slob dpon gyis bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the master should perform all the rites of drawing the lines, etc.

original: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
translated: Then, the accomplishment

original: bsgrub pa dang ni las nyid do //
analyzed: bsgrub pa dang ni las nyid do //
translated: and the rites themselves🔽will be explained.

original: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya rnams kyi bsgrub pa dang / de dag nyid kyi grub pa'i las gang yin pa de bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya rnams kyi bsgrub pa dang / de dag nyid kyi grub pa'i las gang yin pa de bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of the seals and the rites that are accomplished by them will be taught.

original: bsgrub pa de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: bsgrub pa de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that accomplishment?

original: sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang ;
analyzed: sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang ;
translated: The seal of which hero

original: / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: is accomplished by which.🔽The seal of which hero is accomplished by which

original: sems dpa' gang gi zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lha'i khyad par gang gi'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' gang gi zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lha'i khyad par gang gi'o //
translated: means the special deity to be accomplished by which hero.

original: phyag rgya gang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'o //🔽der ni bdag rang nyid gyur te //
analyzed: phyag rgya gang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'o // der ni bdag rang nyid gyur te //
translated: The “seal” is the great seal.🔽“ There” means in the form of the great seal.

original: zhes bya ba ni der ni zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs gang yin pa de'i gzugs su bdag rang nyid ces bya ba bsngags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni der ni zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs gang yin pa de'i gzugs su bdag rang nyid ces bya ba bsngags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “ I myself” means that one should praise oneself in the form of the great seal.

original: bdag nyid der ni bsgom gyur pa //
analyzed: bdag nyid der ni bsgom gyur pa //
translated: “ I myself am meditating on that”

original: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis de'i gzugs su bsgrubs shing de ltar bsgoms nas bdag nyid de bzhin du phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i dam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis de'i gzugs su bsgrubs shing de ltar bsgoms nas bdag nyid de bzhin du phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i dam par 'gyur ro //
translated: means that, having accomplished that form by the method of consecration and empowerment as explained, and having meditated in that way, one should accomplish oneself as the seal in that way.

original: de ltar phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i bsgrub pa bstan nas //
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i bsgrub pa bstan nas //
translated: Having thus taught the general accomplishment of all seals,

original: so so'i las kyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽gtsug tor chen po srung ba che //
analyzed: so so'i las kyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir / gtsug tor chen po srung ba che //
translated: in order to teach the particular actions of each,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says “the great uṣṇīṣa, the great protection,” and so on.

original: gtsug tor chen po ni sems dpa' gtsug tor ro //
analyzed: gtsug tor chen po ni sems dpa' gtsug tor ro //
translated: Great Uṣṇīṣa is the hero Uṣṇīṣa.

original: srung ba che zhes bya ba ni srung ba thams cad las lhag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽gzi brjid phung po rab grub ster //
analyzed: srung ba che zhes bya ba ni srung ba thams cad las lhag pa zhes bya ba'i don to // gzi brjid phung po rab grub ster //
translated: Great Protector is the meaning of “superior to all protectors.”🔽Granting the accomplishment of the mass of splendor

original: ces bya ba ni gzi brjid phung bo ni dngos grub bzang po sbyin par byed pa yin pas na rab grub ster ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni gzi brjid phung bo ni dngos grub bzang po sbyin par byed pa yin pas na rab grub ster ces bya ba ste /
translated: means that the mass of splendor grants the excellent accomplishment.

original: sngags pas sgrub pa'i tshe sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngags pas sgrub pa'i tshe sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: It should be applied by the mantrin at the time of practice.

original: rdo rje h'um zhes bya kun byed //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um zhes bya kun byed //
translated: The vajra hūṃ does everything

original: ces bya ba ni las thams cad mdzad pas @10b na kun byed de /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni las thams cad mdzad pas @10b na kun byed de /
translated: means that since it performs all activities, it does everything.

original: gnas bzhi char du yang rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba de nyid du zad pas ni bye brag med par spyi'i las su bstan to //
analyzed: gnas bzhi char du yang rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba de nyid du zad pas ni bye brag med par spyi'i las su bstan to //
translated: Since it is just the vajra hūṃ in all four places, it is taught as a general activity without distinction.

original: bcom ldan 'das de'i thugs kar thams cad 'gugs pa'i phyir thams cad 'gugs zhes bshad do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de'i thugs kar thams cad 'gugs pa'i phyir thams cad 'gugs zhes bshad do //
translated: Since it attracts everything to the heart of the Bhagavān, it is explained as “attracting everything.”

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas kyi gsum pa thams cad rig pa'i snying po'i las bstan pa ni thams cad grub ces bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas kyi gsum pa thams cad rig pa'i snying po'i las bstan pa ni thams cad grub ces bya ste /
translated: The third line of the section on Vairochana, “all powers,” teaches the action of the essence mantra of all powers.

original: rdo rje rig pa dam pa'i phyag rgya ni dngos grub dam pa sbyin par byed pas na rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rig pa dam pa'i phyag rgya ni dngos grub dam pa sbyin par byed pas na rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa'o //
translated: The “vajra of holy knowledge” is the mudra of the holy knowledge vajra, which grants the holy powers.

original: de nas ni rdo rje mdung gi phyag rgya ste /🔽dngos grub chen po sbyin par byed pas na /
analyzed: de nas ni rdo rje mdung gi phyag rgya ste / dngos grub chen po sbyin par byed pas na /
translated: Then, the “vajra spear” mudra🔽grants the great powers.

original: grub pa chen po sbyin par byed //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: grub pa chen po sbyin par byed // ces gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it grants the great powers.

original: gang gi phyir lha chen po'i snying po gnyis bstan pas de'i phyag rgya gnyis steng dang 'og tu gnas pa'i las rnam pa gnyis rnam par phye ste bstan no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir lha chen po'i snying po gnyis bstan pas de'i phyag rgya gnyis steng dang 'og tu gnas pa'i las rnam pa gnyis rnam par phye ste bstan no //
translated: Since the two essences of the great gods are taught, the two mudras of those two are taught as the two actions of the upper and lower parts.

original: sgyu ma'i rdo rje ni mthu bo che'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i rdo rje ni mthu bo che'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: The “vajra of illusion” is the mudra of the great power.

original: des dngos grub bzang po sbyin par byed pas na rab grub ster ces bya'o //
analyzed: des dngos grub bzang po sbyin par byed pas na rab grub ster ces bya'o //
translated: Since it grants the good powers, it is called “granting the best powers.”

original: dril bu ni gzhon nu'i phyag rgya ste des ni 'bebs pa'i las byed do//
analyzed: dril bu ni gzhon nu'i phyag rgya ste des ni 'bebs pa'i las byed do//
translated: The bell is the mudrā of Kumāra, and it performs the function of summoning.

original: dbyug pa'i shing ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste des ni mya ngan las 'das pa ster bar byed do //
analyzed: dbyug pa'i shing ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste des ni mya ngan las 'das pa ster bar byed do //
translated: The staff is the mudrā of Brahmā, and it bestows nirvāṇa.

original: rdo rje ni brgya byin gyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni brgya byin gyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The vajra is the mudrā of Indra,

original: des ni thog 'bebs pas gdug cing gtum pa rnams gsod par byed do //
analyzed: des ni thog 'bebs pas gdug cing gtum pa rnams gsod par byed do //
translated: and it kills the wicked and violent ones by means of lightning.

original: 'bar ba'i mchog ni rdo rje 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: 'bar ba'i mchog ni rdo rje 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: The supreme blazing one is the mudrā of Vajra-aṅkuśa,

original: de ni ma rungs pa rnams 'dul bar byed do //
analyzed: de ni ma rungs pa rnams 'dul bar byed do //
translated: and it subdues the wicked ones.

original: zhi ba'i mchog ni rdo rje 'od kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: zhi ba'i mchog ni rdo rje 'od kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The supreme peace is the mudrā of Vajraprabha,

original: des ni gdug cing gtum pa rnams gsod par byed do //🔽dbyug pa mchog ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgya ste de yang gdug cing gtum pa rnams gsod par byed do //
analyzed: des ni gdug cing gtum pa rnams gsod par byed do // dbyug pa mchog ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgya ste de yang gdug cing gtum pa rnams gsod par byed do //
translated: and it kills the wicked and violent ones.🔽The supreme club is the mudrā of Vajra-gada, and it also kills the wicked and violent ones.

original: 'jigs pa'i mig ni rdo rje ser smug gi phyag rgya ste de ni gdug cing gtum pa thams cad gsod par byed do //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i mig ni rdo rje ser smug gi phyag rgya ste de ni gdug cing gtum pa thams cad gsod par byed do //
translated: The fearful eye is the mudrā of Vajra-kāla, and it kills all the wicked and violent ones.

original: myos pa ni rdo rje glang po sna'i phyag rgya ste de ni myos pa'i las byed do //
analyzed: myos pa ni rdo rje glang po sna'i phyag rgya ste de ni myos pa'i las byed do //
translated: Intoxication is the mudra of Vajra Elephant Trunk, which performs the function of intoxication.

original: phreng ba ni rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya ste de ni thams cad dbang du byed pa la sogs pa'i las byed do //
analyzed: phreng ba ni rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya ste de ni thams cad dbang du byed pa la sogs pa'i las byed do //
translated: Garland is the mudra of Vajra Garland, which performs the function of enthralling all, and so forth.

original: 'dod byed ni rdo rje dbang gi phyag rgya ste de ni dga' bar byed pa'i las byed do //
analyzed: 'dod byed ni rdo rje dbang gi phyag rgya ste de ni dga' bar byed pa'i las byed do //
translated: Desire is the mudra of Vajra Power, which performs the function of delighting.

original: gsod pa ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: gsod pa ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: Killing is the mudra of Vajra Victorious,

original: de ni gdug cing gtum pa thams cad gsod par byed do //
analyzed: de ni gdug cing gtum pa thams cad gsod par byed do //
translated: which kills all the wicked and violent.🔽Hammer is the mudra of Vajra Fierce,

original: tho ba ni rdo rje gtum po'i phyag rgya ste de yang gdug cing gtum pa rnams nges par 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: tho ba ni rdo rje gtum po'i phyag rgya ste de yang gdug cing gtum pa rnams nges par 'joms par byed do //
translated: which definitely destroys the wicked and violent.

original: ras ni rlung gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ras ni rlung gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Cloth is the mudra of Wind.

original: ras rgyus de bzhin te zhes bya ba ni ras kyi dngos grub byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ras rgyus de bzhin te zhes bya ba ni ras kyi dngos grub byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thread is the same, meaning that it produces the power of cloth.

original: 'bar ba'i mchog ni rdo rje me'i @11a * //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i mchog ni rdo rje me'i @11a * //
translated: Blazing is the mudra of Vajra Fire,

original: phyag rgya ste de yang gdug pa rnams 'dul bar byed do //
analyzed: phyag rgya ste de yang gdug pa rnams 'dul bar byed do //
translated: which tames the wicked.

original: gnod sbyin ma ni rdo rje 'jig rten pa'i phyag rgya ste de ni gnod sbyin rnams kyis 'dzin par byed de /
analyzed: gnod sbyin ma ni rdo rje 'jig rten pa'i phyag rgya ste de ni gnod sbyin rnams kyis 'dzin par byed de /
translated: The Yakshini mudra is the mudra of Vajra Lokeshvara, and it is held by the Yakshas.

original: rdo rje mche ba ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste /🔽de ni gdug cing gtum pa rnams za bar byed do //🔽gsod pa ni rdo rje dus kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje mche ba ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste / de ni gdug cing gtum pa rnams za bar byed do // gsod pa ni rdo rje dus kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The Vajadanta mudra is the mudra of Vajra Ankurika, and it devours all the wicked and violent.

original: de ni gdug cing gtum pa thams cad gsod par byed do //
analyzed: de ni gdug cing gtum pa thams cad gsod par byed do //
translated: The Marana mudra is the mudra of Vajra Kala, and it kills all the wicked and violent.

original: bgegs byed ma ni rdo rje bgegs byed kyi gtso bo'i phyag rgya rgyan ste de nyid du mi 'ong ba thams cad kyi bgegs byed do //
analyzed: bgegs byed ma ni rdo rje bgegs byed kyi gtso bo'i phyag rgya rgyan ste de nyid du mi 'ong ba thams cad kyi bgegs byed do //
translated: The Vighnakartari mudra is the mudra of Vajra Vighnakartari, and it wards off all who are not welcome.

original: 'phrog ma ni klu'i phyag rgya ste de ni thams cad 'phrog par byed cing nor dang 'bru la sogs thams cad 'gugs pa'i las byed de //
analyzed: 'phrog ma ni klu'i phyag rgya ste de ni thams cad 'phrog par byed cing nor dang 'bru la sogs thams cad 'gugs pa'i las byed de //
translated: The Harita mudra is the Naga mudra, and it steals everything, and performs the action of summoning all wealth, grain, and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
translated: It is the pledge of all Tathagatas, and so it is the Vajra Pledge of all Tathagatas.

original: rtog pa'i rgya la po yang yin la chen po yang yin la chen po yang yin pas rtogs pa'i rgyal po chen po ste /
analyzed: rtog pa'i rgya la po yang yin la chen po yang yin la chen po yang yin pas rtogs pa'i rgyal po chen po ste /
translated: Since it is a king of concepts and it is also great, it is the great king of concepts.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po de las 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po de las 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
translated: From that great king of concepts, the pledge of the vajra of all the tathagatas, there is the extensive ritual of the great mandala of the wheel of the three worlds.

original: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ko sa la'i rgyan las 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ko sa la'i rgyan las 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the chapter on the wheel of the three worlds from the Kośala Ornament, a commentary on the Compendium of Principles.

original: // / de ni de nas gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du gtogs pa'i dgos pa grub par bya'i don du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // / de ni de nas gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du gtogs pa'i dgos pa grub par bya'i don du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to explain the mandala of the seal for the sake of accomplishing the purpose of being included in the mandala of the mundane seal,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then,” and so on.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //
translated: “ Then” means immediately after.

original: skal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: skal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The Bhagavān is so called because he is endowed with perfect good fortune.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po la ltos pa'o //
translated: Also is in reference to the great maṇḍala.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la /
translated: Since it is all the tathāgatas

original: rdo rje yang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ste /
analyzed: rdo rje yang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ste /
translated: and also a vajra, it is the vajra of all tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzungs ni sngags kyi gzungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzungs ni sngags kyi gzungs so //
translated: The dhāraṇī of the vajra of all tathāgatas is the dhāraṇī of mantra.

original: de rnams kyang phal cher 'jig rten pa'i skabs 'dir gtso bor gyur pa yin pas na 'dir de skad gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de rnams kyang phal cher 'jig rten pa'i skabs 'dir gtso bor gyur pa yin pas na 'dir de skad gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Since they are mostly the principal ones in this mundane context, they are called here by that name.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gsungs kyi dam tshig go //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gsungs kyi dam tshig go //
translated: Since it is the pledge of those, it is the pledge of the vajra speech of all tathāgatas.🔽Since it is the vajra mind of that, it is the vajra mind of the pledge.

original: de'i thugs rdo re'i gang las byung ba de byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i thugs rdo re'i gang las byung ba de byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to bless that,

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang don dang mthun pa'i ming de nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so //

analyzed: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' @11b chen po phyag na rdo rje rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad ni go sla'o /

original: de nas yang phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas yang phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa'o //
translated: Then means immediately after.

original: yang bzhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yang bzhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o //

original: phyag rgya rdo rje mnga' bas na phyag na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya rdo rje mnga' bas na phyag na rdo rje'o //

original: rdo rje rigs thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje rigs thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //

analyzed: rdo rje rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yin pas na rdo rje dkyil 'khor te /

original: rdo rje h'um ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'o //

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //

original: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //

original: zhes bya ba la de nas zhes bya ba na rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes thog la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la de nas zhes bya ba na rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes thog la'o //
translated: Then means immediately after the root maṇḍala.

original: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor med par de dang 'brel ba'i dgos pa mi 'grub pas na /
analyzed: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor med par de dang 'brel ba'i dgos pa mi 'grub pas na /
translated: Since the purpose connected with that is not accomplished without the retention mandala,

analyzed: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /

analyzed: yang dag par rab tu phyi ste bshad pas na rab tu bshad pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la dam pa ni 'og nas bshad pa'i rang gi dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o //

analyzed: de'i nang du zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du ste /

analyzed: nang rim du'o //

analyzed: de bzhin sgo ni shar phyogs gdod //

original: ces bya ba la de bzhin zhes smos pas ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba la de bzhin zhes smos pas ni /

analyzed: de ji ltar phyi'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa la sog gcig pa ltar nang gi skyil 'khor yang de bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi'o //

analyzed: ci rigs par zhes bya ba ni //
translated: means

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas /

analyzed: sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya //

original: zhes bya'o // 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs pa //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs pa //
translated: The Victorious One in the Three Worlds, and so forth,

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i sku gzugs thog mar byas nas rin chen h'um mdzad la sogs pa yongs su gzung ngo //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor de bzhin mchog rnams su //

analyzed: phyis smos pa gnyis ni byang gi sgor dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: 'jigs ma dpal dang sgra dbang dang ; / zhes bya ba ni gzugs su byas la //

analyzed: me'i mtshams su 'jigs rten ma /

original: bden bral gyi phyogs su dpal mo //
analyzed: bden bral gyi phyogs su dpal mo //

original: rlung gi phyogs su sgra dbang mo //
analyzed: rlung gi phyogs su sgra dbang mo //

original: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su dur dga' dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su dur dga' dgod par bya'o //

original: phyi yi dkyil 'khor grva rnams su //
analyzed: phyi yi dkyil 'khor grva rnams su //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni me la sogs par de dag nyid dgod pa'o //

analyzed: de rnams nyid ces bya ba ni 'jigs ma la sogs pa ste 'jigs ma'i dung ngo //

analyzed: dpal mo'i ni pad ma'o //

original: sgra dbang ma'i ni po bang ngo //
analyzed: sgra dbang ma'i ni po bang ngo //

original: dur dga'i ni pa ti sa'o //
analyzed: dur dga'i ni pa ti sa'o //

original: de nas cho ga rgyas pa rnams //
analyzed: de nas cho ga rgyas pa rnams //
translated: Then the extensive rites

original: ji bzhin par ni bshad par bya //
analyzed: ji bzhin par ni bshad par bya //
translated: should be explained as they are.

original: zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la //
translated: Here,

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni bri ba'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni bri ba'i cho ga'o //
translated: then means the rite of drawing.

original: cho ga rgyas pa zhes pa ni slob dpon gyi las dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga rgyas pa zhes pa ni slob dpon gyi las dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
translated: Extensive rites means the extensive rites of the master’s actions, the rite of inducting the disciples, etc.

analyzed: bshad par bya zhes pa ni rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o //

analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //

analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bya ste // zhes byas ba ni ci dga' bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dam tshig las byas nas zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas so //

analyzed: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid ji bzhin du'o //

analyzed: de nas slob ma la sgo bar bya ste /

analyzed: ji zhig bsgo bar bya zhes na /

analyzed: de'i phyir dam tshig ma mthong ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba la zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: gsang ba spel bar yang ma byed cing //
translated: One should not divulge the secret,

original: ces bya ba ni gang 'dir gsang ba bshad pa de yang su la yang brjod par mi bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni gang 'dir gsang ba bshad pa de yang su la yang brjod par mi bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: This means that whatever is explained here in the Tantra should not be told to anyone.

original: de nas las kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni gang slob dpon gyi @12b lag na 'dug pa'i las kyis rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de nas las kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni gang slob dpon gyi @12b lag na 'dug pa'i las kyis rdo rje'o //
translated: Then, the “vajra of action” is the vajra held in the hand of the master.

original: rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i steng du bzhag ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i steng du bzhag ste /
translated: It is placed on the seal of the vajra-holder.

original: cho ga bzhin dun chug shig ces bya ba ni gdong g-yogs la sogs pa byas nas so //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin dun chug shig ces bya ba ni gdong g-yogs la sogs pa byas nas so //
translated: “Make him hold it according to the rite” means that he should be made to hold it after the blindfold, etc., have been applied.

original: rdo rje de de bzhin du 'or cig ces bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i cho gas so //
analyzed: rdo rje de de bzhin du 'or cig ces bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i cho gas so //
translated: “Let the vajra enter him in the same way” means that it should be done according to the rite of the Vajra Element, etc.

original: gang la bab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de de'i dbang du 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni des 'di'i las thams cad rab tu 'grub bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang la bab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de de'i dbang du 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni des 'di'i las thams cad rab tu 'grub bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “The pledge seal that falls to him will be his empowerment” means that all his actions will be accomplished by it.

original: gdong g-yogs bkrol nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i cho gas so //
analyzed: gdong g-yogs bkrol nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i cho gas so //
translated: “Having removed the blindfold” means that it should be done according to the rite taught in the Vajra Element.

original: rim pa bzhin du bstan ste zhes bya ba ni sgo srung nas brtsams te /
analyzed: rim pa bzhin du bstan ste zhes bya ba ni sgo srung nas brtsams te /
translated: The text says, “I will explain them in order,” beginning with the gatekeepers.🔽

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la thug gi bar du'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la thug gi bar du'o //
translated: The phrase taught in order means beginning with the gatekeepers up to the Bhagavat Vairocana.🔽Then, the secret of the pledge seal should be spoken.

original: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gsang ba smra bar bya ste gsang ba de dag kyang gang zhes na /
analyzed: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gsang ba smra bar bya ste gsang ba de dag kyang gang zhes na /
translated: What are those secrets?

original: dam tshig phyag rgya 'di khyod kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dam tshig phyag rgya 'di khyod kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The phrase this pledge seal of yours and so forth.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni dam tshig la gnas pa rnams la dgos pa 'di dag byed pas na dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni dam tshig la gnas pa rnams la dgos pa 'di dag byed pas na dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The phrase pledge seal means that which is done for those who abide in the pledge, and so it is called a pledge seal.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'o //
translated: The phrase this refers to what has been explained.

original: dgos pa gang gi tshe byed ce na /
analyzed: dgos pa gang gi tshe byed ce na /
translated: For what purpose is it done?

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: The phrase always is stated.

original: gang zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: gang zhig byed ce na /
translated: What is done?

original: las kun byed pa ste zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: las kun byed pa ste zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: The phrase all activities is stated.

original: phyag rgya 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i ste /
translated: These seals are worldly.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pas bsam pa ji lta bus bsgrub pa'i dgos pa de byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pas bsam pa ji lta bus bsgrub pa'i dgos pa de byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: he says,

original: ma dang sring mo rnams dang ni //
analyzed: ma dang sring mo rnams dang ni //
translated: “Mothers, sisters,

original: chung ma bu mo rnams rjes 'brang /
analyzed: chung ma bu mo rnams rjes 'brang /
translated: wives, and daughters follow.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.🔽

original: 'brang zhes bya ba ni rang dbang du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'brang zhes bya ba ni rang dbang du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Follow” means they come under one’s control.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: sngon du bsnyen pa nas grub pa'i bar du 'brel pa gcig la sems brtan par bya'i bar ma dor gzhan du mi bya ste /
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pa nas grub pa'i bar du 'brel pa gcig la sems brtan par bya'i bar ma dor gzhan du mi bya ste /
translated: From the prior service up to the accomplishment, one should stabilize the mind on a single object, not on another in the interval.

original: gzhan du byas par gyur na gnod sbyin mi bzhin du phung khrol byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du byas par gyur na gnod sbyin mi bzhin du phung khrol byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one does it on another, it will bring about ruin like a yakṣa.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi dgos pa'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi dgos pa'o //
translated: “On that” refers to the purpose of the pledge.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po bshad pa'o //
translated: “Of that” refers to the explanation of the essence of the consort of the vajra holder.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgyas so //
translated: “This” refers to the consort of the vajra holder.

original: lan cig bzlas pas zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bcing ba'i dus su lan gcig bzlas pas so //
analyzed: lan cig bzlas pas zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bcing ba'i dus su lan gcig bzlas pas so //
translated: Once recited means recited once at the time of binding the consort.

original: bud med thams cad dbang du byas te spyad na zhes bya ba la bud med thams cad ces bya ba ni phyag rgya thams cad do //
analyzed: bud med thams cad dbang du byas te spyad na zhes bya ba la bud med thams cad ces bya ba ni phyag rgya thams cad do //
translated: Having brought all women under one's control, one should enjoy them.  All women means all consorts.

original: dbang byas te zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba dang / dam tshig gi rig pa brjod pa'o //
analyzed: dbang byas te zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba dang / dam tshig gi rig pa brjod pa'o //
translated: Having brought them under one's control means binding the pledge seal and uttering the pledge awareness.

original: spyad na zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya rnams rang gi las la sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: spyad na zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya rnams rang gi las la sbyar ba'o //
translated: Enjoy them means employing the seals in one's own activities.

original: chos ma yin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de bus bsod rnams ma @13a * //
analyzed: chos ma yin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de bus bsod rnams ma @13a * //
translated: One will not be unrighteous means that one will not be unrighteous by having children.

original: yin par mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: yin par mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: One will not be unrighteous means that one will not be unrighteous by having children.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ma bcings shing dam tshig gi rig pa ma brjod par gal te phyag rgya 'ching bar byed na de la /🔽chos ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ma bcings shing dam tshig gi rig pa ma brjod par gal te phyag rgya 'ching bar byed na de la / chos ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: If one binds the seals without binding the pledge seal and uttering the pledge awareness, one will be unrighteous.

original: des na phyag rgya mi 'grub cing dam tshig kyang nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na phyag rgya mi 'grub cing dam tshig kyang nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be unrighteous means that one will not accomplish the seals and will break one's pledge.

original: ci dga' bar thams cad spyad nas bsgrub par bya ste zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: ci dga' bar thams cad spyad nas bsgrub par bya ste zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: Having practiced everything as one wishes, one should accomplish it means this:

original: 'dir rig sngags kyis 'dul ba mi srung du mi rung ba ma yin gyi gzhan du na gang gis rang gi sems ji ltar dga' bar spyad pas rtags gcig par 'gyur ba de thams cad spyad la bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir rig sngags kyis 'dul ba mi srung du mi rung ba ma yin gyi gzhan du na gang gis rang gi sems ji ltar dga' bar spyad pas rtags gcig par 'gyur ba de thams cad spyad la bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Here, it is not that it is not suitable to protect the vidyā mantra, but rather, by whatever one practices, one's mind becomes one-pointed. Having practiced everything, one should accomplish it.

original: de nas thams cad dag par sems kyis rig na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnams par dag pa'i chos nyid la 'jig pas rtse gcig pa thob par gyur na yid kyis kyang phyag rgya thams cad kyis las dam pa thams cad byed do zhes pa ste
analyzed: de nas thams cad dag par sems kyis rig na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnams par dag pa'i chos nyid la 'jig pas rtse gcig pa thob par gyur na yid kyis kyang phyag rgya thams cad kyis las dam pa thams cad byed do zhes pa ste
translated: Then, if one is aware that everything is pure, one obtains one-pointedness through the destruction of the intrinsic reality of natural purity. Even mentally, one performs all the supreme activities of all the mudras.

original: / dngos grub kyi mchog yang sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: / dngos grub kyi mchog yang sbyin par byed do //
translated: It also grants the supreme spiritual power.

original: de skad su zhig gsung zhe na /
analyzed: de skad su zhig gsung zhe na /
translated: Who says this?

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs so zhes bya ba ste bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs kyi brgya byin dang rig pa dam pas ni ma yin no zhes pa'i //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs so zhes bya ba ste bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs kyi brgya byin dang rig pa dam pas ni ma yin no zhes pa'i //
translated: The Blessed One Vajradhara said means that the Blessed One Vajrapāṇi said, not Indra or the Holy Knowledge.

original: dam tshig khro bo'i mdzub ces bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig khro bo'i mdzub ces bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The wrathful pledge finger is the mudrā of Trailokyavijaya.

original: gtsug dang zhes bya ba ni spyi bor bzhag na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtsug dang zhes bya ba ni spyi bor bzhag na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: The crown is placed on the head, becoming the mudrā of the Blessed Vairocana.

original: snying gar bzhag pa ni 'jigs rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: snying gar bzhag pa ni 'jigs rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: When placed on the heart, it is the mudrā of Trailokyavijaya.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis smin mtshams su gzhan na rin chen h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis smin mtshams su gzhan na rin chen h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: From the Trailokyavijaya mudrā, if the two index fingers are placed between the eyebrows, it becomes the mudrā of Ratnāhūṃkāra.

original: kha nas drangs na pad ma h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kha nas drangs na pad ma h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: If drawn from the mouth, it becomes the mudrā of Padmāhūṃkāra.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag nas mthe'u chung sbrel ba bkrol na gnyis su byas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag nas mthe'u chung sbrel ba bkrol na gnyis su byas par 'gyur te /
translated: Having placed the mudra of Vajra Humkara on one's crown, if one releases the joined little fingers, it becomes two.

original: de lta bu ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i rgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bu ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i rgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: Such is the mudra of the crossed vajra.

original: g-yon pa rdo rje mdzub mi bcing bas na g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mi bcing bas zhes bya ste /
analyzed: g-yon pa rdo rje mdzub mi bcing bas na g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mi bcing bas zhes bya ste /
translated: Since one does not bind the left vajra forefinger, it is called the nonbinding of the left vajra forefinger.

original: g-yas pa'i mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis bcings te sbrel la rtse gsum gyi mtshan ma gang la yod pa de ni rtse gsum gyi mtshan ma ste /
analyzed: g-yas pa'i mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis bcings te sbrel la rtse gsum gyi mtshan ma gang la yod pa de ni rtse gsum gyi mtshan ma ste /
translated: The right thumb and little finger are bound and joined. The one who has the sign of the three points is the one who has the sign of the three points.

original: de mnan par bya'o //
analyzed: de mnan par bya'o //
translated: One should press that.

original: 'di skad ston te g-yon pa'i rdo rje'i sor mo lhags ma gsum brkyang la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i rdo rje g-yon pa'i rtse gsum gyi steng du mnan nas gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ston te g-yon pa'i rdo rje'i sor mo lhags ma gsum brkyang la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i rdo rje g-yon pa'i rtse gsum gyi steng du mnan nas gzhag par bya'o //
translated: This teaches that one should extend the three left vajra fingers, and press the right forefinger vajra on top of the left three points and place it there.

analyzed: da ni phyag rgya lhag ma rnams 'byung ba'i spyi'i phyag rgya bstan @13b pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the general mudra for the arising of the remaining mudras, it is said:🔽The mudra of the vajra fist

original: rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi //
analyzed: rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi //
translated: is the supreme mudra of all vajras.

original: g-yon pa rdo rje gtso bor 'dus //
analyzed: g-yon pa rdo rje gtso bor 'dus //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyang yi pa thams cad kyang yin pas na / rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi //

analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa rigs lnga'o //
translated: The five families are the vajra king and so forth.

analyzed: rdo rje rigs de dag thams cad kyi g-yon pa rdo rje gtso bor 'dus pa ni g-yon pa yang yin la /

analyzed: rdo rje yang yin pas na g-yon pa rdo rje ste /

analyzed: de nyid ni phyag rgya thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pas na gtso bo'o //
translated: Since it is the cause of the arising of all seals, it is the chief.

original: de 'dus pa yin pas na //
analyzed: de 'dus pa yin pas na //
translated: Since it is the gathering of that,

original: g-yon pa rdo rje gtso bor 'dus //🔽zhes bya ste /
analyzed: g-yon pa rdo rje gtso bor 'dus // zhes bya ste /
translated: it is the left vajra chief gathering.

original: de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: That should be applied to the explanation of the binding of the seals.

original: su zhig gi zhe na /
analyzed: su zhig gi zhe na /
translated: Of what?

original: dam tshig ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: dam tshig ces bya ba ste /
translated: Of the commitments.

original: dam tshig gi lha mo'i khyad par rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi lha mo'i khyad par rnams kyi'o //
