analyzed: phyag rgya bcing ba de ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How is that binding of the seals done?

original: de'i phyir cho ga ji bzhin par zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir cho ga ji bzhin par zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “just as in the ritual.”

original: mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is “just as in the characteristics.”

analyzed: thams cad 'khor lo sor rtse bcum //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sgyu ma'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste /

analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa'i sor mo rnams brkyang la thams cad kyi rtse mo bcum par bya ste /

analyzed: 'di lta bu ni //
translated: This is

analyzed: thams cad 'khor lo'i sor rtse bcum //

analyzed: zhes bya'o // dril bu'i phyag rgya 'dad de bzhin no //

analyzed: zhes bya ba 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo las /
translated: As it is said in the Wheel of the Three Worlds,

analyzed: mdzub mos mthe ba brten spyad pa dang ; / zhes ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: “The index finger supports the thumb. ”🔽“Likewise, the gesture of Oṃ”

analyzed: de bzhin aom ni phyag rgya dang // zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: zhes bya ba na g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis pa bcags pa de'i rten mo mthe bo'i rtser bzung ba 'di ni /

analyzed: seng ge'i rna bar yongs su bzung //

translated: The holding of the blazing is the left hand extended, as if emitting light.

original: g-yon pa'i sta zur gyi bar du phab la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i tshul du bya ba 'di ni /🔽'od kyi yang dag 'dus pa nyid //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i sta zur gyi bar du phab la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i tshul du bya ba 'di ni /🔽'od kyi yang dag 'dus pa nyid //
translated: The gathering of light is the left hand's index finger beginning at the right shoulder and circling down to the head, and then descending to the left shoulder, as if demonstrating the mandala of light.🔽The gathering of light is the left hand's index finger beginning at the right shoulder and circling down to the head, and then descending to the left shoulder, as if demonstrating the mandala of light.

original: ces bya'o // dbyig pa'i khu tshur 'dzin pa dang // zhes bya ba ni khu tshur g-yon pa dbyig pa 'dzin pa'i tshul du phrag pa'i phyogs su kha nang du bstan nas gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya'o // dbyig pa'i khu tshur 'dzin pa dang // zhes bya ba ni khu tshur g-yon pa dbyig pa 'dzin pa'i tshul du phrag pa'i phyogs su kha nang du bstan nas gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The fist of the scepter is the left fist held at the shoulder in the manner of holding a scepter, turned inward.

original: gdong @14a * //🔽du phyag rgya bskor ba'o //
analyzed: gdong @14a * // du phyag rgya bskor ba'o //
translated: The face is the face of the deity.

original: zhes bya ba ni khu tshur de nyid kha'i 'gram du bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khu tshur de nyid kha'i 'gram du bskor bar bya'o //
translated: The turning of the seal is turning the fist to the side of the mouth.

original: mthe bo dang mdzub mi dang gung mi gsum 'di ris kyi tshul du gru gsum par byas la kha'i phyogs su brkyang pa 'di ni btung ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mthe bo dang mdzub mi dang gung mi gsum 'di ris kyi tshul du gru gsum par byas la kha'i phyogs su brkyang pa 'di ni btung ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal of drinking is the three fingers, thumb, index, and middle fingers, in the shape of a triangle, extended to the side of the mouth.

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur phreng ba'i tshul du mgo la bskor ba 'di ni rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o //🔽rdo rjes mnan nas btud pas te //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur phreng ba'i tshul du mgo la bskor ba 'di ni rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o // rdo rjes mnan nas btud pas te //
translated: The vajra-rosary seal is the left vajra fist in the manner of a rosary, turned around the head.

original: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis g-yas pa'i rdo rje khur tshur mnan te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis g-yas pa'i rdo rje khur tshur mnan te /
translated: The bowing down with the vajra is the left vajra fist pressing down on the right vajra fist.🔽The vajra-fist is the right vajra fist.

original: thur du btud pa 'di ni rdo rjes mnan nas btud pa'i //
analyzed: thur du btud pa 'di ni rdo rjes mnan nas btud pa'i //
translated: This is the vajra pressing down,

original: spyi bor bzhag pa tshogs kyi ste //
analyzed: spyi bor bzhag pa tshogs kyi ste //
translated: and placing on the head is the assembly.

original: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo mtshog mar bzhag pa 'di ni spyi bor bzhag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo mtshog mar bzhag pa 'di ni spyi bor bzhag pa'o //
translated: This is placing on the head with the left vajra fist, the index finger placed on the forehead.

original: 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor gyi sgo srung rnams yin te /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor gyi sgo srung rnams yin te /
translated: These are the gate guardians of the mandala,

original: rang rang gi bdag po'i drung du phyag rgya'i tshul gyis gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: rang rang gi bdag po'i drung du phyag rgya'i tshul gyis gzhag par bya'o //
translated: and they should be placed in the presence of their respective lords in the manner of a mudra.

original: lag pa skum pa khar bzhag ste //
analyzed: lag pa skum pa khar bzhag ste //
translated: The bent arm placed at the mouth

original: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs la gru mo bkug ste dpung mgo g-yon pa'i thad kar bzhag pa 'di ni lag ba bskum pa khar bzhag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs la gru mo bkug ste dpung mgo g-yon pa'i thad kar bzhag pa 'di ni lag ba bskum pa khar bzhag pa'o //
translated: is the left fist held with the elbow bent and placed at the level of the left shoulder. This is the bent arm placed at the mouth.

original: rgyab tu yang ni bskor bar bya //
analyzed: rgyab tu yang ni bskor bar bya //
translated: And also turning it around on the back

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur de nyid bskor la rgyab kyi dbus su bzung ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur de nyid bskor la rgyab kyi dbus su bzung ba ste /
translated: is turning that vajra fist and holding it in the middle of the back.

original: 'di ni / rgyab tu yang ni bskor bar bya //
analyzed: 'di ni / rgyab tu yang ni bskor bar bya //
translated: This is also turning it around on the back.

original: zhes bya'o // g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi ser mi bskum pa mdun du drag du brkyang ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi ser mi bskum pa mdun du drag du brkyang ba ni /
translated: The left vajra fist is extended straight out in front, with the index finger extended.

original: bar ma'i me stag gtong ba ste //
analyzed: bar ma'i me stag gtong ba ste //
translated: This is the mudra of the middle fire spark.

original: zhes bya'o // g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur de nyid khar brkyang la cung zad nang du gzhug pa ltar bstan pa ni phye nas khar yang gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur de nyid khar brkyang la cung zad nang du gzhug pa ltar bstan pa ni phye nas khar yang gnas pa'o //
translated: The left vajra fist is extended to the mouth, and is shown as if slightly inserted inside.

original: pho nya mo'i dam tshig rnams so //
analyzed: pho nya mo'i dam tshig rnams so //
translated: This is the mudra of the mouth-dwelling messenger.🔽The two tips are inserted in the mouth.🔽The left vajra fist is inserted in the mouth with the little finger.

original: mtha' ma gnyis ni khar bcug dang // zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur de nyid kyi mthe'u chung gi khar bcug pa 'di ni mtha' ma gnyis khar bcug pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' ma gnyis ni khar bcug dang // zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur de nyid kyi mthe'u chung gi khar bcug pa 'di ni mtha' ma gnyis khar bcug pa'o //
translated: This is the mudra of the two tips inserted in the mouth.

original: rdo rje khu tshur de nyid mdun du bteg la thur du bab pa 'di ni bzir zhing rab tu gnon pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur de nyid mdun du bteg la thur du bab pa 'di ni bzir zhing rab tu gnon pa'o //
translated: The vajra fist is raised in front and falls down.🔽This is the mudra of the vajra fist falling down.🔽The left vajra fist is crossed over the right arm.

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa'i dpung pas dpung pa g-yas pa la bsnol ba 'di ni dpung ba bsnol bas snol ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa'i dpung pas dpung pa g-yas pa la bsnol ba 'di ni dpung ba bsnol bas snol ba'o //
translated: This is the mudra of the crossed arms.

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis g-yas pa'i mkhrig ma nas brtsams te /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis g-yas pa'i mkhrig ma nas brtsams te /
translated: The left fist vajra, beginning from the right wrist,

original: gdu bu 'byin pa'i tshul du bya ba ston pa 'di ni myur du 'phrog pa'o //
analyzed: gdu bu 'byin pa'i tshul du bya ba ston pa 'di ni myur du 'phrog pa'o //
translated: shows the manner of removing the bracelet; this is the quick snatch.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ste /
translated: Since it is the vajra commitment of all the tathāgatas, it is the vajra commitment of all the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams @14b cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po de las so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams @14b cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po de las so //
translated: From that great king of tantras of the vajra commitment of all the tathāgatas,

original: rdo rje'i rigs kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas rdo rje rigs thams cad de /
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas rdo rje rigs thams cad de /
translated: it is the vajra family and it is all, thus it is the vajra family all.

original: 'di rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
translated: This is the mundane and supramundane.

original: rdo rje'i rigs gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor yin pas na dkyil 'khor chen po ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor yin pas na dkyil 'khor chen po ste /
translated: Since it is the maṇḍala of the abode of the vajra family, it is the great maṇḍala.

original: de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni rnam pa rgyas pa ste de rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni rnam pa rgyas pa ste de rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The extensive rite is the extensive aspect, and that is complete.

original: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ko sa la'i rgyan las 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ko sa la'i rgyan las 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
translated: The Kośalālamkāra, the commentary on the Compendium of Principles, is the commentary on the maṇḍala of the Dhāraṇī of the Three Worlds’ Wheel.

original: // /'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid yongs su shes par ma gyur na de'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: // /'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid yongs su shes par ma gyur na de'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If one does not know the reality of the meditative concentration of the mundane deities, their mantras and seals will not be accomplished.

original: de pas na de bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gsungs te /
analyzed: de pas na de bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, in order to teach that, the text says “Then,” and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs so //
translated: “Then” is the occasion.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o //
translated: “Again” refers to the maṇḍala of seals.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: “The Bhagavān” has been explained.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Since it is the maṇḍala of the Dharma belonging to all tathāgatas, it is the maṇḍala of the Dharma of all tathāgatas.

original: gang de'i dam tshig ni sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: gang de'i dam tshig ni sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
translated: “Its pledge” is the mantra and the seal.

original: 'di dag gang las skyes pa ni 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: 'di dag gang las skyes pa ni 'byung ba ste //
translated: The source of these is the element.

original: bsam pa'i khyad par 'di las byung bas na byung pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa'i khyad par 'di las byung bas na byung pa'o //
translated: Since it arises from the particular intention, it is the source.

original: de nyid ni mi phyed pa'i rdo rje de byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gang don dang mthun pa'i ming de nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni mi phyed pa'i rdo rje de byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gang don dang mthun pa'i ming de nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: That very vajra is indivisible. The samādhi that is consistent with the meaning, that very samādhi called by that name, he entered.

original: rig pa rnams kyi dam pa yin pas na rig pa dam pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa rnams kyi dam pa yin pas na rig pa dam pa'o //
translated: Since it is the best of the vidyās, it is the supreme vidyā.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
translated: “That” means residing in the mind.

original: gsungs zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: “Said” means spoken.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: de nas yang phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas yang phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, Vajrapāṇi, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag ste sngags pa bstan pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag ste sngags pa bstan pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: “Then” means immediately after teaching the mantra, subsequently.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o //
translated: “Again” refers to the maṇḍala of the mudrā.

original: rdo rje rigs kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na rdo rje'i rigs thams cad de de'i chos yin pas na rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi chos te /
analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na rdo rje'i rigs thams cad de de'i chos yin pas na rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi chos te /
translated: Since it is the Dharma of that, it is the Dharma of the vajra family of all.

original: gang gi ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de de'i chos te de'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: gang gi ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de de'i chos te de'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Whatever is the samadhi of that is its Dharma, its mandala of commitment.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
translated: This is abiding in the mind.

original: gsungs zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: Spoken is spoken by the Buddha.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs so //
translated: Then is the occasion.

original: 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi @15a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi @15a * //
translated: The Dharma of the worldly samadhi

original: chos nyid ma bstan par ni 'jig rten pa'i sngags kyi don grub par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: chos nyid ma bstan par ni 'jig rten pa'i sngags kyi don grub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: is not taught, the worldly mantra meaning is not accomplished.🔽Therefore, it is said,

original: de bas na rab tu bshad par bya zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bas na rab tu bshad par bya zhes bya ba ste /
translated: I will fully explain it.

original: yang dag par phye ste bshad pa na rab tu bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par phye ste bshad pa na rab tu bshad par bya'o //
translated: When it is fully explained, it is fully explained.

original: dan tshig kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na dam tshig chen po ste /
analyzed: dan tshig kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na dam tshig chen po ste /
translated: Since it is a pledge and also great, it is the great pledge.

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dam tshig rnams bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dam tshig rnams bsdus pa'o //
translated: The commitments of the world and beyond the world are included in this.

original: de'i dkyil 'khor ni dam tshig zhen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i dkyil 'khor ni dam tshig zhen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Its mandala is the mandala of the commitments.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo bzhin //🔽zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo bzhin // zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: Like the wheel of the three worlds.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: It is like the wheel of the three worlds.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya //
translated: All mandalas should be drawn.

original: zhes bya ba ni legs par bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni legs par bri bar bya'o //
translated: They should be drawn well.

original: der su zhig gi phyag rgya bri bar bye zhe na /🔽sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs //
analyzed: der su zhig gi phyag rgya bri bar bye zhe na / sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs //
translated: Who should be drawn there?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The Buddhas, the Vajra-holders, and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The Buddhas are the Blessed Buddhas.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni rig pa dam pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni rig pa dam pa ste /
translated: The Vajra-holders are the sublime awarenesses.

original: phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi drung du snyoms par zhugs par bri'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi drung du snyoms par zhugs par bri'o //
translated: Vajrapāṇi should be drawn in union with his consort.

original: sogs zhes smos pa ni rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs zhes smos pa ni rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The “and so forth” includes Vajramāyā and so forth.

original: ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na /
translated: How should they be drawn?

original: thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: All are in union means

original: mnyam par bzhag pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i spyod lam gyis gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i spyod lam gyis gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that they abide in a posture that is in accord with meditative equipoise.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul lta bu //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul lta bu //
translated: The phrase like the maṇḍala of the Dharma

original: zhes bya ba ni skyil mi krung du bzhugs par ston to //🔽snying gar mtshan yang dag gzhag //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni skyil mi krung du bzhugs par ston to // snying gar mtshan yang dag gzhag //
translated: indicates that they are seated cross-legged.

original: ces bya ba ni 'di dag gi snying ga nas mtshan ma yod pa'i phyir snying ga'i mtshan ma ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'di dag gi snying ga nas mtshan ma yod pa'i phyir snying ga'i mtshan ma ste /
translated: The phrase the insignia properly placed at the heart means that the insignia of the heart is the insignia that is at their hearts.

original: mtshan ma ni rang rang gi phyag rgya la bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma ni rang rang gi phyag rgya la bya'o //
translated: The word insignia refers to their individual seals.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la te /
translated: The phrase then, means afterward,

original: bris pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: bris pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: that is, after the drawing is finished.

original: dam tshig gi don gyis dkyil 'khor ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dam tshig gi don gyis dkyil 'khor ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The phrase the maṇḍala of the pledge means the maṇḍala of the pledge because of the meaning of the pledge.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du'o //🔽cho ga bzhin du las byas nas //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du'o // cho ga bzhin du las byas nas //
translated: The phrase in this means in the maṇḍala of the pledge.

original: zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi las te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi las te /
translated: The phrase having performed the rite according to the rite means the rite of the master.

original: bdag nyid 'jug pa dang / rang gi ming brjod pa dang / bka' nod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid 'jug pa dang / rang gi ming brjod pa dang / bka' nod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: the self-admittance, the declaration of one’s name, the request for initiation, and so on.

original: rdo rje 'chang gi phyag rgya ni slob ma 'ching du bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang gi phyag rgya ni slob ma 'ching du bzhugs pa'o //
translated: The vajra-holder’s seal is the disciple’s sitting in the vajra posture.

original: ji lta bu zhe na rdo rje dril bur bcas pa ste rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu ni rdo rje'i dril bu'o //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na rdo rje dril bur bcas pa ste rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu ni rdo rje'i dril bu'o //
translated: What is it like? It is the vajra with the bell, the bell marked with the vajra is the vajra-bell.

original: rdo rje dril bu dang bcas par gnas pas na rdo rje dril bur bcas pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu dang bcas par gnas pas na rdo rje dril bur bcas pa ste /
translated: The vajra-holder is the one who is situated with the vajra and the bell.

original: de ching du bcug la rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i tshogs dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
analyzed: de ching du bcug la rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i tshogs dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
translated: Having been seated in the vajra posture, one should enter the mandala of the assembly as taught in the Vajra Element Tantra.

original: 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: One should say this:

original: dam tshig ma mthong @15b ba dang zhes bya ba la gang gis dam tshig ma mthong ba 'di ni tshig ma mthong ba'o /
analyzed: dam tshig ma mthong @15b ba dang zhes bya ba la gang gis dam tshig ma mthong ba 'di ni tshig ma mthong ba'o /
translated: “You who have not seen the pledge,” means you who have not seen the pledge, you who have not seen the words.

original: mgal te dam tshig mthong zhing dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags dang dkyil 'khor bstan pa yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: mgal te dam tshig mthong zhing dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags dang dkyil 'khor bstan pa yin du zin kyang /
translated: If you have seen the pledge, if you have been shown the pledge seal, the mantra, and the mandala,

original: lha de dag gi so so'i dbye ba ma bstan pa yang yin srid pas /
analyzed: lha de dag gi so so'i dbye ba ma bstan pa yang yin srid pas /
translated: It is also possible that the individual divisions of those deities are not taught.

original: lha'i rigs ma mthong ba su la yang zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: lha'i rigs ma mthong ba su la yang zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “to anyone who has not seen the family of deities.”

original: mna'i snying po byin la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: mna'i snying po byin la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'o //
translated: “Give the essence of the oath” is taught in the great maṇḍala of the Wheel of the Three Realms.

original: ji ltar dril bu 'di dkrol ba //
analyzed: ji ltar dril bu 'di dkrol ba //
translated: “Just as this bell is rung”

original: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rnam pa gang gis dril bu 'di dkrol zhing sgra sgrogs pa de'i sgra ji ltar rtag pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rnam pa gang gis dril bu 'di dkrol zhing sgra sgrogs pa de'i sgra ji ltar rtag pa de bzhin du /
translated: means “just as this bell is rung and its sound resounds, just as that sound is permanent,

original: las kyi rdo rje 'di khyod mi rtag pa ste /🔽rtag pa ni mi 'jig pa ste dus su mchi ba'o //
analyzed: las kyi rdo rje 'di khyod mi rtag pa ste / rtag pa ni mi 'jig pa ste dus su mchi ba'o //
translated: this karma-vajra is impermanent for you.🔽Permanence is indestructibility, arriving at the right time.

original: mi rtag pa ni 'jig pa ste dus ma yin par mchi ba ste /
analyzed: mi rtag pa ni 'jig pa ste dus ma yin par mchi ba ste /
translated: Impermanence is destructibility, arriving at the wrong time.

original: 'og na bshad pa'i dam tshig las 'das na khyod dus ma yin par mchi bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'og na bshad pa'i dam tshig las 'das na khyod dus ma yin par mchi bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that if you transgress the pledges explained below, you will arrive at the wrong time.”

original: ma rungs par byed pa ni rlag par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ma rungs par byed pa ni rlag par byed pa'o //
translated: “Malicious” means “to destroy.”

original: dam tshig gang zhig bsrungs bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: dam tshig gang zhig bsrungs bar bya zhe na /
translated: What is the samaya that is to be guarded?

original: de bstan pa'i phyir /🔽rdo rje slob dpon bsti stang med //
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir / rdo rje slob dpon bsti stang med //
translated: In order to teach that,

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: it states, “without respect for the vajra master” and so forth.

original: rdo rje slob dpon ni gang gis dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon ni gang gis dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The vajra master is the one who confers empowerment.

original: de la bsti stang med pa ni drod 'dzin cing brnyas thabs byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la bsti stang med pa ni drod 'dzin cing brnyas thabs byed pa'o //
translated: “ Without respect” means to be contemptuous and to hold a grudge.

original: rdo rje la mi mdza' dang // zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gcig las dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ste //
analyzed: rdo rje la mi mdza' dang // zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gcig las dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ste //
translated: “ Not being friendly with the vajra siblings” means those who have entered the maṇḍala with the same master.

original: de dang mi mdza' ba ni de dang yang der zhe 'gras pa'o //
analyzed: de dang mi mdza' ba ni de dang yang der zhe 'gras pa'o //
translated: “ Not being friendly with them” means to be hostile toward them.

original: gdug pa ni bkon mchog gsum la 'khu ba dang / sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gdug pa ni bkon mchog gsum la 'khu ba dang / sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o //
translated: “ Malicious” means to be hostile toward the Three Jewels and to harm sentient beings.

original: de rnams la byams pa ni phan 'dogs par sems pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams la byams pa ni phan 'dogs par sems pa'o //
translated: “ Love” for them means to think of benefiting them.

original: chags pa dang bral ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: chags pa dang bral ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'o //
translated: “ Free from attachment” means to be free from desire.

original: 'di yang mi bya ste nyin mongs pa med cing skye bzad pas byang chub mchog thob par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di yang mi bya ste nyin mongs pa med cing skye bzad pas byang chub mchog thob par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This should not be done, because without afflictions, the exhaustion of birth will not occur, and the attainment of supreme awakening will not occur.

original: de dag ni dam tshig yin pas dngos grub 'dod pas 'da' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni dam tshig yin pas dngos grub 'dod pas 'da' bar mi bya'o //
translated: Since these are the pledges, one who desires power should not transgress them.

original: gal te khyod kyis byas na'o //
analyzed: gal te khyod kyis byas na'o //
translated: If you transgress them,

original: zhes bya ba ni gal te khyod kyis 'da' bar byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba la sogs pa ji skad bstan pa rnams su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gal te khyod kyis 'da' bar byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba la sogs pa ji skad bstan pa rnams su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: means if you transgress them, then untimely death and so forth will occur, as previously explained.

original: chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes rlabs po che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig yin pas chos kyi dam tshig ste /
analyzed: chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes rlabs po che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig yin pas chos kyi dam tshig ste /
translated: The knowledge of the great wave of the pledge seal of Dharma is the pledge of the Dharma mandala, since it is the pledge of the Dharma mandala.

original: de'i phyag rgya yin pas na chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya yin pas na chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Since it is the seal of that, it is the pledge seal of Dharma.

original: / de'i ye shes rlabs po zhes bya ba ni bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: / de'i ye shes rlabs po zhes bya ba ni bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The knowledge of that great wave is taught.

original: 'dir ni @16a * //
analyzed: 'dir ni @16a * //
translated: Here,

original: sangs rgyas dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa thog mar ston te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa thog mar ston te /
translated: the Buddha, Vajradhara, and so forth are taught first.

original: de bas na de rnams dang po kho nar smos dgos pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na de rnams dang po kho nar smos dgos pas de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, they must be mentioned first, and so it says,

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs //
translated: the Buddha, Vajradhara, and so forth.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no //
translated: just as in the maṇḍala of the Dharma.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje phra mo la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du bya ba ni 'dir dam tshig yin par blta bar bya'o zhes /
analyzed: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje phra mo la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du bya ba ni 'dir dam tshig yin par blta bar bya'o zhes /
translated: “The pledge here is to be seen as the practice of the samādhi of the subtle vajra and so forth, just as it is taught in the maṇḍala of the realization of the Great Vehicle.”

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs //
translated: The buddhas, vajra holders, and so forth

original: zhes bya ba 'dis bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis bstan pa yin no //
translated: are taught by this.

original: rdo rje rig pa dam pa'i dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid gang yin zhe na ;
analyzed: rdo rje rig pa dam pa'i dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid gang yin zhe na ;
translated: What is the reality of the samādhi of the pledge of the sublime vajra awareness?

original: thams cad mnyam pa nyid bsam pa //
analyzed: thams cad mnyam pa nyid bsam pa //
translated: The thought of the sameness of everything

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: is taught.

original: chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that all phenomena are naturally pure.

original: rdo rje sgyur ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: rdo rje sgyur ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the reality of the samādhi of the vajra illusion?

original: 'gro ba 'di dag sgyu ma bzhin //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'di dag sgyu ma bzhin //
translated: These beings are like an illusion

original: zhes bya bas bstan te //
analyzed: zhes bya bas bstan te //
translated: is taught.

original: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: The reality of all phenomena is like this.

original: gzhon nu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: gzhon nu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the reality of the bodhisattva’s meditative absorption?

original: de bzhin sdug bsngal dril bu 'dra //🔽zhes bya bas bstan te //
analyzed: de bzhin sdug bsngal dril bu 'dra // zhes bya bas bstan te //
translated: Suffering is like a bell.

original: sdug bsngal ni 'bras bur gyur pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la bzung ngo //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ni 'bras bur gyur pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la bzung ngo //
translated: Suffering is taken to be the five appropriated aggregates that are the result.

original: dril bu 'dra zhes bya ba ni dril bu smos su zin kyang 'dir dril du'i sgra gzung dgos te de yang mi gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: dril bu 'dra zhes bya ba ni dril bu smos su zin kyang 'dir dril du'i sgra gzung dgos te de yang mi gnas pa yin no //
translated: Although a bell is mentioned, here the sound of the bell should be taken, and that is impermanent.

original: mi gnas pa yin pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: mi gnas pa yin pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Because it is impermanent, it is said that all conditioned things are impermanent.

original: sdug bsngal thams cad mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: sdug bsngal thams cad mya ngan 'das //
translated: All suffering is nirvana.

original: zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the reality of Brahma’s meditative absorption.

original: sdug bsngal yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas sdug bsngal thams cad do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas sdug bsngal thams cad do //
translated: Because it is suffering and it is all, it is all suffering.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni mchog ste sdug bsngal thams cad kyi mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni mchog ste sdug bsngal thams cad kyi mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Nirvana is supreme, meaning that it is the absence of the sorrow of all suffering.

original: rdo rje 'joms pa bla na med //
analyzed: rdo rje 'joms pa bla na med //
translated: The vajra is unsurpassed in destroying.

original: ces bya ba 'di ni brgya byin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di ni brgya byin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the reality of the samadhi of Indra.

original: 'joms pa'i dang tshul yod pas na 'joms pa yin la /
analyzed: 'joms pa'i dang tshul yod pas na 'joms pa yin la /
translated: It is a destroyer because it has the mode of destroying.

original: 'joms pa rnams kyi nang na bla na med pa ni thams cad las phul du byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'joms pa rnams kyi nang na bla na med pa ni thams cad las phul du byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Unsurpassed among destroyers means it is the best of all.🔽What is that? It is the vajra.🔽The wrathful one is supreme for taming beings.

original: de gang zhig yin zhe na rdo rje'o// sems can 'dul phyir khro bo mchog / ces bya ba 'di rdo rje 'khyil pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: de gang zhig yin zhe na rdo rje'o// sems can 'dul phyir khro bo mchog / ces bya ba 'di rdo rje 'khyil pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the reality of the vajra-garland samadhi.

original: khro bo ni khros pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo ni khros pa'o //
translated: Wrathful means angry.

original: mchog ni dam pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni dam pa'o //
translated: Supreme means holy.

original: yul gang zhe na /
analyzed: yul gang zhe na /
translated: What is the object?

original: sems can @16b gdul phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te gdul bar dka' ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sems can @16b gdul phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te gdul bar dka' ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is said to be for taming beings, meaning for taming difficult to tame beings.

original: zhi ba yis ni nges par gsod //
analyzed: zhi ba yis ni nges par gsod //
translated: One definitely kills with peace.

original: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the reality of the vajra light meditative absorption.

original: zhi ba ni gal te la lar phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba yang srid pas 'dis de nges par gsod par byed de /
analyzed: zhi ba ni gal te la lar phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba yang srid pas 'dis de nges par gsod par byed de /
translated: Peace is possible, but it is also possible that there will be a mistake.🔽One should make effort to be careful with

original: brtan zhing 'jam la smra nyung gang yin pa //🔽de nyid la ni 'bad pas bag bya ste //
analyzed: brtan zhing 'jam la smra nyung gang yin pa // de nyid la ni 'bad pas bag bya ste //
translated: that which is stable, gentle, and speaks little.

original: nyi ma sprin rum dag nas byung ba yi //
analyzed: nyi ma sprin rum dag nas byung ba yi //
translated: The light rays that emerge from the sun

original: 'od zer shin tu rno bar gyur pa yin //
analyzed: 'od zer shin tu rno bar gyur pa yin //
translated: in the midst of clouds become very sharp.

original: zhes ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: As it is explained,

original: dbyig pa 'dra bar 'tshog pa med //
analyzed: dbyig pa 'dra bar 'tshog pa med //
translated: One should not strike back like a club.

original: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de nyes pa dang mthun par chad pas gcod pa ni mtshog pa ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de nyes pa dang mthun par chad pas gcod pa ni mtshog pa ste /
translated: This is the reality of the vajra club meditative absorption. Punishment in accordance with the offense is striking.

original: dbyig pas brdegs ma las lhag pa'i tshogs pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dbyig pas brdegs ma las lhag pa'i tshogs pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no assembly superior to that which is struck with a club.

original: log par lta bas 'jigs par byed //
analyzed: log par lta bas 'jigs par byed //
translated: One should frighten with wrong views.

original: ces bya ba ni rdo rje ser smug gi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rdo rje ser smug gi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the reality of the vajra brown meditative absorption.

original: lta ba ni mthong ba ste shes rab bo //
analyzed: lta ba ni mthong ba ste shes rab bo //
translated: View is seeing, i.e., discernment.

original: log par zhugs pa'i lta ba yin pas na log par lta ba'o //
analyzed: log par zhugs pa'i lta ba yin pas na log par lta ba'o //
translated: It is a wrong view because it is a perverted view.

original: 'jigs par byed pas 'jigs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'jigs par byed pas 'jigs par byed pa ste /
translated: It is a terror because it causes terror.

original: sbyin pa med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa med do //
translated: There is no giving,

original: mchod sbyin med 'od //
analyzed: mchod sbyin med 'od //
translated: no sacrifice,🔽no offering,🔽and so on.

original: sbyin sreg med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'i rnam par zhugs pa'i shes rab la log par lta ba zhes bya'o //🔽de ni 'jigs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: sbyin sreg med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'i rnam par zhugs pa'i shes rab la log par lta ba zhes bya'o // de ni 'jigs par byed pa yin te /
translated: This is called wrong view.

original: ngan song la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad par gtong bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ngan song la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad par gtong bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is a terror because it causes one to be cast into the terrible sufferings of the unfortunate realms and so on.

original: ra ro 'dra par 'jigs pa med //
analyzed: ra ro 'dra par 'jigs pa med //
translated: It is like a drunkard, fearless,

original: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje glang po'i sna'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de gang gi phyir skyes bu ra ro bas ni glang po che'i dbang po la yang rtsa tsam du sems pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje glang po'i sna'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de gang gi phyir skyes bu ra ro bas ni glang po che'i dbang po la yang rtsa tsam du sems pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the reality of the vajra elephant’s trunk samadhi, because a drunkard thinks that even the king of elephants is just a straw.

original: phreng ba 'dra bar 'ching ba med /
analyzed: phreng ba 'dra bar 'ching ba med /
translated: It is like a garland, not binding.

original: ces bya 'de ni rdo rje phreng ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: ces bya 'de ni rdo rje phreng ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the reality of the meditative stabilization of the Vajra Rosary.

original: 'ching ba zhes bya ba ni rgyan la bya la gang gi phyir rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur kyang steng kho nar me tog gi phreng ba 'ching bar byed de /
analyzed: 'ching ba zhes bya ba ni rgyan la bya la gang gi phyir rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur kyang steng kho nar me tog gi phreng ba 'ching bar byed de /
translated: Binding is to be taken as ornament, since one is adorned with all ornaments, but one binds a flower garland on top of them.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: phreng ba lta bur 'ching ba med //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: phreng ba lta bur 'ching ba med // ces gsungs so //
translated: there is no binding like a garland.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: phreng ba dang 'dra ba 'di rgyan gyi nang na yod pa'i ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phreng ba dang 'dra ba 'di rgyan gyi nang na yod pa'i ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is not like a garland that is among the ornaments.

original: bud med 'dod pas 'gro dbang byed //
analyzed: bud med 'dod pas 'gro dbang byed //
translated: One is empowered to go for the sake of women.

original: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje dbang gi cho ga'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje dbang gi cho ga'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the reality of the meditative stabilization of the rite of the Vajra Empowerment.

original: bud med 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi rgyu yin pas 'dod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bud med 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi rgyu yin pas 'dod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Since for the sake of women is a cause of passion, it is called sake.

original: de bas na skyed bo 'dod chags dang ma bral ba thams cad @17a * //
analyzed: de bas na skyed bo 'dod chags dang ma bral ba thams cad @17a * //
translated: Therefore, all beings who are not free from passion

original: dbang du byed pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dbang du byed pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: are the seal of subjugation.

original: brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan 'pham mo //
analyzed: brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan 'pham mo //
translated: By mere steadfastness, one conquers others.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the reality of the vajra-victory concentration.

original: don thams cad la gnod pa nye bar gnas su zin kyang gang bag cha ba med pa de ni bstan pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: don thams cad la gnod pa nye bar gnas su zin kyang gang bag cha ba med pa de ni bstan pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Even when all the aims are present, one who is not agitated is said to be steadfast.

original: bstan pa des don thams cad sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: bstan pa des don thams cad sgrub par byed de /
translated: By that steadfastness, one accomplishes all the aims.

original: dgos pa sgrub la mkhas rnams sran thub pas //
analyzed: dgos pa sgrub la mkhas rnams sran thub pas //
translated: The wise who are skilled in accomplishing the aims,

original: dka' ba rnams kyang dka' ba med par rgal //
analyzed: dka' ba rnams kyang dka' ba med par rgal //
translated: by their steadfastness, overcome what is difficult without difficulty.

original: zhes ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: As it is said.

original: 'tshog pa chad pa'i mchog yin te //
analyzed: 'tshog pa chad pa'i mchog yin te //
translated: The best punishment is cutting off the life.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje gtum po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje gtum po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the reality of the vajra-fury concentration.

original: nyes pa can rnams la 'tshogs pa ni mtshon dang dbyug pa la sogs pas lus la bsnun par byed pa ste 'di las 'da' ba'i chad pa med pas na 'tshog pa chad pa'i mchog yin zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: nyes pa can rnams la 'tshogs pa ni mtshon dang dbyug pa la sogs pas lus la bsnun par byed pa ste 'di las 'da' ba'i chad pa med pas na 'tshog pa chad pa'i mchog yin zhes gsungs so //
translated: Punishment of the guilty is striking the body with weapons, clubs, and so on. Since there is no punishment beyond that, it is said to be the best punishment.

original: reg pa rnams ni rlung gi'o //
analyzed: reg pa rnams ni rlung gi'o //
translated: The tactile sensations are of the wind.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni rje rlung gi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni rje rlung gi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the reality of the concentration on the wind.

original: bkur ba dang / mnye ba dang / bsku ba la sogs pa'i reg pa'i rgyu'i bye brag gang yang rung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na reg pa ni rgyu'i mchog yin no //
analyzed: bkur ba dang / mnye ba dang / bsku ba la sogs pa'i reg pa'i rgyu'i bye brag gang yang rung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na reg pa ni rgyu'i mchog yin no //
translated: Among all the various causes of tactile sensations, such as respect, massage, anointing, etc., the wind is the most important cause.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: rlung gi'o zhes bya ba ste rlung nyid do //
analyzed: rlung gi'o zhes bya ba ste rlung nyid do //
translated: The tactile sensations are of the wind.

original: de bas na lus la rlung lnga gnas te /
analyzed: de bas na lus la rlung lnga gnas te /
translated: Therefore, five winds are located in the body:

original: gyen du rgyu ba dang / thur du sel bas dang / me dang mnyam du gnas pa dang / khyab byed dang / srog ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gyen du rgyu ba dang / thur du sel bas dang / me dang mnyam du gnas pa dang / khyab byed dang / srog ces bya ba'o //
translated: the upward moving wind, the downward moving wind, the fire-accompanying wind, the pervading wind, and the life-sustaining wind.

original: de rnams kyi reg pa'i khyad par gyis lus 'di bzung bas na 'ching bar mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de rnams kyi reg pa'i khyad par gyis lus 'di bzung bas na 'ching bar mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: Since this body is sustained by the special tactile sensations of these winds, it is not bound and does not decay.

original: rul bar yang mi 'gyur la reg pa'i khyad par gzhan yang myong bar byed de /
analyzed: rul bar yang mi 'gyur la reg pa'i khyad par gzhan yang myong bar byed de /
translated: Moreover, it experiences other special tactile sensations.

original: de lta bas na reg pa rnams ni rlung gi'o zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de lta bas na reg pa rnams ni rlung gi'o zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, the tactile sensations are of the wind.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The best is a remainder of the words.🔽The best of the givers is the one with splendor.

original: gzi brjid can ni byin ba'i mchog / ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje me'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /🔽'jig rten gzi brjid can du mthong ba'am /
analyzed: gzi brjid can ni byin ba'i mchog / ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje me'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de / 'jig rten gzi brjid can du mthong ba'am /
translated: This is the reality of the vajra fire meditative stabilization.

original: thos pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na byin za ni mchog ste /
analyzed: thos pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na byin za ni mchog ste /
translated: Among all those who are seen or heard in the world as having splendor, the one with splendor is the best.

original: byin za zhes bya ba ni me la bya'o //
analyzed: byin za zhes bya ba ni me la bya'o //
translated: The one with splendor is fire.

original: ji ltar mchog yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar mchog yin zhe na /
translated: How is he the best?

original: gang gi phyir bskal ba thams ca sreg pa la 'jug pa la ni 'jig rten tham cad mes khyab par byed pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa'i gzi can gang yang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bskal ba thams ca sreg pa la 'jug pa la ni 'jig rten tham cad mes khyab par byed pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa'i gzi can gang yang mi dmigs te /
translated: Because when he engages in burning up the entire world, the entire world is pervaded by fire.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: gzi brjid can ni byin za'i mchog / ces gsungs so //
analyzed: gzi brjid can ni byin za'i mchog / ces gsungs so //
translated: the best of the givers is the one with splendor.🔽The best of foods is blood.

original: zas rnams @17b kyi nang na khrag dam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje 'jigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: zas rnams @17b kyi nang na khrag dam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje 'jigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the reality of the vajra fear meditative stabilization.

original: 'jig rten 'di na kham gyi zas su gtogs pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad khrag tu rde pa 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di na kham gyi zas su gtogs pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad khrag tu rde pa 'gyur na /
translated: Whatever there is in this world that is included in the category of gross food, all of that is blood for him.

original: lus la phan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: lus la phan par 'gyur te /
translated: It is beneficial to the body.

original: gnas skabs lnga yang thob par byed do //
analyzed: gnas skabs lnga yang thob par byed do //
translated: It also causes the attainment of the five states.

original: gang yang khrag nyid zos pa de la gnas skabs de bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes mdo las bshad de /
analyzed: gang yang khrag nyid zos pa de la gnas skabs de bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes mdo las bshad de /
translated: Whatever blood he eats, he attains those states.

original: de bas na zas rnams kyi nang na khrag dam pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bas na zas rnams kyi nang na khrag dam pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Therefore, blood is the best of foods.

original: mche ba dag par zhugs pa ste //
analyzed: mche ba dag par zhugs pa ste //
translated: He is engaged in the pure fangs.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje phag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de mche ba dag pa ni rno ba dang sra ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje phag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de mche ba dag pa ni rno ba dang sra ba'o //
translated: This is the reality of the vajra sow samādhi. The pure fangs are sharp and strong.🔽Whatever is to be pierced, that is certainly pierced and penetrated by him who has these two.

original: gang la 'di gnyis yod par gyur ba de ni dbug par bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de gdon mi za bar phug ste 'jug pas de'i phyir /🔽mche ba dag pas zhugs pa ste //
analyzed: gang la 'di gnyis yod par gyur ba de ni dbug par bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de gdon mi za bar phug ste 'jug pas de'i phyir / mche ba dag pas zhugs pa ste //
translated: Therefore,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: he is engaged in the pure fangs.

original: 'chi bdag thams cad gnas na 'dug / ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje dus kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de gang gi phyir //
analyzed: 'chi bdag thams cad gnas na 'dug / ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje dus kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de gang gi phyir //
translated: This is the reality of the vajra time samadhi.

original: 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma //
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma //
translated: All formations are momentary.

original: mi gnas bya ba gang la yod //
analyzed: mi gnas bya ba gang la yod //
translated: What is it that does not remain?

original: 'di dag 'byung ba de nyid ni //🔽bya ba thams cad byed por brjod //
analyzed: 'di dag 'byung ba de nyid ni // bya ba thams cad byed por brjod //
translated: The very arising of these

original: ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ste /
translated: is said to be the agent of all actions.

original: de bas na 'chi bdag thams cad gnas na 'dug ces gsungs so //
analyzed: de bas na 'chi bdag thams cad gnas na 'dug ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said that all the lords of death are present in the place.

original: 'di skad ston ti /
analyzed: 'di skad ston ti /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: 'dus byas kyi dngos po thams cad ni skad cig ma re re zhing yang skye ba dang 'chi ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi dngos po thams cad ni skad cig ma re re zhing yang skye ba dang 'chi ba yin no //
translated: All conditioned things are born and die in every moment.

original: 'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med //
analyzed: 'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med //
translated: There is no obstacle greater than fear.

original: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the reality of the vajra obstacle-removing samadhi.

original: 'jig rten na bsam pa'i don bsgrub pa la bar du gcod par 'gyur ba gang ji snyed yod pa de rnams la bgegs su gyur pa la ni bgegs zhes grags la /
analyzed: 'jig rten na bsam pa'i don bsgrub pa la bar du gcod par 'gyur ba gang ji snyed yod pa de rnams la bgegs su gyur pa la ni bgegs zhes grags la /
translated: Whatever obstacles there are in the world that obstruct the accomplishment of one's intended purpose, they are known as obstacles.

original: lha dang mi'i bgegs su nye bar bsdus pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na sgrub pa po'i snying stobs nyams pa gang yin pa de la ni 'jigs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lha dang mi'i bgegs su nye bar bsdus pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na sgrub pa po'i snying stobs nyams pa gang yin pa de la ni 'jigs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Whatever obstacles there are, whether of gods or humans, among all of them, the weakening of the courage of the practitioner is called “fear.”

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: 'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med //
analyzed: 'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med //
translated: there is no obstacle greater than fear.

original: ces gsungs te /
analyzed: ces gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: gang gi phyir snying stobs dang ldan pa'i skyes bus ni bgegs stong phrag yod na yang de pham par byas nas bsam pa'i don sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir snying stobs dang ldan pa'i skyes bus ni bgegs stong phrag yod na yang de pham par byas nas bsam pa'i don sgrub par byed de /
translated: Because a courageous person, even if there are a thousand obstacles, having defeated them, accomplishes the intended purpose.

original: dper na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud stobs dang bcas pa rnams pham par mdzad nas byang chub thugs su chud par mdzad pa lta bu'o //🔽chu las lhag @18a * //
analyzed: dper na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud stobs dang bcas pa rnams pham par mdzad nas byang chub thugs su chud par mdzad pa lta bu'o // chu las lhag @18a * //
translated: For example, the Blessed One, having defeated the powerful Māra, realized enlightenment.

original: pa'i ro gzhan med //
analyzed: pa'i ro gzhan med //
translated: There is no taste greater than water.

original: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje glu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje glu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the reality of the vajra song samādhi.

original: ro'i khyad par gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi rang gi mthu yul dang dus kyis gnas ba rnams rang rang gi snying stobs kyis gnas su zin kyang gnas skabs thams cad du chus 'tsho ba /
analyzed: ro'i khyad par gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi rang gi mthu yul dang dus kyis gnas ba rnams rang rang gi snying stobs kyis gnas su zin kyang gnas skabs thams cad du chus 'tsho ba /
translated: Whatever special tastes there are, all of them, by the power of each one's sattva, are present in their own places, in their own times.🔽Even though they are present in their own places, they are able to hold the life of all of them, as if they were holding water.

original: 'dzin pa ltar de dag gi srog 'dzin par nus te de'i phyir srog 'dzin cing ngoms par byed pa'i sgo nas /🔽chu las lhag pa'i ro gzhan med //
analyzed: 'dzin pa ltar de dag gi srog 'dzin par nus te de'i phyir srog 'dzin cing ngoms par byed pa'i sgo nas / chu las lhag pa'i ro gzhan med //
translated: Therefore, because they hold life and satisfy,

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: there is no taste greater than water.🔽One should practice all of those, and whatever else is appropriate.

original: de lta bud dag thams cad la 'ga' zhing slob par byed pa gang bzlos kyang rung ste rnal 'byor ba de dag la gnas par byas nas de'i sngags zlos shing chos nyid 'di dag bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bud dag thams cad la 'ga' zhing slob par byed pa gang bzlos kyang rung ste rnal 'byor ba de dag la gnas par byas nas de'i sngags zlos shing chos nyid 'di dag bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Having practiced those yogas, one should recite their mantras and meditate on this reality.

original: bsgoms nas kyang rang rang gi yul la sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas par sbyar ba byas na de las mngon par bsam pa'i don 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgoms nas kyang rang rang gi yul la sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas par sbyar ba byas na de las mngon par bsam pa'i don 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having meditated, if one applies them to one's own object, together with the mantra and the seal, the desired goal will be accomplished.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the Dharma maṇḍala of all vajra families from the Great King of Yogin’s Tantras, the Compendium of Truths of All Tathāgatas.

original: // / de ta bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje rig pa dam pa btul zhing byang chub kyi lam la bzhag pas des dpal phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gar gyi tshogs mchod par byed pa ni
analyzed: // / de ta bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje rig pa dam pa btul zhing byang chub kyi lam la bzhag pas des dpal phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gar gyi tshogs mchod par byed pa ni
translated: The Blessed Vajrapāṇi subdued the excellent knowledge vajra and established it on the path to awakening. Therefore, he made an offering of dance to the glorious Vajrapāṇi and the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
translated: This is taught by “then,” and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs la ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs la ste /
translated: “Then” means immediately after that.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes thogs la las kyi dkyil 'khor ston to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes thogs la las kyi dkyil 'khor ston to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that after the Dharma maṇḍala, the action maṇḍala is taught.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o //
translated: “Again” refers to the Dharma maṇḍala.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: “The Blessed One” has been explained.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
translated: Since he is the Tathagata and also all, he is all the Tathagatas.

original: de dag gi las ni gdul bya'i sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag gi las ni gdul bya'i sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir /
translated: Their activity is for the sake of the sentient beings to be tamed, out of compassion.

original: mthong ba dang mchod pa'i las ltar yod pa rnams so //
analyzed: mthong ba dang mchod pa'i las ltar yod pa rnams so //
translated: It is like the activity of seeing and worshiping those who exist.

original: de'i dam tshig ni phyag rgya la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni phyag rgya la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Their pledge is the seals, etc.

original: 'di 'byung ba ni bsam pa'i khyad par gang las skye ba ste /
analyzed: 'di 'byung ba ni bsam pa'i khyad par gang las skye ba ste /
translated: This arising is the special thought from which it arises.

original: de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir mi phyed pas rdo rje lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang don dang mthun pa'i ming 'di nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
analyzed: de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir mi phyed pas rdo rje lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang don dang mthun pa'i ming 'di nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
translated: In order to bless that, he entered the samadhi called Vajra-like, which is undifferentiated, and which is the samadhi that is consistent with the meaning of this very name.

original: rang gi rig pa dam pa thugs la gnas pa 'di gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi rig pa dam pa thugs la gnas pa 'di gsungs pa'o //
translated: He spoke this, which is the supreme knowledge that abides in his mind.

original: lhag ma rnams @18b ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams @18b ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.🔽Then Vajrapani, etc.

original: de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste /
analyzed: de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste /
translated: Then means immediately after.

original: sngags bstan pa'i rjes thogs la dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngags bstan pa'i rjes thogs la dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that after teaching the mantra, he explained the rite of drawing the maṇḍala.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo la ltos pa'o //
translated: “Again” refers to the Dharma wheel.

original: rdo rje rig thams cad ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad de /
analyzed: rdo rje rig thams cad ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad de /
translated: “All vajra knowledge” means all mundane and supramundane [knowledge].

original: rdo rje'i rigs de dag thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thugs la gnas pa 'di gsungs so zhes pa ste de bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽rdo rje dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs de dag thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thugs la gnas pa 'di gsungs so zhes pa ste de bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i don to // rdo rje dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni //
translated: He taught this, the maṇḍala of all those vajra families abiding in his mind. The meaning is that he spoke this.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur ro ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur ro ;
translated: “By the method of the vajra maṇḍala” means like the maṇḍala of Trailokyavijaya.

original: / dkyil 'khor thams cad ces ji skad smos su zin kyang /
analyzed: / dkyil 'khor thams cad ces ji skad smos su zin kyang /
translated: Although it is said “all maṇḍalas,”

original: 'dir phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //🔽dkyil 'khor mchog ni thams cad du //
analyzed: 'dir phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor nyid yin par blta bar bya'o // dkyil 'khor mchog ni thams cad du //
translated: here one should view it as the outer maṇḍala.

original: zhes byas ba la dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo //
analyzed: zhes byas ba la dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo //
translated: “The supreme maṇḍala in all ways” means the supreme maṇḍala is the principal maṇḍala.

original: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi na gnas pa gang yin pa rnams so //
analyzed: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi na gnas pa gang yin pa rnams so //
translated: Everywhere means those who abide in the four directions.

original: de ji lta bur zhe na /🔽de'i phyir / sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs par bya //
analyzed: de ji lta bur zhe na / de'i phyir / sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs par bya //
translated: How is that?🔽Therefore, it is said:

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The Buddha should be placed in the middle.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa bzhi po de dag gi khongs su 'dus pa nyid de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa bzhi po de dag gi khongs su 'dus pa nyid de /
translated: Bhagavat Vairocana is included among those four, Akṣobhya and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yin bas na don dam par de dag las tham mi dad pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de rnams kyi chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yin bas na don dam par de dag las tham mi dad pa'i phyir //
translated: Because he is the nature of their dharmakāya, ultimately he is not different from them.

original: de dag kyang de'i khongs su gtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag kyang de'i khongs su gtogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are included in him.

original: gnas bzhi po dag tu rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas kyi sngags gcig 'byung ba des 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba rnams rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs su dgod par bya'i /
analyzed: gnas bzhi po dag tu rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas kyi sngags gcig 'byung ba des 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba rnams rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs su dgod par bya'i /
translated: In the four abodes, the mantra of the abode of Vairocana occurs once. By that, here the Tathāgatas who appear should be placed in the form of Vajrahūṃkāra.

original: gar ston pa'i tshul dang mi mthun pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gar ston pa'i tshul dang mi mthun pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: But not by the way of the Tathāgatas, because that is not the way of the teacher.

original: de dag ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi bo rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi bo rnams kyi'o //
translated: Those refers to the four Tathagatas.

original: ji lta zhe na /🔽phyogs ni rim par yang /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na / phyogs ni rim par yang /
translated: How?

original: sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhag go //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhag go // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The great beings are to be placed in the directions,🔽in order.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i phyogs re rer yang byang chub sems dpa' gnyis gnyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i sngags kyis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i phyogs re rer yang byang chub sems dpa' gnyis gnyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i sngags kyis bri bar bya'o //
translated: In each direction of each Tathagata, two Bodhisattvas are to be written in the mandala of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds, with the mantras as taught.

original: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de lta bu'i dbus te /
analyzed: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de lta bu'i dbus te /
translated: In the middle of that means in the middle of such a mandala of Buddhas and Bodhisattvas with their retinues.

original: dbus @19a * //
analyzed: dbus @19a * //
translated: In the middle

original: ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su rdo rje rig pa dam pa nyid chung ma dang bcas ba gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su rdo rje rig pa dam pa nyid chung ma dang bcas ba gzhag par bya'o //
translated: of the middle mandala, in the place of Vairocana, the sublime knowledge of the vajra, together with his wife, is to be placed.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor te yang rnam par gnyis su phye la /
analyzed: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor te yang rnam par gnyis su phye la /
translated: The middle mandala is also divided into two parts.

original: nang gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje rig pa dam pa chung ma dang bcas par gzhag cing ;
analyzed: nang gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje rig pa dam pa chung ma dang bcas par gzhag cing ;
translated: In the inner maṇḍala, one should place the excellent vajra knowledge together with his wife,

original: rdo rje rig pa dam pa de nyid la sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rig pa dam pa de nyid la sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
translated: and that very excellent vajra knowledge should be worshipped with the secret offerings of the dancing girl and so forth.

original: dkyil 'khor dbus ma 'di nyid kyi mtshams bzhir sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dbus ma 'di nyid kyi mtshams bzhir sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that in the four directions of this very central maṇḍala, one should draw the four beginning with the dancing girl.

original: 'di dag kyang rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags 'di nas smos pa de dag nyid kyis dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag kyang rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags 'di nas smos pa de dag nyid kyis dgod par bya'o //
translated: And these should be arranged with just those mantras of Vajrahūṃkāra and so forth mentioned here.

original: de'i zhes bya ba nang gi dkyil 'khor de'i phyi rol rim pa gnyis par lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba nang gi dkyil 'khor de'i phyi rol rim pa gnyis par lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o //
translated: The there refers to the outer second tier of the inner maṇḍala, where the goddesses should be drawn.

original: ji lta bri bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bri bar bya zhe na /
translated: How should they be drawn?

original: de'i phyir go rims bzhin /
analyzed: de'i phyir go rims bzhin /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: 'khor lo dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'khor lo dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In accordance with the wheel maṇḍala.

original: go rims ni 'dir bshad pa'i rim pa'i go rims kyis gang thog mar smos pa rnams kyang de'i rim bzhin du bya ba ste /
analyzed: go rims ni 'dir bshad pa'i rim pa'i go rims kyis gang thog mar smos pa rnams kyang de'i rim bzhin du bya ba ste /
translated: The order is the order of the explanation here. Those mentioned first are to be done in that order.

original: go rims kyi tshul 'dis 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: go rims kyi tshul 'dis 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By this method of order, the wheel maṇḍala in the proper way is said.

original: 'khor lo ni chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel is the wheel of Dharma.

original: de'i tshul dang mthun par byas pa'i dkyil 'khor yin pas 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i tshul dang mthun par byas pa'i dkyil 'khor yin pas 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The maṇḍala is the maṇḍala that is made in accordance with its method.

original: de yang 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo kun nas zlum por bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de yang 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo kun nas zlum por bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is also the maṇḍala of the three worlds, which is to be made completely round.

original: rdo rje rig pa dam pa kun nas bskor zhing gar byed par bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rig pa dam pa kun nas bskor zhing gar byed par bri bar bya'o //
translated: Surrounded by the excellent vajra knowledge, dancing, is to be drawn.

original: ji ltar gar byed pa zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gar byed pa zhe na /
translated: How does one dance?

original: rang gi phyag rgya'i lan / gar byed par ni bri bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi phyag rgya'i lan / gar byed par ni bri bar bya // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: One should draw dancing in response to one's own seal.

original: gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du rang gi phyag rgyar gang bshad pa de ni de'i rang gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du rang gi phyag rgyar gang bshad pa de ni de'i rang gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: In the maṇḍala of form, whatever is explained as one's own seal is one's own seal there.

original: gang dang gang cings pa de dang de la gnyen por gyur pa de ni lan gyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: gang dang gang cings pa de dang de la gnyen por gyur pa de ni lan gyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The response seal is that which is the antidote to whatever is sealed by whatever.🔽For example, the response seal is the water seal that is the antidote to the blazing fire seal.🔽For example, the response seal is the seal of Indra's parasol that is the antidote to the seal of the wrathful vajra nectar that cuts everything.

original: dper na me'i phyag rgya 'bar ba la chu'i phyag rgya gnyen por gyur pa de ni de'i lan gyi phyag rgya yin pa lta bu dang / dper na rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bo'i phyag rgya kun nas gtub par byed pa de la brgya byin gyi gdugs kyi phyag rgya de'i gnyen por gyur pa lta bu de ni lan gyi phyag rgya ste de lta bu la sogs pa'i tshul du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dper na me'i phyag rgya 'bar ba la chu'i phyag rgya gnyen por gyur pa de ni de'i lan gyi phyag rgya yin pa lta bu dang / dper na rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bo'i phyag rgya kun nas gtub par byed pa de la brgya byin gyi gdugs kyi phyag rgya de'i gnyen por gyur pa lta bu de ni lan gyi phyag rgya ste de lta bu la sogs pa'i tshul du rig par bya'o //
translated: One should understand it in this way and so forth.

original: de ltar bya ba de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar bya ba de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why do that?

original: mchod phyir zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: mchod phyir zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: It is said, for the sake of worship.

original: su zhig la zhe na /
analyzed: su zhig la zhe na /
translated: To whom?

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje can zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje can zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, to the buddhas and the vajra holders.

original: sangs rgyas @19b ni bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas @19b ni bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The buddhas are the Bhagavans.

original: rdo rje can ni rdo rje 'dzin te /
analyzed: rdo rje can ni rdo rje 'dzin te /
translated: The vajra holders are the vajra holders.

original: gang gi phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs su bzhugs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs su bzhugs te /
translated: Because Vajradhara himself abides in the form of all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas,

original: de bas na sangs rgyas rdo rje can zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de bas na sangs rgyas rdo rje can zhes gsungs so //
translated: therefore he is called the Buddha Vajrin.

original: de dag gi sbyor bas she na /
analyzed: de dag gi sbyor bas she na /
translated: By their union?

original: rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis so zhes bya ba ni bstan zin te /
analyzed: rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis so zhes bya ba ni bstan zin te /
translated: By the method of Vajra dance, as has been taught.

original: lag pa gnyis mdzes par bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis mdzes par bsgyur ba'o //
translated: It is the beautiful movement of the two hands.

original: grva rnams su ni bdug pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: grva rnams su ni bdug pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the corners are the incense and so forth.

original: sgo'i phyogs rnams su ni rdo rje lcags khyu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgo'i phyogs rnams su ni rdo rje lcags khyu la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the door directions are the Vajra hook and so forth.
