original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste bris pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste bris pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: Then, after that, immediately, after the drawing.

original: dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas zhes bya ba ni dgug pa zhes smos su zin gyis kyang 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don tsam du blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas zhes bya ba ni dgug pa zhes smos su zin gyis kyang 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don tsam du blta bar bya ste /
translated: Having performed the actions of summoning and so forth, although summoning is mentioned, this should be seen as merely an illustration.

original: 'dzugs pa dang bka' nod pa la sogs pa slob dpon gyi las rnams kyang 'dir bya dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dzugs pa dang bka' nod pa la sogs pa slob dpon gyi las rnams kyang 'dir bya dgos pa yin no //
translated: The actions of the master, such as binding, giving instructions, and so forth, should also be performed here.

original: dgug pa la sogs pa zhes sogs pa ni gzhug pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: dgug pa la sogs pa zhes sogs pa ni gzhug pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The etc. in summoning, etc. includes entering, etc.

original: rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Having bound the pledge seal of the action of holding the vajra just as it is means just as it is characterized.

original: khyod kyis lha'i rigs sma mthong ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de'i 'og tu dam tshig sbyin par bya ba ste /
analyzed: khyod kyis lha'i rigs sma mthong ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de'i 'og tu dam tshig sbyin par bya ba ste /
translated: Having seen the family of deities, etc., etc., is the pledge to be given after that.

original: lha'i rigs ma mthong ba ni dkyil 'khor dam pa ma mthong ba'o //
analyzed: lha'i rigs ma mthong ba ni dkyil 'khor dam pa ma mthong ba'o //
translated: Not having seen the family of deities means not having seen the excellent mandala.

original: gal te dkyil 'khor dam pa mthong ba yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: gal te dkyil 'khor dam pa mthong ba yin du zin kyang /
translated: Even if one has seen the excellent mandala,

original: ci zhig lta tshon rtsi nyi tshe tsam las ma mthong ba yang srid pas /
analyzed: ci zhig lta tshon rtsi nyi tshe tsam las ma mthong ba yang srid pas /
translated: it is possible that one has seen only a part of the colors,

original: de las khyad par du bya ba'i phyir las mi shes pa su la yang zhes bya ba gsung ste /
analyzed: de las khyad par du bya ba'i phyir las mi shes pa su la yang zhes bya ba gsung ste /
translated: and so in order to distinguish that, it is said, To anyone who does not know the action.

original: dkyil 'khor 'dir ji skad bstan pa'i las rnams gang gi mi shes pa de ni las mi shes pa ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'dir ji skad bstan pa'i las rnams gang gi mi shes pa de ni las mi shes pa ste /
translated: One who does not know the actions as they are taught in this mandala is one who does not know the action.

original: de lta bu'i las mi shes pa de la khyod kyis bstan par mi bya'o zhes pa'i don to /
analyzed: de lta bu'i las mi shes pa de la khyod kyis bstan par mi bya'o zhes pa'i don to /
translated: The meaning is that you should not teach that sort of action to one who does not know it.

original: gsangs bar bya ba'i las ni gsangs ba'i las te /
analyzed: gsangs bar bya ba'i las ni gsangs ba'i las te /
translated: Secret action is the action of the secret.

original: rig pa dam pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas na 'dug pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pa gar byed par ston pa dang / de las yang gsangs ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba dang ; sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rol mo par ston pa 'di dag ni gsangs ba'i las yin te /
analyzed: rig pa dam pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas na 'dug pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pa gar byed par ston pa dang / de las yang gsangs ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba dang ; sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rol mo par ston pa 'di dag ni gsangs ba'i las yin te /
translated: The secret action is the display of the abode of the sublime knowledge Vairocana, the display of the dance with the retinue, the offering of the secret worship from that, and the display of the buddhas and bodhisattvas as musicians.

original: gal te bstan par gyur pas /
analyzed: gal te bstan par gyur pas /
translated: If you teach this,

original: khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya ba ste /
translated: you will violate your pledge.

original: dam tshig ni dam tshig las 'das pa'o //🔽nyams par gyur pa ni gzhir bar @20a * //
analyzed: dam tshig ni dam tshig las 'das pa'o // nyams par gyur pa ni gzhir bar @20a * //
translated: Pledge means not to transgress the pledge.

original: byed pa ste dus ma yin par 'chi ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa ste dus ma yin par 'chi ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Violation means to be the basis of untimely death and so forth.

original: smos la zhes bya ba ni dam tshig 'di bstan pa te /
analyzed: smos la zhes bya ba ni dam tshig 'di bstan pa te /
translated: The words “and so forth” indicate the teaching of this pledge.

original: las kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings nas bya'o //
analyzed: las kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings nas bya'o //
translated: One should do this in the karma maṇḍala, having formed the vajra-holder’s seal.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: slob dpon bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: slob dpon bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: The master himself forms the vajra-holder’s seal,

original: slob ma la de dbab pa'i phyir rang gi las kyi rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgya de ltar bstan cing khro bo'i lta bas kyang bltas la slob ma la 'di skad du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma la de dbab pa'i phyir rang gi las kyi rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgya de ltar bstan cing khro bo'i lta bas kyang bltas la slob ma la 'di skad du brjod par bya'o //
translated: and in order to cause the disciple to descend, he displays that seal of his own karma-vajra-holder, and also looks with the wrathful gaze, and he should say to the disciple,

original: de ltar phyag rgya bcings la lta ba'i phyag rgya yang gtod cing sngags kyang brjod na /
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya bcings la lta ba'i phyag rgya yang gtod cing sngags kyang brjod na /
translated: “In this way, having formed the seal and also having given the seal of the gaze, and having uttered the mantra,

original: sleb ma de la babs te bdag nyid kyis 'jug ste zhes bya bar sbyar ro ;
analyzed: sleb ma de la babs te bdag nyid kyis 'jug ste zhes bya bar sbyar ro ;
translated: the descent will descend upon that disciple, and it will enter himself.”

original: / zhugs nas ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: / zhugs nas ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: Having entered, what should one do?

original: phyag rgya dang lan gyi phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so /
analyzed: phyag rgya dang lan gyi phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so /
translated: He says, “One should worship with the dance worship of the seals and the answering seals.”

original: de ltar babs te bdag nyid dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang / gar gyi mchod pa byed pa la phan yon ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: de ltar babs te bdag nyid dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang / gar gyi mchod pa byed pa la phan yon ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: What is the benefit of entering the maṇḍala in that way and performing the offering of dance?

original: de phyin chad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de phyin chad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The Bhagavān says, From then on, and so forth.

original: de phyin chad ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa nas brtsams te'o //
analyzed: de phyin chad ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa nas brtsams te'o //
translated: From then on means from the time of entering the maṇḍala.

original: las thams cad ces bya ba ni las phran tshegs rnams so //
analyzed: las thams cad ces bya ba ni las phran tshegs rnams so //
translated: All activities are the minor activities.

original: gang gis las thams cad byed ce na /🔽lus dang ngag dang lta ba dang // yid dang rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams //
analyzed: gang gis las thams cad byed ce na / lus dang ngag dang lta ba dang // yid dang rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams //
translated: By what does one perform all activities?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so ;
translated: The Bhagavān says, The body, speech, view, and mind vajra-seals, and so forth.

original: / de la rdo rje'i sgra ni re re zhing sbyar dgos te /
analyzed: / de la rdo rje'i sgra ni re re zhing sbyar dgos te /
translated: The word vajra should be applied to each of those:

original: lus rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang / ngag rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang / lta ba rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang / yid rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyis so //
analyzed: lus rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang / ngag rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang / lta ba rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang / yid rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyis so //
translated: the body vajra-seal, the speech vajra-seal, the view vajra-seal, and the mind vajra-seal.

original: 'dod pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bsams ba tsam gyis byed ba ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bsams ba tsam gyis byed ba ste /
translated: As one wishes means that one performs by mere intention.

original: las 'di la phyi bshol med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi //
analyzed: las 'di la phyi bshol med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi //
translated: The meaning is that one should not delay in this action.🔽One should make the supreme commitments of the Buddhas,

original: dam tshig mchog ni gnyis bya ste /
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ni gnyis bya ste /
translated: Vajradhara, and so on,

original: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por ji skad gsungs pa de dag nyid rdo rje gar byas nas bcings te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por ji skad gsungs pa de dag nyid rdo rje gar byas nas bcings te /
translated: The supreme commitments of the Blessed Buddhas and the Bodhisattvas are the commitment seals as they are taught in the mandala of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds.

original: gnyis su byas la yang gar byed pa'i tshul gyis mchod par bya ba'i phyir de la dbul zhing bstabs par bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis su byas la yang gar byed pa'i tshul gyis mchod par bya ba'i phyir de la dbul zhing bstabs par bya'o //
translated: Having made the vajra dance with them, one should form them into two, and in order to worship with the manner of dancing, one should offer them and present them to him.

original: rdo rje l'a sya sogs mchod pa //
analyzed: rdo rje l'a sya sogs mchod pa //
translated: One should worship with Vajralasya and so on,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du rdo rje sgeg mo la @20b sogs pa phyag rgyar bstan pa gang yin pa de dag nyid gar gyi cho gas bcings la rdo rje rig pa dam pa la dbul bar bya'o
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du rdo rje sgeg mo la @20b sogs pa phyag rgyar bstan pa gang yin pa de dag nyid gar gyi cho gas bcings la rdo rje rig pa dam pa la dbul bar bya'o
translated: This is the same mandala of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds, and those who have been taught to be the consorts of Vajra Lady Grace, etc., should be bound by the rite of dance and offered to the sublime knowledge of the vajra.

original: // rig pa 'di rnam thams cad kyang //
analyzed: // rig pa 'di rnam thams cad kyang //
translated: All of these knowledges,

original: zhes bya ba ni gang 'dir bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de rnams ni rig pa zhes smos pa 'dis gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang 'dir bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de rnams ni rig pa zhes smos pa 'dis gzung bar bya'o //
translated: this refers to those who have been taught to be the consorts of incense, etc., and those who are worldly goddesses, and they should be taken by this mention of “knowledge.”🔽And all of those knowledges, in the proper order,

original: rig pa de dag thams cad kyang lhag 'og go rims bzhin du zhes bya ba der bshad pa'i go rims kyis so //
analyzed: rig pa de dag thams cad kyang lhag 'og go rims bzhin du zhes bya ba der bshad pa'i go rims kyis so //
translated: this is the order explained there.🔽Just as they are,

original: ji bzhin du zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du'o //🔽gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis //
analyzed: ji bzhin du zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du'o // gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis //
translated: means just as their characteristics are.🔽By the seal of dance offering,

original: zhes bya ba ni rod rje gar byas nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rod rje gar byas nas /
translated: means having danced with the vajra.

original: 'di dag gi phyag rgya bcing ba byas la phyag rgya bcings pa de phyung ba 'dis las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag gi phyag rgya bcing ba byas la phyag rgya bcings pa de phyung ba 'dis las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par byas pa yin no //
translated: Having made these gestures, one should worship the mandala of action with this gesture.

original: bdug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i rig pa rnams kyis ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa rnams yin par blta bar bya'o //🔽de lta rim pa de dag thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pas las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o /
analyzed: bdug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i rig pa rnams kyis ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa rnams yin par blta bar bya'o // de lta rim pa de dag thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pas las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o /
translated: The gestures of incense and so forth are to be regarded as taught in the mandala of the Three Worlds, and those of the worldly knowledge goddesses are to be regarded as taught in the mandala of the Dhāraṇī of the Three Worlds.🔽Thus, one should worship the mandala of action with the dance offering of all those stages.

original: lha mo de dag thams cad nyid kyi rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni phyag rgya chun po mdor bsdus so zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: lha mo de dag thams cad nyid kyi rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni phyag rgya chun po mdor bsdus so zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: All those goddesses are the collection of the gestures of the vajra dance.

original: rdo rje gar byas la 'di dag thams cad kyi rang rang gi phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus nas bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje gar byas la 'di dag thams cad kyi rang rang gi phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus nas bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: seals, each one individually.

original: dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas te //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas te //
translated: Having made the supreme commitment,

original: lan gyi phyag rgyas dgrol bar bya //
analyzed: lan gyi phyag rgyas dgrol bar bya //
translated: one should release with the response seal.🔽This is from the root maṇḍala of the Wheel of the Three

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las ;🔽rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las ; rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
translated: Worlds.🔽Having made the vajra binding,

original: g-yon pa rdo rje bcing bar bya //
analyzed: g-yon pa rdo rje bcing bar bya //
translated: one should bind the left vajra.

original: rdo rje khu tshu zhe bshad de //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshu zhe bshad de //
translated: This is explained as the vajra fist.

original: 'di ni rdo rje rig skun gyi'o /🔽rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje rig skun gyi'o / rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te //
translated: This is the vajra knowledge seal.🔽Having made that vajra

original: mtshan ma kun kyang des gzhag go //
analyzed: mtshan ma kun kyang des gzhag go //
translated: into two, one should place all the signs with that.

original: zhes ji skad bshad pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las kyang /🔽rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi //
analyzed: zhes ji skad bshad pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las kyang / rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi //
translated: And from the Dhāraṇī Maṇḍala:🔽For all of the vajra family,

original: g-yon pa rdo rje gtso bor 'dus //
analyzed: g-yon pa rdo rje gtso bor 'dus //
translated: the left vajra is the chief.

original: phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya //
analyzed: phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya //
translated: The binding of the seal is explained.

original: zhes bshad de las gnyis su byas pa'i g-yon pa'i rdo rje las /
analyzed: zhes bshad de las gnyis su byas pa'i g-yon pa'i rdo rje las /
translated: From the left vajra, which is made into two,

original: ma mo 'di dag thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'byung bas dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya 'di dag thams cad bcing bar bya'o /
analyzed: ma mo 'di dag thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'byung bas dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya 'di dag thams cad bcing bar bya'o /
translated: Since the mudras of all these Mothers arise, one should bind all these mudras of supreme commitment.

original: @21a * // ji lta bu zhe na na dam tshig mchog ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: @21a * // ji lta bu zhe na na dam tshig mchog ces bya ba ste /
translated: What is their nature? They are called “supreme commitment.”

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mchog bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mchog bsdus pa'o //
translated: The supreme vajra is held in the left hand.

original: ji ltar bcing zha na gnyis byas te zhes bya ba ste rdor je bcing ba gnyis su bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bcing zha na gnyis byas te zhes bya ba ste rdor je bcing ba gnyis su bya'o //
translated: How are they bound? “Having made two” means that one should make two vajra bonds.

original: de rnams ji ltar dgrol bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams ji ltar dgrol bar bya zhe na /
translated: How are they released?

original: de'i phyir lan gyi phyag rgyas dgrol bar bya zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir lan gyi phyag rgyas dgrol bar bya zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, “they are released by the response mudra.”

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: rdo rje gar byas nas rdo rje bcing bas bcings la rdo rje g-yon pa de btsir bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gar byas nas rdo rje bcing bas bcings la rdo rje g-yon pa de btsir bar bya'o //
translated: Having performed the vajra dance, bind with the vajra bond and press down with the left vajra.

original: de nas gnyis su byas pa'i rdo rje de las phyag rgya thams cad las re re zhing /
analyzed: de nas gnyis su byas pa'i rdo rje de las phyag rgya thams cad las re re zhing /
translated: Then, from those two vajras, all the mudras should be released one by one,

original: g-yon pa rdo rje mchog gis bsdus te bcing bar bya zhing /
analyzed: g-yon pa rdo rje mchog gis bsdus te bcing bar bya zhing /
translated: gathered by the supreme vajra in the left hand.

original: lan gyi phyag rgya mthong nas kyang dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: lan gyi phyag rgya mthong nas kyang dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: Having seen the response mudra, they should be released.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: rdo rje gar byas nas rdo rje bcing ba bcings te /
analyzed: rdo rje gar byas nas rdo rje bcing ba bcings te /
translated: Having performed the vajra dance, one should bind the vajra bond.

original: de ltar phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis slob dpon dang slob ma la dbab nas mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis slob dpon dang slob ma la dbab nas mchod par bya'o //
translated: In this way, having initiated the master and the disciples with these mudras, one should worship.

original: su zhig la zhe na /
analyzed: su zhig la zhe na /
translated: To whom?

original: gtso bo thams cad ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: gtso bo thams cad ces bya ba ste /
translated: The “all lords.”

original: gtso bo thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa dang / rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
analyzed: gtso bo thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa dang / rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
translated: All lords are the buddhas, Vajradhara, and so forth, and Vajrahumkara.

original: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens if one does this?

original: las grub par yang nges par 'gyur //
analyzed: las grub par yang nges par 'gyur //
translated: One will also be certain to accomplish the activities.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Everything will be accomplished.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the chapter on the activity maṇḍala of all the vajra families from the Great King of Yogin’s Tantras, the Compendium of the Principles of All Tathāgatas.

original: // / de ltar gdul dka' ba rnams btul zhing byang chub kyi sems la yang bkod de /
analyzed: // / de ltar gdul dka' ba rnams btul zhing byang chub kyi sems la yang bkod de /
translated: Thus, having subdued those difficult to subdue and also established them in the mind of enlightenment,

original: sems can rnams kyi don la nges par sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs de dag thams cad gsang ba'i don shes nas /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don la nges par sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs de dag thams cad gsang ba'i don shes nas /
translated: Having definitely applied himself to the welfare of sentient beings, the Lord Vajrapāṇi, having understood the secret meaning of all those vajra clans,

original: sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir man ngag la sbyar ba dang / gsang ba'i don rnams par spyad pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir man ngag la sbyar ba dang / gsang ba'i don rnams par spyad pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: in order to benefit sentient beings, applied the esoteric instructions, and in order to practice the secret meanings, he said “then” and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs 'dir phyag na rdo rjes so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs 'dir phyag na rdo rjes so //
translated: “ Then” means at this juncture, by Vajrapāṇi.

original: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad ces bya ba ni phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad ces bya ba ni phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams so //
translated: “ All vajra clans” means the outer vajra clans.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don du bskos nas zhes bya ba ni byed du bcug pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don du bskos nas zhes bya ba ni byed du bcug pa'o //
translated: “ Having appointed for the welfare of all sentient beings” means having made them act.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bzhag ste zhes bya ba ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon bskyed nas so //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bzhag ste zhes bya ba ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon bskyed nas so //
translated: “ Having established them in the irreversible stage” means having generated the seed of the irreversible stage.

original: mkhyen bzhin du zhes bya ba la ci zhig mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: mkhyen bzhin du zhes bya ba la ci zhig mkhyen ce na /
translated: “ Knowing” — what does he know?

original: gsang ba'i don te sems can rnams yid ches pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gsang ba'i don te sems can rnams yid ches pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: The secret meaning, in order to generate confidence in sentient beings.

original: bcom @21b ldan 'das kyi zhal nas gsang ba'i don mngon sum du thos te /
analyzed: bcom @21b ldan 'das kyi zhal nas gsang ba'i don mngon sum du thos te /
translated: The secret meaning was directly heard from the Bhagavān’s mouth.

original: de yongs su shes pas sems can rnams kyi don la zhugs kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams nas /
analyzed: de yongs su shes pas sems can rnams kyi don la zhugs kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams nas /
translated: Thinking, “Wouldn’t it be good if, by thoroughly understanding that, I could engage in benefiting sentient beings?”

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: he said this to the Bhagavān:

original: bdag gsang ba thams cad 'dzin par dbang bskur na zhes bya ba ni bsgo ba'o //
analyzed: bdag gsang ba thams cad 'dzin par dbang bskur na zhes bya ba ni bsgo ba'o //
translated: “If I am empowered to uphold all secrets,” means “I am ordered.”

original: gang zhig ce na gsang ba ste gang bdag gis gzung bar bgyi ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ce na gsang ba ste gang bdag gis gzung bar bgyi ba'o //
translated: What is that? It is the secret, that which I should uphold.

original: de gang lags bka' stsol cig ces bya ba ni de bka' stsol zhing gsungs shig ces pa'o //
analyzed: de gang lags bka' stsol cig ces bya ba ni de bka' stsol zhing gsungs shig ces pa'o //
translated: “Please tell me what that is,” means “Please teach and explain that.”

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste dris pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la ste dris pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: Then, means immediately after, immediately after the question.

original: skal ba phun sum tshogs pas na bcom ldan 'das so ;
analyzed: skal ba phun sum tshogs pas na bcom ldan 'das so ;
translated: The Bhagavān is so called because he is endowed with good fortune.

original: / de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
analyzed: / de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
translated: He is a tathāgata and also all, thus he is all tathāgatas.

original: 'di dag gi gsang ba ni spa ba ste /
analyzed: 'di dag gi gsang ba ni spa ba ste /
translated: The secret of these is the secret of all the Tathagatas.

original: thams cad du bstan par mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad du bstan par mi bya ba'o //
translated: It should not be revealed to everyone.

original: gang gis gsang ba de byin gyis rlob pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis gsang ba de byin gyis rlob pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'o //
translated: This is the samadhi consecration of the secret.

original: de gzhan gyis mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de gzhan gyis mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
translated: It is a vajra because it is not divided by others.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang don dang mthun pa'i ming 'di nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang don dang mthun pa'i ming 'di nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: He entered the samadhi called the samadhi of the very same name as the meaning,

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
translated: This means that it abides in the mind.

original: de gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called the secret of all the Tathagatas.

original: ci zhig mdzad ce na gsungs so zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ci zhig mdzad ce na gsungs so zhes bya ba ste /
translated: What did he do?

original: bka' stsal to zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bka' stsal to zhes pa'o //
translated: He spoke.

original: sems can rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa spyod pa'i sems can rnams la /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa spyod pa'i sems can rnams la /
translated: With regard to the nature of sentient beings, etc., the nature of sentient beings refers to sentient beings who engage in desire and so forth.

original: rang bzhin zhes bya ba 'dod chags la sogs pa spyod pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes bya ba 'dod chags la sogs pa spyod pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: The nature is the nature of engaging in desire and so forth.

original: ji ltar ji ltar zhes bya ba ni ni rnam pa gang dang gang gis so //
analyzed: ji ltar ji ltar zhes bya ba ni ni rnam pa gang dang gang gis so //
translated: As to in whatever way, it is in whatever manner.

original: 'dul bar 'gyur zhes pa ni phan par 'gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'dul bar 'gyur zhes pa ni phan par 'gyur pa ste /
translated: As to tamed, it is benefited.

original: de ltar de ltar sems can rnams kyi don byos shig ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar de ltar sems can rnams kyi don byos shig ces pa'i don to //
translated: Thus, it means, Do the aims of sentient beings in that way!

original: de'i spyod pa bstan pa'i spyod ba de gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i spyod pa bstan pa'i spyod ba de gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is that conduct that is taught in that?

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, desire and so forth.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa la spyod par bstan pa so //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa la spyod par bstan pa so //
translated: It is taught that one engages in desire and so forth.

original: ci nyon mongs pa dang bcas pas sam zhe na //
analyzed: ci nyon mongs pa dang bcas pas sam zhe na //
translated: Is it with affliction?

original: ma yin te gtsang bas bya zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma yin te gtsang bas bya zhes bya ba'o //
translated: No, it is said, with purity.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is taught.

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po 'dod chags la @22a * //
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po 'dod chags la @22a * //
translated: Just as the Bhagavān Samantabhadra engages in desire and so forth with purity, so should you also engage in desire and so forth with purity.

original: sogs pa'i spyod pa rnams la 'dod chags spyod par ston kyang chags par mi mdzad pa dang / zhes dang la spyod pa rnams la zhes dang spyad par ston kyang zhes ldang mi mnga' ba dang / gti mug la spyad pa rnams rmongs pa nyid du ston kyang rmongs pa mi mnga'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i spyod pa rnams la 'dod chags spyod par ston kyang chags par mi mdzad pa dang / zhes dang la spyod pa rnams la zhes dang spyad par ston kyang zhes ldang mi mnga' ba dang / gti mug la spyad pa rnams rmongs pa nyid du ston kyang rmongs pa mi mnga'o //
translated: Although he teaches the practice of delusion to those who practice delusion, he is not deluded.

original: de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa la spyod par ston cing sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa la spyod par ston cing sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'o //
translated: Thus he teaches the practice of passion, etc. and acts for the welfare of sentient beings.

original: gzhan su yang rung bas kyang kun du bzang pa bzhin du ci nas kyang ma chags pa dang mi sdang ba dang / ma rmongs pas sems can rnams kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir gtsang bas kyang bya zhes bya pa'i sgras ston to //
analyzed: gzhan su yang rung bas kyang kun du bzang pa bzhin du ci nas kyang ma chags pa dang mi sdang ba dang / ma rmongs pas sems can rnams kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir gtsang bas kyang bya zhes bya pa'i sgras ston to //
translated: In order to teach that anyone else should also act for the welfare of sentient beings just like Samantabhadra, without attachment, hatred, or delusion, the word “should” is taught.

original: sems can kun la phan phyir dang // zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad dgug cing gtum pa rnams las bskyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can kun la phan phyir dang // zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad dgug cing gtum pa rnams las bskyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: means in order to protect all sentient beings from being summoned and harmed by those who are violent.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of the teachings of the buddhas,

original: zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir /
translated: means in order to protect the Three Jewels.

original: sems can thams cad bsad kyang ni //
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsad kyang ni //
translated: Even though all sentient beings are killed,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: nga rgyal can tshar gcad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: nga rgyal can tshar gcad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to subdue the arrogant.

original: rgyud 'di nyid las lha chen pa bsad pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: rgyud 'di nyid las lha chen pa bsad pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: Just as in this very tantra the great gods are killed,

original: rnal 'byor bsgom pa la dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang slar gos bar nus na gla te sems can thams cad bsad du zin kyang /
analyzed: rnal 'byor bsgom pa la dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang slar gos bar nus na gla te sems can thams cad bsad du zin kyang /
translated: if yogins who have attained mastery in the practice of yoga can revive them, then even though all sentient beings are killed,

original: sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not be sullied by sin.🔽For the sake of benefiting all sentient beings,

original: sems cad kun la phan phyir dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sems cad kun la phan phyir dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: gang la la longs spyad kyi dregs pas myos te /
analyzed: gang la la longs spyad kyi dregs pas myos te /
translated: Whoever, intoxicated by the pride of enjoyment,

original: spyad pa ngan pas sems can rnams la 'khu ba byed na de las sems can rnams bsrung ba nyid ni sems can kun la phan phyir zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: spyad pa ngan pas sems can rnams la 'khu ba byed na de las sems can rnams bsrung ba nyid ni sems can kun la phan phyir zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: If one harms sentient beings through bad conduct, then one should protect sentient beings, for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis //
translated: For the sake of the buddhas, through application.

original: zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas rnams kyi don ni bstan pa bsrung ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir bya ba 'di ni don te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas rnams kyi don ni bstan pa bsrung ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir bya ba 'di ni don te /
translated: The purpose of the buddhas is to protect the teaching and to make the true Dharma last a long time. This is the purpose, the need.

original: dgos pa yin la de'i don du sbyor bas na sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: dgos pa yin la de'i don du sbyor bas na sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba'o //
translated: Because one applies oneself for that purpose, one is for the sake of the buddhas, through application.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: gang la la gdug cing gtum pa rnams longs spyod kyis dregs pas myos te /
analyzed: gang la la gdug cing gtum pa rnams longs spyod kyis dregs pas myos te /
translated: If someone is wicked and violent, intoxicated with the arrogance of wealth,

original: bstan pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa na de gdul bar bya ba'i phyir brgya byin gyis tshong dpon gyi nor spas pa bzhin du /
analyzed: bstan pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa na de gdul bar bya ba'i phyir brgya byin gyis tshong dpon gyi nor spas pa bzhin du /
translated: and destroys the teaching, then in order to subdue that person, like Indra, who took away the wealth of the merchant,

original: de'i nor re zhig dbrog par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i nor re zhig dbrog par bya'o //
translated: one should take away his wealth for a while.

original: pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni //
analyzed: pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni //
translated: Even though one has taken away the wealth of others,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis @22b pha rol gyi nor 'phrog na yang de'i sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis @22b pha rol gyi nor 'phrog na yang de'i sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, even if one takes the wealth of others by the power of magical spells, one is not defiled by the sin of taking what is not given.

original: 'dod chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med //
analyzed: 'dod chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med //
translated: There is no happiness like the happiness of love.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: 'dod chags ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: 'dod chags ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: Love is the thought of awakening of the Lord.

original: sems can smin pa dang 'grol bar byed pa'i 'dod chags yin la /
analyzed: sems can smin pa dang 'grol bar byed pa'i 'dod chags yin la /
translated: It is the love that matures and liberates sentient beings.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i bde ba med //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i bde ba med //
translated: There is no happiness like the happiness of that.

original: ces pa ni gang gi phyir khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal pa yang de las 'thob ste /
analyzed: ces pa ni gang gi phyir khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal pa yang de las 'thob ste /
translated: Because one obtains the sovereignty of the Dharma of the three realms from that.

original: de bas na de dang 'dra'i bde ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na de dang 'dra'i bde ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is no happiness like that.

original: rgyal ba ni de phul la //
analyzed: rgyal ba ni de phul la //
translated: The Victor is the best of those.

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la nyin re zhing dus gsum du sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas nas mngon sum du blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la nyin re zhing dus gsum du sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas nas mngon sum du blang bar bya'o //
translated: One should take up that thought of awakening in the presence of the Blessed Buddhas, having made all the Buddhas present three times a day, every day.

original: de ltar byang chub kyi sems blangs pa'i 'og tu sems bskyed pa des sems can rnams kyi don bya dgos so //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub kyi sems blangs pa'i 'og tu sems bskyed pa des sems can rnams kyi don bya dgos so //
translated: After taking up the Thought of Enlightenment in this way, one should work for the sake of sentient beings with that Thought of Enlightenment.

original: de ltar sems can rnams kyi don bya dgos pa na /🔽gzhan gyi chung ma sems can phyir //
analyzed: de ltar sems can rnams kyi don bya dgos pa na / gzhan gyi chung ma sems can phyir //
translated: And when one should work for the sake of sentient beings in this way,🔽One obtains merit by resorting to another's wife

original: bsten pas bsod rnams thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsten pas bsod rnams thob par 'gyur //
translated: for the sake of sentient beings.

original: zhes bya ba ste gzhan par te mchog go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste gzhan par te mchog go //
translated: Another means supreme.

original: chung ma ni phyag rgya chen pa'o //
analyzed: chung ma ni phyag rgya chen pa'o //
translated: Wife means the Great Seal.

original: de bsten pa ni bsgom pa ste thun pa bzhir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pa dang / phyag rgya bzhi pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa de bsod nams shin tu mang pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bsten pa ni bsgom pa ste thun pa bzhir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pa dang / phyag rgya bzhi pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa de bsod nams shin tu mang pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Resorting to her means cultivating her in the four periods of the day, and the yogin who is stationed in the mandala of the Great Seal of the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, the mandala of the four seals, etc., obtains a great deal of merit.

original: sems can kun la phan phyir dang // zhes bya ba la sog spa la ma 'ongs pa na bde bar 'gyur ba'i las la ni phan pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sems can kun la phan phyir dang // zhes bya ba la sog spa la ma 'ongs pa na bde bar 'gyur ba'i las la ni phan pa zhes bya ste /
translated: For the sake of all sentient beings and so on means that an action which will bring happiness in the future is called beneficial.

original: sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'o //
translated: It is for the sake of all sentient beings because it is for the sake of all sentient beings who are like that.

original: de lta bu'i sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / phyir zhes pa ni tshe 'di'i don rdzogs par bya ba ste //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / phyir zhes pa ni tshe 'di'i don rdzogs par bya ba ste //
translated: The purpose is to perfect the purpose of this life.

original: tshe 'di'i don ni nad dang / dbul ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal bsal ba ste /
analyzed: tshe 'di'i don ni nad dang / dbul ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal bsal ba ste /
translated: The purpose of this life is to remove the suffering of disease, poverty, and so on.

original: de lta bu'i sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir /🔽sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir / sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of all sentient beings who are like that, for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir ro //🔽las rnams thams cad byas pa yis //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir ro // las rnams thams cad byas pa yis //
translated: For the sake of protecting the teachings of the buddhas means for the sake of protecting the teachings of the buddhas.

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la 'dod chags la sogs pa gtsang mas sems can rnams kyi don bya ba nyid las te dang pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la 'dod chags la sogs pa gtsang mas sems can rnams kyi don bya ba nyid las te dang pa yin no //
translated: By performing all activities, it means that for the sake of sentient beings, one should perform the activities of the tathāgata family with pure desire and so on.

original: rdo rje'i rigs la nga rgyal can rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir dus cung zhig srog dang dbral ba ni las gnyis pa @23a * //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs la nga rgyal can rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir dus cung zhig srog dang dbral ba ni las gnyis pa @23a * //
translated: For the sake of subjugating the arrogant, one should perform the activities of the vajra family with a little wrath, such as taking life.

original: yin no // rin po che'i rigs la gdul ba'i phyir dus cung zhig nor 'phrog pa ni gsum pa yin no //
analyzed: yin no // rin po che'i rigs la gdul ba'i phyir dus cung zhig nor 'phrog pa ni gsum pa yin no //
translated: For the sake of subduing the jewel family, stealing wealth for a short time is the third.

original: pad ma'i rigs la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las byang chub kyi sems yang dag par blang ba dang dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni las bzhi pa yin no //
analyzed: pad ma'i rigs la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las byang chub kyi sems yang dag par blang ba dang dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni las bzhi pa yin no //
translated: For the lotus family, taking the vow of enlightenment mind from the tathāgatas and meditating on the maṇḍala is the fourth action.

original: las kyi rigs la mchod pa'i las rnams dang sems can rnams kyi don bya ba ni lnga pa yin no //
analyzed: las kyi rigs la mchod pa'i las rnams dang sems can rnams kyi don bya ba ni lnga pa yin no //
translated: For the action family, the actions of worship and working for the welfare of sentient beings are the fifth.

original: de ltar las thams cad byas na des bsod nams shin tu mang po 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa /
analyzed: de ltar las thams cad byas na des bsod nams shin tu mang po 'thob par 'gyur ro // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa /
translated: Thus, if one performs all the actions, one will obtain a great deal of merit.🔽The Great Commentary on the Compendium of Principles

original: ko sa la'i rgyan las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje rigs kyi rtog pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ko sa la'i rgyan las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje rigs kyi rtog pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
translated: The commentary on the Vajra Family Tantra is complete from the Great King of Great Vehicle Manifest Realization of All Tathāgatas, the Ornament of Kosala.

original: // / de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyi 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgya ba rnam par dbye ba mdzad nas /🔽'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo de dag skyabs gsum len pa la bcud cing byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
analyzed: // / de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyi 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgya ba rnam par dbye ba mdzad nas / 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo de dag skyabs gsum len pa la bcud cing byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
translated: Having thus explained the separation of the three worlds,🔽he then, in order to lead those who have entered the teaching onto the path,

original: bstan pa la zhugs pa de rnams lam la gzud pa'i phyir chos bshad pa gtsor bya dgos pas na de gtsor gyur ba'i 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i brtag pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bstan pa la zhugs pa de rnams lam la gzud pa'i phyir chos bshad pa gtsor bya dgos pas na de gtsor gyur ba'i 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i brtag pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: must make the explanation of the Dharma the most important thing.🔽Therefore, in order to teach the chapter called “Training Beings” which is the most important thing,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gzhan gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gzhan gsungs pa yin te /
translated: the text says “then” and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs so //
translated: “ Then” refers to the occasion.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i rtog pa la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i rtog pa la ltos pa'o //
translated: “ Again” refers to the chapter on the three worlds.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
translated: Since he is a tathagata and also all, he is all tathagatas.

original: gcig tu 'dus te zhes bya ba ni 'du ba mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: gcig tu 'dus te zhes bya ba ni 'du ba mdzad pa'o //
translated: “ Having gathered together” means having assembled.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bskal pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bskal pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The Blessed One means the Blessed One because of the perfection of the eon.

original: phyag na rdor je de nyid ces bya ba ni sngar 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs kyis bzhugs pa gang yin pa de nyid do //
analyzed: phyag na rdor je de nyid ces bya ba ni sngar 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs kyis bzhugs pa gang yin pa de nyid do //
translated: The same Vajrapāṇi means the same one who was previously dwelling in the form of Trailokyavijaya.

original: chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na chos thams cad do ;
analyzed: chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na chos thams cad do ;
translated: Since it is Dharma and also all, it is all dharmas.

original: / de'i bdag po ni gtso bor gyur pa ste /
analyzed: / de'i bdag po ni gtso bor gyur pa ste /
translated: The lord of that is the one who has become the principal,

original: dbang du gyur cing mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbang du gyur cing mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the one who has become the master, the one who is skilled, is the meaning.

original: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin dang / spyad pa la gzigs pa dang / 'jigs pa chen po brgyad la gzigs pa'i dbang po yin pas @23b na spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pa ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin dang / spyad pa la gzigs pa dang / 'jigs pa chen po brgyad la gzigs pa'i dbang po yin pas @23b na spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pa ste /
translated: Since he is the lord of Avalokita, who sees the thoughts, latent tendencies, elements, natures, and conduct of sentient beings, and who sees the eight great fears, he is Avalokiteśvara.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mnga' bas ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa des gsol ba btab pa'o //
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mnga' bas ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa des gsol ba btab pa'o //
translated: There, by all the Tathagatas' one hundred and eight names is the supplication with that one hundred and eight names.

original: 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'o //
translated: Here is what is explained below.

original: gsol ba btab pa zhes bya ba ni mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas gsol ba 'debs pa ste /
analyzed: gsol ba btab pa zhes bya ba ni mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas gsol ba 'debs pa ste /
translated: Supplication is the supplication preceded by worship.

original: de mdzad pa'o //🔽de la 'dir re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sgo nas dang po bstod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de mdzad pa'o // de la 'dir re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sgo nas dang po bstod pa'i phyir /
translated: That is the performance of that.

original: padmo'i sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: padmo'i sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: There, here first, in order to praise the Tathagata family, [the Bhagavān] declares, Padmasattva, and so on.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i de nyid padma'i rigs kyi sgo nas padmo'i sems dpa' zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i de nyid padma'i rigs kyi sgo nas padmo'i sems dpa' zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The reality of Vajrasattva is declared as Padmasattva from the perspective of the Padma family.

original: de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pas na padma che'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pas na padma che'o //
translated: Since he is the lord of those, he is the Great Padma.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug yin pas na 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug yin pas na 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po ste /
translated: Since he is the lord of the three worlds, he is the Lord of the Three Worlds.

original: bdag po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bdag po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of 'lord' is 'master'.

original: dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pas na dbang phyug chen po'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pas na dbang phyug chen po'o //
translated: He is Mahesvara because he acts for the sake of sentient beings in the form of Mahesvara.

original: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad la gzigs pa la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad la gzigs pa la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir ram /
translated: He is Avalokitesvara because he has attained mastery over the vision of the eight great fears,

original: padma'i phyag rgya'i chags pa la gzigs pa'i phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang ngo //
analyzed: padma'i phyag rgya'i chags pa la gzigs pa'i phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang ngo //
translated: or because he has the vision of attachment to the lotus gesture.

original: brtan pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams yin la /
analyzed: brtan pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams yin la /
translated: The steadfast are the bodhisattvas.

original: de dag gi nang na brtan pas na mchog tu gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de dag gi nang na brtan pas na mchog tu gyur pa ste /
translated: And he is the foremost of the steadfast because he is the best among them.

original: ngan song ba rnams kyang padma lta bur bya'o zhes 'khor bar skrag pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir brtan pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: ngan song ba rnams kyang padma lta bur bya'o zhes 'khor bar skrag pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir brtan pa'i mchog go //
translated: He is the foremost of the steadfast because he is not afraid of cyclic existence, thinking, I will make even those in miserable realms like lotuses.

original: bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dang pos chos gang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par gzigs ba de la sus kyang gzhan du bsgyur bar mi nus pa'i phir mi phyed pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pas na rdo rje chos so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dang pos chos gang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par gzigs ba de la sus kyang gzhan du bsgyur bar mi nus pa'i phir mi phyed pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pas na rdo rje chos so //
translated: He is Vajradharma because he has the nature of indivisibility, since whatever dharma the Lord Avalokita sees as intrinsically pure cannot be changed by anyone else.

original: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni mtshan bdun yang dag par bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni mtshan bdun yang dag par bsdus pa yin no //
translated: This verse summarizes the seven epithets.

original: tshig su bcad pa gnyis pas ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i bdag par gyur pa'i sgo nas bstod pa yin te /
analyzed: tshig su bcad pa gnyis pas ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i bdag par gyur pa'i sgo nas bstod pa yin te /
translated: The second verse praises him as the unsurpassed lord of the Dharma,

original: chos rnams la bdag par gyur pas na chos kyi rgyal pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams la bdag par gyur pas na chos kyi rgyal pa'o //
translated: the king of Dharma, because he is the master of the Dharma.

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i mkhyen pa la mnga' brnyes pa na dag pa che ste /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i mkhyen pa la mnga' brnyes pa na dag pa che ste /
translated: When he attained the extraordinary knowledge, he became the great pure one,

original: mi shes pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi shes pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because he was free from the stain of ignorance.

original: de nyid kyis na sems pa'i rgyal pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na sems pa'i rgyal pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, he is the king of thought,

original: thun mong ma yin zhing phyin ci ma log pa'i chos kyi de kho na nyid nye bar ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //🔽dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams dbang po yongs su smin par @24a * //🔽bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin zhing phyin ci ma log pa'i chos kyi de kho na nyid nye bar ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro // dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams dbang po yongs su smin par @24a * // bya ba'i phyir /
translated: because he teaches the reality of the Dharma, which is extraordinary and unmistaken.🔽He is the great intellect,

original: nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis phan 'dogs pa dang / tshar gcod pa spyod pas na blo gros chen po'o //
analyzed: nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis phan 'dogs pa dang / tshar gcod pa spyod pas na blo gros chen po'o //
translated: because he benefits and harms by the performance of miracles with his own power, in order to ripen the faculties of those whose faculties are unripened,🔽and in order to increase the faculties of those whose faculties are ripened.

original: yang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa thugs su chud pas na blo gros chen po'i //
analyzed: yang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa thugs su chud pas na blo gros chen po'i //
translated: Or else, he is the Great Mind because he has realized the perfection of wisdom.

original: padmo'i chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir padma'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: padmo'i chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir padma'i bdag nyid do //
translated: He is the Lotus Nature because he is in accord with the Dharma of the lotus.

original: khams gsum ma lus par khyab par mdzad pas na padma che'o //
analyzed: khams gsum ma lus par khyab par mdzad pas na padma che'o //
translated: He is the Great Lotus because he pervades the entire three realms.

original: padma'i mgon zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs kyi mgon par gyur pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: padma'i mgon zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs kyi mgon par gyur pa'i phyir te /
translated: The Lord of the Lotus Family is the protector of the lotus family.

original: tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni rin po che'i rigs kyi sgo nas bstod pa yin no //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni rin po che'i rigs kyi sgo nas bstod pa yin no //
translated: This verse is a praise from the point of view of the jewel family.

original: 'di ni padmo las byung ba yin pa'i phyir padmo las byung ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni padmo las byung ba yin pa'i phyir padmo las byung ba ste /
translated: He is the Lotus-born because he is born from the lotus.

original: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis padmo'i phyag rgya las yang dag par byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis padmo'i phyag rgya las yang dag par byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is born from the seal of the lotus through the power of meditation.

original: padma bzang po ni pad bzang ste /
analyzed: padma bzang po ni pad bzang ste /
translated: The good lotus is the good lotus.

original: gang de ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs las byung ba'o //
analyzed: gang de ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs las byung ba'o //
translated: That is born from the power of concentration.

original: de nyid kyi snang ba mnga' bas na bad bzang 'od de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi snang ba mnga' bas na bad bzang 'od de /
translated: He is the light of the good lotus because he possesses the light of that.

original: 'od ni sku'i mdangs kyi 'od do //
analyzed: 'od ni sku'i mdangs kyi 'od do //
translated: Light is the radiance of the body.

original: padma ltar dag pa'i rang bzhin mnga' bas na padmo dag pa'o //
analyzed: padma ltar dag pa'i rang bzhin mnga' bas na padmo dag pa'o //
translated: He is the pure lotus because he has the nature of being pure like a lotus.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: ji ltar padma chu las kyis kyang rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir chu'i nyes pas mi gos so //🔽de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug kyang sems can rnams kyi don sgrub par mdzad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar padma chu las kyis kyang rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir chu'i nyes pas mi gos so // de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug kyang sems can rnams kyi don sgrub par mdzad pa'i phyir /
translated: Just as a lotus, although born in the water, is by nature pure and is not soiled by the faults of the water,

original: 'khor bar zhugs kyang 'khor ba rnams kyi nyes pas mi gsos so //
analyzed: 'khor bar zhugs kyang 'khor ba rnams kyi nyes pas mi gsos so //
translated: in the same way, the Lord Lokeśvara, although engaged in the world in order to accomplish the aims of sentient beings, is not soiled by the faults of the world.

original: sems can rnams shin tu dag par mdzad pas na rab dag byed de padma dang 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: sems can rnams shin tu dag par mdzad pas na rab dag byed de padma dang 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: He is the purifier because he purifies sentient beings very well, like a lotus.

original: dper na padma ni bkra shis pa'i gnas su gyur pas phyogs gong du skye ba'i sa phyogs de gtsang mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na padma ni bkra shis pa'i gnas su gyur pas phyogs gong du skye ba'i sa phyogs de gtsang mar 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, a lotus, because it is a place of good fortune, purifies the place where it is born, so that that place becomes clean.

original: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug kyang gang du bltams pa'i sems can gyi 'jig rten der skye ba zhes pa tsam gyis dag byed du gyur par mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug kyang gang du bltams pa'i sems can gyi 'jig rten der skye ba zhes pa tsam gyis dag byed du gyur par mdzad do //
translated: In the same way, the Lord Lokeśvara, just by being born in a world of sentient beings, purifies that world.

original: de yang / yon tan yang dag rgyan ldan dam pa ni //
analyzed: de yang / yon tan yang dag rgyan ldan dam pa ni //
translated: The one who is endowed with the ornament of true virtue is holy.

original: gang dang du gang du gnas par gyur pa dag / de dang der ni bkra shis ldan bshad de //
analyzed: gang dang du gang du gnas par gyur pa dag / de dang der ni bkra shis ldan bshad de //
translated: Wherever he is, there is good fortune.

original: 'bab stegs de yin dga' thub nags de yin //
analyzed: 'bab stegs de yin dga' thub nags de yin //
translated: That is the ford, that is the forest of delight.🔽As it is said in verse.

original: zhes tshigs su bcad pas ji skad bshad pa lta bu dang / gnas pa dag tu 'gro ba yi //
analyzed: zhes tshigs su bcad pas ji skad bshad pa lta bu dang / gnas pa dag tu 'gro ba yi //
translated: Wherever I go,

original: mig gis rtag tu khyod mthong zhing //
analyzed: mig gis rtag tu khyod mthong zhing //
translated: my eyes always see you.

original: gang zhig khyod kyi zhal ba lta ba /
analyzed: gang zhig khyod kyi zhal ba lta ba /
translated: Whoever sees your face,

original: 'jig rten de nyid bsos nams ldan //
analyzed: 'jig rten de nyid bsos nams ldan //
translated: that world is blessed.

original: zhes bshad pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: zhes bshad pa lta bu ste /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de lta bas na rab @24b dag byed //
analyzed: de lta bas na rab @24b dag byed //
translated: Therefore, it is the best.

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i padma mnga' bas na rdo rje padma'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i padma mnga' bas na rdo rje padma'o //
translated: It has a vajra-marked lotus, so it is the vajra lotus.

original: yang na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i nyid padma'i gzugs su bzhugs pas na rdo rje padma'o //
analyzed: yang na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i nyid padma'i gzugs su bzhugs pas na rdo rje padma'o //
translated: Or, the Blessed One Vajrasattva dwells in the form of a lotus, so it is the vajra lotus.

original: padma bzang po ni padma mchog ste /
analyzed: padma bzang po ni padma mchog ste /
translated: The good lotus is the supreme lotus,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi padma'o /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi padma'o /
translated: the samadhi lotus.

original: de 'dab ma ltar shin tu 'jam pa'i sku mnga' bas na padma mchog sku'o //
analyzed: de 'dab ma ltar shin tu 'jam pa'i sku mnga' bas na padma mchog sku'o //
translated: He has a body that is extremely soft like a petal, so he is the supreme lotus body.

original: nga ma ni gzugs kyi skye mched kyi sgo nas bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: nga ma ni gzugs kyi skye mched kyi sgo nas bstan pa yin la /
translated: The first is taught from the perspective of the form sense base.

original: de ltar gyi ni reg bya'i skye mched kyi sog nas bstan pa yin te //
analyzed: de ltar gyi ni reg bya'i skye mched kyi sog nas bstan pa yin te //
translated: The second is taught from the perspective of the tactile sense base.

original: khyad par ni de yin no //
analyzed: khyad par ni de yin no //
translated: This is the difference.

original: padmo'i steng di yin pas na padma padmo ste /
analyzed: padmo'i steng di yin pas na padma padmo ste /
translated: The lotus on top of that is a lotus lotus.

original: 'og gi padma ni tshang ba'i padma yin la /
analyzed: 'og gi padma ni tshang ba'i padma yin la /
translated: The lower lotus is a complete lotus.

original: de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya'i padma gnas pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya'i padma gnas pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The Bhagavān’s seal lotus is located on top of that, so it is called that.

original: tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi sgo nas bstan pa ste /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi sgo nas bstan pa ste /
translated: This verse is taught from the perspective of the lotus family.

original: 'di la yang mtshan bdun yod do //
analyzed: 'di la yang mtshan bdun yod do //
translated: Here, too, there are seven epithets.

original: de ni las kyi rigs kyi sgo nas bstod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni las kyi rigs kyi sgo nas bstod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to praise him from the perspective of the karma family,

original: sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs ba gsungs so //
analyzed: sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs ba gsungs so //
translated: he says “diverse” and so on.

original: sna tshogs kyang yin la ;
analyzed: sna tshogs kyang yin la ;
translated: It is diverse and

original: chen po yang yin pas na sna tshogs chen po ste /
analyzed: chen po yang yin pas na sna tshogs chen po ste /
translated: it is great, so it is a great diversity.

original: sna tshogs pa'i dgos pa mdzad pa'i phyir //🔽khyab par mdzad pas na sna tshogs chen pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i dgos pa mdzad pa'i phyir // khyab par mdzad pas na sna tshogs chen pa //
translated: He is the Great Variety because he performs various functions.

original: snang ba chen pa mnga' bas na snang ba chen pa ste /
analyzed: snang ba chen pa mnga' bas na snang ba chen pa ste /
translated: He is the Great Illumination because he possesses the Great Illumination.

original: snang ba ni sems can gyi don mdzad pa la sgrim pa pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: snang ba ni sems can gyi don mdzad pa la sgrim pa pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes so //
translated: Illumination is the intuition of one who is not intent on performing the benefit of sentient beings.

original: dgos pa chen pa mnga' bas na dgos pa chen pa ste /
analyzed: dgos pa chen pa mnga' bas na dgos pa chen pa ste /
translated: He is the Great Necessity because he possesses the Great Necessity.

original: sems can ma lus pa'i skya ba rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir te gdon mi za bar grub pa'o //
analyzed: sems can ma lus pa'i skya ba rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir te gdon mi za bar grub pa'o //
translated: He is the Great Necessity because he accomplishes the welfare of all sentient beings without exception.

original: chen pa mtshungs pa mnga' ba sna che dang mtshungs te /
analyzed: chen pa mtshungs pa mnga' ba sna che dang mtshungs te /
translated: He is the Great Equality because he possesses the Great Equality.

original: che ba ni sangs rgyas te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: che ba ni sangs rgyas te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
translated: The Great One is the Buddha, all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa yang de dang mtshungs par gyur pa na che dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa yang de dang mtshungs par gyur pa na che dang mtshungs so //
translated: And the Tathagata Sakyamuni is equal to him, therefore he is the Great Equality.

original: brtan pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na brtan pa chen pa ste /
analyzed: brtan pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na brtan pa chen pa ste /
translated: He is the Great Steadfast One because he is steadfast and great.

original: sems can thams cad bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is the Great Steadfast One because he is engaged in the protection of all sentient beings.

original: gdug cing gtum pa rnams kun du skrag par mdzad pas na dpa' ba chen po ste /
analyzed: gdug cing gtum pa rnams kun du skrag par mdzad pas na dpa' ba chen po ste /
translated: He is the Great Hero because he terrifies all the wicked and violent.

original: dpa' ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na dpa' ba chen po ste /
analyzed: dpa' ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na dpa' ba chen po ste /
translated: He is the Great Hero because he is a hero and he is great.

original: gzi mdangs chen po dang ldan pa la dpa'i ba chen po zhes bshad do //
analyzed: gzi mdangs chen po dang ldan pa la dpa'i ba chen po zhes bshad do //
translated: It is explained that the Great Hero has great splendor.

original: 'di yang mtshan bdun gyis bstod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di yang mtshan bdun gyis bstod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood as a praise with seven epithets.

original: da ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sgo nas bstod par bstan pa'i phyir @25a * //
analyzed: da ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sgo nas bstod par bstan pa'i phyir @25a * //
translated: Now, in order to teach the praise from the perspective of Vajrasattva,

original: sems can bsam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sems can bsam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he declares the thought of sentient beings, etc.

original: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ni sems can bsam pa ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ni sems can bsam pa ste /
translated: The thought of sentient beings is the thought of sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems gang yin pa de la bsam pa'i sgrar gsungs so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems gang yin pa de la bsam pa'i sgrar gsungs so //
translated: That which is the thought of all sentient beings is declared to be the word thought.

original: de nyid shes rab dang ye shes su yang dag par ldan pa ni rtogs pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de nyid shes rab dang ye shes su yang dag par ldan pa ni rtogs pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: That itself, which is endowed with wisdom and intuition, is the nature of the Dharma of realization.

original: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par dbye bas gnas pa la ni theg pa che zhes bshad do //
analyzed: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par dbye bas gnas pa la ni theg pa che zhes bshad do //
translated: It is explained that the vehicle is called the Great Vehicle because it is the abode of the divisions of the stages and perfections.

original: sems da nyid stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: sems da nyid stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'am /
translated: The mind itself is focused on emptiness.

original: chos thams cad la dmigs pas na rnams par mi g-yeng ba ni rnal 'byor chen pa zhes bshad do //🔽sems de nyid tshangs pa'i gzugs su sprul te /
analyzed: chos thams cad la dmigs pas na rnams par mi g-yeng ba ni rnal 'byor chen pa zhes bshad do // sems de nyid tshangs pa'i gzugs su sprul te /
translated: The mind itself is called “great yoga” when it is focused on emptiness or on all phenomena.

original: gnas pa la ni mes po che zhes bshad do //
analyzed: gnas pa la ni mes po che zhes bshad do //
translated: The mind itself is called “great grandfather” when it is focused on the form of Brahma.🔽The mind itself is called “Sukra” when it is focused on the form of Indra.

original: sems can rnams kyi gdul bya'i don gyi phyir bde za'i gzugs su spru pas na bde za'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi gdul bya'i don gyi phyir bde za'i gzugs su spru pas na bde za'o //
translated: The mind itself is called “Sukesa” when it is focused on the form of a universal monarch.🔽The mind itself is called “Bhagavat” when it is focused on the form of a Buddha.🔽The mind itself is called “Brahma” when it is focused on the form of Brahma.

original: sham ni bde ba la bya ba de byed pa'i gang tshul mnga' bas na bde byed de /🔽mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sham ni bde ba la bya ba de byed pa'i gang tshul mnga' bas na bde byed de / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mind itself is called “Sukra” when it is focused on the form of Indra.🔽The mind itself is called “Sukesa” when it is focused on the form of a universal monarch.🔽The mind itself is called “Bhagavat” when it is focused on the form of a Buddha.

original: dag pa sgra ni sems de nyid la bya bar bshad de dag pa'i sgra'i don yin pas na dag pa'i don te /🔽nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par gro ba'i phir ro //
analyzed: dag pa sgra ni sems de nyid la bya bar bshad de dag pa'i sgra'i don yin pas na dag pa'i don te / nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par gro ba'i phir ro //
translated: The mind itself is called “Brahma” when it is focused on the form of Brahma.

original: padmo rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni padma kha bye ba zhes bya ba ba'i don to //
analyzed: padmo rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni padma kha bye ba zhes bya ba ba'i don to //
translated: The mind itself is called “Padma” when it is focused on the form of a lotus.

original: sems de nyid ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyid gnyis dang bral bas na padma rgyas pa lta bu yin pas na sangs rgyas padma zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems de nyid ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyid gnyis dang bral bas na padma rgyas pa lta bu yin pas na sangs rgyas padma zhes bya'o //
translated: That mind itself is like a blooming lotus because it is free from the two sleep states of the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience. Therefore, it is called the Buddha Lotus.

original: de ltar na tshig su bcad pa 'di ni mtshan brgya tsa brgyad kyis bsod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na tshig su bcad pa 'di ni mtshan brgya tsa brgyad kyis bsod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, this verse is praised with one hundred and eight names.

original: da ni bshad chos rnams kyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir chos de nyid don zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni bshad chos rnams kyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir chos de nyid don zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the praise from the perspective of the Dharma that is to be explained, he says the suchness of those dharmas, etc.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos te /
translated: A dharma is so called because it holds its own characteristics.

original: gzung la sogs pa ste chos de rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni chos de nyid do //
analyzed: gzung la sogs pa ste chos de rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni chos de nyid do //
translated: The suchness of those dharmas is the suchness of those dharmas.

original: chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi don mnga' bas na chos de nyid don to //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi don mnga' bas na chos de nyid don to //
translated: Since he possesses the meaning of the suchness of dharmas, he is the suchness of dharmas.

original: dam pa rnams kyi chos yin pas na dam pa'i chos so //
analyzed: dam pa rnams kyi chos yin pas na dam pa'i chos so //
translated: Since it is the Dharma of the sublime ones, it is the sublime Dharma.

original: yang na chos bzang po yin pas nad ma pa'i chos so //
analyzed: yang na chos bzang po yin pas nad ma pa'i chos so //
translated: Or, since it is the excellent Dharma, it is the sublime Dharma.

original: dag pa yang yin la chos kyang yin pas na dag pa'i chos te thog ma dang bar dang tha mar dge ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dag pa yang yin la chos kyang yin pas na dag pa'i chos te thog ma dang bar dang tha mar dge ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is pure and also a Dharma, it is a pure Dharma, because it is virtuous in the beginning, middle and end.

original: chos bzang po mdzad pas na chos rab byed de rtogs pa'i chos thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos bzang po mdzad pas na chos rab byed de rtogs pa'i chos thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is a Dharma that is well practiced, it is a Dharma that is well performed, because it is the cause for attaining the Dharma of realization.

original: chos kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na chos chen po ste /
analyzed: chos kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na chos chen po ste /
translated: Since it is a Dharma and also great, it is a great Dharma,

original: theg @25b pa chen pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: theg @25b pa chen pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of the Mahāyāna Dharma.

original: chos bzang po yin pas na chos bzang po ste /
analyzed: chos bzang po yin pas na chos bzang po ste /
translated: Since it is a good Dharma, it is a good Dharma,

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis bsdus pa'i zag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis bsdus pa'i zag pa med pa'o //
translated: because it is the uncontaminated Dharma subsumed by the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: de las kyang theg pa chen po'i chos ni mchog tu gyur pa yin pas na /
analyzed: de las kyang theg pa chen po'i chos ni mchog tu gyur pa yin pas na /
translated: And since the Mahāyāna Dharma is supreme among those,

original: chos bzang mchog go //
analyzed: chos bzang mchog go //
translated: it is the supreme good Dharma.

original: gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug par mdzad pas na chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug par mdzad pas na chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: Since it engages the mindstreams of disciples in accordance with their fortune, it is the wheel of Dharma.

original: 'di yang mtshan bdun gyis bstod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di yang mtshan bdun gyis bstod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: This should also be understood as praise with seven epithets.

original: da ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
