original: spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyi gtsug tu rta mgo kha gdangs pa mig gnyis byin pa'i phyi rol du byung ba 'khor lo la mngon par blta ba nyid kyi phyag na padma lcags khyu bsnams pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rta mgrin gyi gzugs so /
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyi gtsug tu rta mgo kha gdangs pa mig gnyis byin pa'i phyi rol du byung ba 'khor lo la mngon par blta ba nyid kyi phyag na padma lcags khyu bsnams pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rta mgrin gyi gzugs so /
translated: With a horse head gaping open on the crown of Avalokiteśvara's head, the two eyes protruding outside the shoulders, gazing at the wheel, holding a lotus and iron hook in his hands - this is the form of the Blessed Noble Hayagrīva.

original: lho phyogs kyi sgor spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshangs pa la sogs pa gang yang rang ba'i gzugs can phyag na padmo'i zhags pa bsnams pa gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi sgor spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshangs pa la sogs pa gang yang rang ba'i gzugs can phyag na padmo'i zhags pa bsnams pa gzhag par bya'o //
translated: At the southern door, one should place Avalokiteśvara in the form of Brahmā, holding a lotus noose.

original: nub phyogs @33a * //
analyzed: nub phyogs @33a * //
translated: In the west is🔽

original: kyi sgor spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag na padmo'i lcags sgrog bsnams pa bri bar bya'o //🔽las kyi sgor spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu gdong drug skem byed kyi gzugs 'dzin pa la /
analyzed: kyi sgor spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag na padmo'i lcags sgrog bsnams pa bri bar bya'o // las kyi sgor spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu gdong drug skem byed kyi gzugs 'dzin pa la /
translated: Avalokiteśvara in the western door should be drawn holding a lotus and a fetter.

original: padma dang dang dril bu bsnams pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: padma dang dang dril bu bsnams pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: Avalokiteśvara in the action door should be drawn as a youth with six faces, holding a lotus and a bell, and assuming the form of Mṛtyu.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni slob dpon gyi las ston te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni slob dpon gyi las ston te /
translated: Then, beginning with “then,” the master’s work is taught.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //
translated: “ Then” means immediately after.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba rtogs pa 'dir ro //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba rtogs pa 'dir ro //
translated: “ Here” means in this understanding.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni padmo'i dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni padmo'i dkyil 'khor te //
translated: The “maṇḍala of the tamer of beings” is the lotus maṇḍala.

original: de nyid kyi cho ga rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i las rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi cho ga rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i las rgyas pa'o //
translated: “ The extensive rite of that” is the extensive rite to be performed.

original: de gang yin pa bstan pa'i phyir de la thog ma kho nar padmo'i slob dpon gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de gang yin pa bstan pa'i phyir de la thog ma kho nar padmo'i slob dpon gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach that, “first of all, the lotus master” and so on is said.

original: dang po nyid du zhes bya ba ni thog ma nyid du'o //
analyzed: dang po nyid du zhes bya ba ni thog ma nyid du'o //
translated: “ First of all” means at the very beginning.

original: padma'i rigs kyi slob dpon yin pas na padmo'i dpon no //
analyzed: padma'i rigs kyi slob dpon yin pas na padmo'i dpon no //
translated: The master of the lotus family is the lotus master.

original: padma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni padmo'i dam tshig gis phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: padma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni padmo'i dam tshig gis phyag rgya ste /
translated: The pledge seal of the lotus family is the lotus pledge seal.

original: mtshan nyid ni 'og nas bshad de sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i tshul du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni 'og nas bshad de sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i tshul du blta bar bya'o //
translated: The characteristics of the pledge seals are explained below, and should be viewed in the manner of the adamantine being seal.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs te /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs te /
translated: The phrase just as they are arranged means

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya de nyid kyi phreng ba blangs la dam tshig gi sngags brjod de /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya de nyid kyi phreng ba blangs la dam tshig gi sngags brjod de /
translated: that one should take up the rosary of just those seals, recite the pledge mantra,

original: phreng ba de bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'gro ba 'dul ba la phul la /
analyzed: phreng ba de bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'gro ba 'dul ba la phul la /
translated: and offer the rosary to the Blessed One, Avalokitdvara, the Tamer of Beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de nyid kyis bdag gi dgos pa thams cad mdzad pa nyid du bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de nyid kyis bdag gi dgos pa thams cad mdzad pa nyid du bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should think that the Blessed One, Avalokitdvara, himself will accomplish all one's needs.

original: snying po 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: snying po 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa ste /
translated: The phrase with this essence refers to the essence mantra taught in the mandala of the Tamer of Beings.

original: dbab pa'i snying po 'di ni mtshon pa tsam du zad do //
analyzed: dbab pa'i snying po 'di ni mtshon pa tsam du zad do //
translated: This essence of descent is merely an illustration.

original: las rnams bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: las rnams bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The actions are the self-consecration, etc.

original: padmo phyogs pa'o //
analyzed: padmo phyogs pa'o //
translated: The lotus is the mudra.

original: padmo spo ta zhes bya ba ni padma brdabs pa la bya ba bshad do //
analyzed: padmo spo ta zhes bya ba ni padma brdabs pa la bya ba bshad do //
translated: The lotus slap is explained as the slap of the lotus.

original: aa dhi tshhthi zhes bya ba 'dis ni dbab ston to //
analyzed: aa dhi tshhthi zhes bya ba 'dis ni dbab ston to //
translated: The adhisthana is the descent.

original: de yang aa zhes bya ba ni gsal po kho nar dbab pa'i snying po yin te /
analyzed: de yang aa zhes bya ba ni gsal po kho nar dbab pa'i snying po yin te /
translated: And that is the essence of descent, which is clear as the a sound.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dang gnas 'di gnyis kar yang /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dang gnas 'di gnyis kar yang /
translated: In both the mandala of the vajra realm and this place,

original: spo ta'i phyag rgyas dbab par bya //
analyzed: spo ta'i phyag rgyas dbab par bya //
translated: one should descend with the slap of the lotus mudra.

original: zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the teaching.

original: de bas na ci zhig ston che na /
analyzed: de bas na ci zhig ston che na /
translated: Therefore, what is being taught?

original: padmo'i phyag rgya brdab pa byas la bdag nyid la dbab cing aa zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: padmo'i phyag rgya brdab pa byas la bdag nyid la dbab cing aa zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o zhes ston to //
translated: One should perform the slap of the lotus mudra, descend upon oneself, and utter the 'a' sound.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: Then means immediately after that.

original: de bzhin du bka' mnos nas zhes bya @33b ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du bdag padmo che zhes bya ba sems can rnams kyi don bgyid kyis /
analyzed: de bzhin du bka' mnos nas zhes bya @33b ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du bdag padmo che zhes bya ba sems can rnams kyi don bgyid kyis /
translated: Similarly, having been commanded means just as in the Vajradhātu maṇḍala, I will do the benefit of sentient beings with the great lotus,

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la gnang ba stsal du gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la gnang ba stsal du gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on, saying I request all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas to grant me permission.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag dbang bskur te zhes bya ba ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa de bzhin du bya ba'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag dbang bskur te zhes bya ba ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa de bzhin du bya ba'o //
translated: Having been empowered with the samaya mudra means that one should perform the self-consecration and so on, just as before.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya 'di dag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni dgod par bya ba'i sngags nyid kyis so //
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya 'di dag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni dgod par bya ba'i sngags nyid kyis so //
translated: With these very dharma mudras means with the mantras to be arranged.

original: sems dpa' chen po rnams bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba dgod par gyis shig ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po rnams bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba dgod par gyis shig ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The great beings should be accomplished means arrange them.

original: yang na chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya bzhis sems dpa' chen po rnams dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya bzhis sems dpa' chen po rnams dgod par bya'o //
translated: Or else, the great beings should be arranged with the four dharma mudras taught in the Dharma maṇḍala.

original: de nas // dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas // dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The powers are just like that.

original: zhes bya ba la ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrubs pa de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrubs pa de bzhin du'o //
translated: As in the case of the accomplishment of the mandala of powers in the Vajradhātu maṇḍala.

original: de ltar slob dpon gyi las rdzogs par byas nas slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar slob dpon gyi las rdzogs par byas nas slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having thus completed the master’s acts, in order to teach the rite of inducting the disciples,

original: padmo'i slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: padmo'i slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “one should induct the lotus disciples.”

original: padma'i rigs kyi slob ma yin pas na padmo'i slob ma ste /
analyzed: padma'i rigs kyi slob ma yin pas na padmo'i slob ma ste /
translated: Because they are disciples of the lotus family, they are lotus disciples.

original: yongs su bzung nas phyis 'gyur ba'i tshul la brten te padma'i slob ma zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: yongs su bzung nas phyis 'gyur ba'i tshul la brten te padma'i slob ma zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Having accepted them, later, in dependence on the method of change, they are called lotus disciples.

original: padmo'i slob ma rnams la mna'i snying po byin la zhes bya ba la ji ltar par bya zhe na /
analyzed: padmo'i slob ma rnams la mna'i snying po byin la zhes bya ba la ji ltar par bya zhe na /
translated: Having given the essence of the lotus to the lotus disciples, how should one act?

original: deng ni khyod kyi snying ga na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: deng ni khyod kyi snying ga na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares, “Today, in your heart,” and so on.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du'o //
translated: As stated in the Great Maṇḍala of the Vajra Realm.

original: ci'i phyir sbyin par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir sbyin par bya zhe na /
translated: Why should one give?

original: de bstan pa'i phyir gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says, “this extensive secret rite,” and so on.

original: gang gi phyir sngags rnams kyi grub pa'i rgyu'i mchog ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngags rnams kyi grub pa'i rgyu'i mchog ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Because this is the supreme cause of the accomplishment of mantras.

original: gzhan la mi ston pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan la mi ston pa'o //
translated: It is not teaching others.

original: de la gsang ba smras pa'i nyes dmigs mthong ba dang / ma mthong ba dag ston te /
analyzed: de la gsang ba smras pa'i nyes dmigs mthong ba dang / ma mthong ba dag ston te /
translated: Therein, the disadvantages of revealing the secret are shown, both in terms of what is seen and what is unseen.

original: mthong ba ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: mthong ba ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba'o //
translated: What is seen is untimely death.

original: ma mthong ba ni dmyal bar ltung ba ste /
analyzed: ma mthong ba ni dmyal bar ltung ba ste /
translated: What is unseen is falling into hell.

original: de ni khyod kyis mi bde ba ma spangs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no /
analyzed: de ni khyod kyis mi bde ba ma spangs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no /
translated: That is stated in “you will not abandon misfortune,” and so on.

original: dris pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas bcug ste /
analyzed: dris pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas bcug ste /
translated: In the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm, having entered while binding the pledge seal,

original: mna'i snying po byin pa yin na /
analyzed: mna'i snying po byin pa yin na /
translated: the essence of the pledge is given.

original: 'dir go ma bug pa nyid du bying na 'di la dgos pa ci zhig yod @34a * //
analyzed: 'dir go ma bug pa nyid du bying na 'di la dgos pa ci zhig yod @34a * //
translated: If one sinks into the ground here, what is the purpose of that?

original: ce na ; de ni 'dir ji lta 'der yang de bzhin du bya la der ji lta ba 'dir yang de bzhin du bya'o zhes sgo gnyi gar drang ba bstan pa'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: ce na ; de ni 'dir ji lta 'der yang de bzhin du bya la der ji lta ba 'dir yang de bzhin du bya'o zhes sgo gnyi gar drang ba bstan pa'i phyir yin no //
translated: If one asks why, it is in order to show that just as it is here, so it is there, and just as it is there, so it is here, in both cases.

original: de nas snying po 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ba ni phyag rgya gang bcings pas phyag rgya gzhan rnams bcings na dam tshig nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de nas snying po 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ba ni phyag rgya gang bcings pas phyag rgya gzhan rnams bcings na dam tshig nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
translated: Then, one should bind the pledge seal with this essence mantra. The pledge seal is that seal which, when bound, does not violate the pledge, even if one binds the other seals.

original: chos rdo rje ma la bya bas de 'ching du gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: chos rdo rje ma la bya bas de 'ching du gzhug pa'o //
translated: It is the Dharma Vajrī, so one should cause her to be bound.

original: de nas gos dkar po bgos la dar dkar pos gdon g-yogs nas gzhug par bya ste zhes bya ba ni ji skad gsung pa'i sngags kyis so //
analyzed: de nas gos dkar po bgos la dar dkar pos gdon g-yogs nas gzhug par bya ste zhes bya ba ni ji skad gsung pa'i sngags kyis so //
translated: Then, one should cause her to enter, dressed in white garments and covered with a white cloth, with the mantra as previously stated.

original: las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas zhes bya ba ni dbab pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas zhes bya ba ni dbab pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Having performed the rites just as they are, means the descent and so forth.

original: padmo'i dbyibs lag tu sbyin no zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la las kyi rdo rje lag pa gnyis su byin nas /
analyzed: padmo'i dbyibs lag tu sbyin no zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la las kyi rdo rje lag pa gnyis su byin nas /
translated: The phrase this is all Buddhas means that the Karmavajra is given into both hands of the Karmavajra of the Lotus family, and the following is said:

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
translated: This is all Buddhas,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na gnas //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na gnas //
translated: residing in the hand of Vajrasattva.🔽The phrase this is all Buddhas means that the Karmavajra is given into both hands of the Karmavajra of the Lotus family, and the following is said:

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dir yang bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dir yang bya'o //
translated: This is all Buddhas,🔽residing in the hand of Vajrasattva.

original: 'dir padmo'i rigs dang 'brel pa 'di tsam zhig lhag par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir padmo'i rigs dang 'brel pa 'di tsam zhig lhag par brjod par bya ste /
translated: The phrase this is all Buddhas means that the Karmavajra is given into both hands of the Karmavajra of the Lotus family, and the following is said:🔽This is all Buddhas,🔽residing in the hand of Vajrasattva.

original: aom padma hasta badzra dharm'a tam p'a la ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom padma hasta badzra dharm'a tam p'a la ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase this is all Buddhas means that the Karmavajra is given into both hands of the Karmavajra of the Lotus family, and the following is said:🔽This is all Buddhas,🔽residing in the hand of Vajrasattva.🔽The phrase this is all Buddhas means that the Karmavajra is given into both hands of the Karmavajra of the Lotus family, and the following is said:🔽This is all Buddhas,🔽residing in the hand of Vajrasattva.🔽The phrase this is all Buddhas means that the Karmavajra is given into both hands of the Karmavajra of the Lotus family, and the following is said:🔽This is all Buddhas,🔽residing in the hand of Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje chos nyid kyi don de mi shes pas na de'i phyir rdo rje chos nyid ji lta bu lags zhes smos pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje chos nyid kyi don de mi shes pas na de'i phyir rdo rje chos nyid ji lta bu lags zhes smos pa yin no //
translated: The phrase this is all Buddhas means that the Karmavajra is given into both hands of the Karmavajra of the Lotus family, and the following is said:🔽This is all Buddhas,🔽residing in the hand of Vajrasattva.🔽The phrase this is all Buddhas means that the Karmavajra is given into both hands of the Karmavajra of the Lotus family, and the following is said:🔽This is all Buddhas,🔽residing in the hand of Vajrasattva.

original: de la yang 'di skad du brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rdo rje chos nyid kyi don rnams par 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang 'di skad du brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rdo rje chos nyid kyi don rnams par 'byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase this is all Buddhas means that the Karmavajra is given into both hands of the Karma

original: ji ltar padma dmar po 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la padmo'i rigs ni chu la sogs pa ste //
analyzed: ji ltar padma dmar po 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la padmo'i rigs ni chu la sogs pa ste //
translated: In the passage beginning Just as this red lotus, etc., the lotus family is water, etc.

original: de las chags pa dang rjes su mthun par skye'o //
analyzed: de las chags pa dang rjes su mthun par skye'o //
translated: and it grows in accordance with its attachment to it.

original: rigs kyi nyes pa ni nya lcibs dang / chu zhag dang / dring ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: rigs kyi nyes pa ni nya lcibs dang / chu zhag dang / dring ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: The faults of the family are the mud, the water, the mire, etc.

original: padma dmar du zin kyang nyes pa de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: padma dmar du zin kyang nyes pa de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though the lotus is red, it is not soiled by those faults.

original: de bas chags pa'i nyes pa ni gos pa'i nyes par mi 'gyur par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas chags pa'i nyes pa ni gos pa'i nyes par mi 'gyur par shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus one should understand that the fault of attachment does not become the fault of soiling.

original: de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sngags pa sems can smin pa dang grol ba'i chags pa la chags su zin kyang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sngags pa sems can smin pa dang grol ba'i chags pa la chags su zin kyang ngo //
translated: In the same way, the mantra practitioner who has generated the spirit of enlightenment, even though attached to the attachment to ripening and liberating sentient beings,

original: thams cad dag par bsgom na ni //
analyzed: thams cad dag par bsgom na ni //
translated: If one meditates on the purity of everything,

original: zhes bya ba la thams cad dag pa ni dngos po'i tshogs thams cad dag ba ste stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la thams cad dag pa ni dngos po'i tshogs thams cad dag ba ste stong pa nyid do //
translated: The purity of everything is the purity of the entire collection of things, which is emptiness.

original: de bsgoms shing gsom par byas na /
analyzed: de bsgoms shing gsom par byas na /
translated: If one meditates on that, cultivates that,

original: de bzhin sdig pas gos mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin sdig pas gos mi 'gyur //
translated: one will not be soiled by evil,🔽even though one has sex with a śūdra woman.

original: zhes bya ba ste sdig pa ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste sdig pa ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yin la /
translated: “Sin” means the paths of the ten unwholesome actions.

original: des gos par mi 'gyur zhing sbags par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des gos par mi 'gyur zhing sbags par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he is not covered by them, he is not stained by them.

original: de yang @34b mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam byed pas na mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang de rnams kyi gzhi yang dag par mi mthong ba'o /
analyzed: de yang @34b mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam byed pas na mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang de rnams kyi gzhi yang dag par mi mthong ba'o /
translated: Moreover, he does not see the ten unwholesome paths of action as the performance of the ten unwholesome actions, nor does he see their basis.

original: de bas na de sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhes bya ste sdig pa byed pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bas na de sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhes bya ste sdig pa byed pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, he is said to be “uncovered by sin,” because he does not perform sin.

original: grol ba'i phyir sdig pa nyin mtshan du spyad kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro zhes zhi ba pa lta byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: grol ba'i phyir sdig pa nyin mtshan du spyad kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro zhes zhi ba pa lta byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that he is not covered by sin even though he practices sin day and night, because he is liberated.

original: de ni grol nas sdig pa byed par 'dod pas na ha cang mi rigs par smra ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni grol nas sdig pa byed par 'dod pas na ha cang mi rigs par smra ba yin no //
translated: But that is an extremely unreasonable statement, because he wants to perform sin after he is liberated.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i don to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i don to //
translated: “Then” means “after that.”

original: padmo'i rigs kyi phyag rgya yin pas na padmo'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: padmo'i rigs kyi phyag rgya yin pas na padmo'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: It is a seal of the lotus family, thus it is a seal of the lotus family.

original: de'i ye shes yin pas na padmo'i rig skyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de'i ye shes yin pas na padmo'i rig skyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so //
translated: Since it is the intuition of that, it is the intuition of the lotus knowledge-woman seal.

original: de bslab par bya ste zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de bslab par bya ste zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: One should train in that means one should teach it.

original: de la re zhig phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub de ston pa ni /
analyzed: de la re zhig phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub de ston pa ni /
translated: Now, the teaching of that intuition-success of the great seal is as follows.

original: snying la padmo bris nas kyang //🔽zhes bya ba ste /🔽rang gi snying gar padmo yid kyis bsams la /
analyzed: snying la padmo bris nas kyang // zhes bya ba ste / rang gi snying gar padmo yid kyis bsams la /
translated: Having drawn a lotus in the heart,🔽one should visualize the lotus in the heart.

original: padmo bsgoms nas snying ga ru //
analyzed: padmo bsgoms nas snying ga ru //
translated: Having visualized the lotus in the heart,

original: zhes bya ba 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs snying gar bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs snying gar bsgoms pas so //
translated: one should visualize the form of Lokeśvara in the heart.

original: padmo dpal yang dbang 'gyur na //
analyzed: padmo dpal yang dbang 'gyur na //
translated: If one has the glory of the lotus under one's control,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dpal sngags pas snying gar bkug la dbang du byas pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dpal sngags pas snying gar bkug la dbang du byas pas so //
translated: one should draw in the glory of Lokeśvara into one's heart and control it.

original: bud med phal ba smos ci dgos //
analyzed: bud med phal ba smos ci dgos //
translated: What need is there to mention ordinary women?

original: zhes bya ba la bud med ni padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la bud med ni padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
translated: Here, a woman is a collection of seals of the lotus family.

original: phal pa ni mchog ma yin pa ste tha mal pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phal pa ni mchog ma yin pa ste tha mal pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Ordinary means not supreme, that is, ordinary.

original: de yang gang gis 'jig rten dbang phyugs dang du byed pa des ni phyag rgya gzhan pa rnams 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to /🔽dpral bar sangs rgyas sku gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: de yang gang gis 'jig rten dbang phyugs dang du byed pa des ni phyag rgya gzhan pa rnams 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to / dpral bar sangs rgyas sku gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: Moreover, the meaning is that by whomsoever the Lord of the World is made into the seal, for him the other seals are accomplished without effort.🔽The forehead, etc. is taught as follows:

original: bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su bskyed la dpral bar 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku bsgom pa /
analyzed: bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su bskyed la dpral bar 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku bsgom pa /
translated: The Buddha's form on the forehead, etc. means that one should generate oneself in the form of Avalokiteśvara, and meditate on the form of Amitābha on the forehead.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba rgyun mi 'chad par bsgoms pa de snyi myur zhing mgyogs pa nyid du //🔽dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba rgyun mi 'chad par bsgoms pa de snyi myur zhing mgyogs pa nyid du // dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: Always means meditating without interruption. That is the swiftness, the speed.

original: zhes bya ba ste sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dbang gis nge la dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dbang gis nge la dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The consecration is obtained means that one will be consecrated by the Buddha's hand. The meaning is that one will be consecrated by the Buddha's hand.

original: kha'i nang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su bskyed la kha rab bcug ste bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: kha'i nang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su bskyed la kha rab bcug ste bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In the mouth, etc. means that one should generate oneself in the form of Avalokiteśvara, and meditate by placing it in the mouth.

original: gnas gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gnas gang du zhe na /
translated: Where is the place?

original: lce'i steng du zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: lce'i steng du zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: He says, “on the tongue.”

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na //
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na //
translated: What is the result?

original: sgra dpang lha mo bdag @35a * //
analyzed: sgra dpang lha mo bdag @35a * //
translated: The goddess of speech herself

original: nyid ni // rtag tu kha na gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: nyid ni // rtag tu kha na gnas par 'gyur //
translated: will always dwell in the mouth.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //🔽'di skad sten te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so // 'di skad sten te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: gang dbyangs can sgrub par 'dod na de'i sbyor ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: gang dbyangs can sgrub par 'dod na de'i sbyor ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is the procedure for one who wishes to practice Sarasvatī:

original: gtsug tor dbus su padmo ni //
analyzed: gtsug tor dbus su padmo ni //
translated: In the middle of the uṣṇīṣa, a lotus,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gtsug tor gyi dbus su yid kyis padmo bsam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gtsug tor gyi dbus su yid kyis padmo bsam pa'o //
translated: and so on. In the middle of the uṣṇīṣa, one should imagine a lotus with the mind.

original: snyoms par zhugs te zhes bya ba ni gcig pa'i yid kyis bdag nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bzhi pa'i gzugs su bskyed la /
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs te zhes bya ba ni gcig pa'i yid kyis bdag nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bzhi pa'i gzugs su bskyed la /
translated: “Having entered into union” means that with a single mind one should generate oneself in the form of four-faced Avalokiteśvara.

original: sngar bsam pa'i padmo gang yin pa de yid gtsug tor gyi dbus su rgyun du bsgom zhing padma 'dzin pa la bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: sngar bsam pa'i padmo gang yin pa de yid gtsug tor gyi dbus su rgyun du bsgom zhing padma 'dzin pa la bstan par bya'o //
translated: The lotus that was previously imagined should be continuously cultivated in the middle of the uṣṇīṣa with the mind and shown to the lotus-holder.

original: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the result of doing this?

original: mkha' 'gro thams cad dbang du 'gyur //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro thams cad dbang du 'gyur //
translated: All the ḍākinīs will be brought under control.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the mantra.

original: lha la sogs pa nam mkha' la rgyu ba gang yang rung ba de thams cad ltung bar byed pa'o /
analyzed: lha la sogs pa nam mkha' la rgyu ba gang yang rung ba de thams cad ltung bar byed pa'o /
translated: Whatever gods and so forth move in the sky, all of them fall down.

original: rtsig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: rtsig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: The wall, etc., is taught as follows.

original: gang yang rung ba padma bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba padma bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Whatever is suitable, one should meditate on the lotus.

original: padmo dam pa zhes bya ba ni gsal ba ste /
analyzed: padmo dam pa zhes bya ba ni gsal ba ste /
translated: The excellent lotus is the clear.

original: padmo de gang gi snying gar bsams pa de de'i dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: padmo de gang gi snying gar bsams pa de de'i dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: One should imagine that lotus in the heart of whomever, and he will be under one's control.

original: de bas sna 'dis sems cang thams cad kyang dbang du byed pa dam pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas sna 'dis sems cang thams cad kyang dbang du byed pa dam pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, this nose is the excellent control of all sentient beings.

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni padmo bsgom pas so //🔽dbang du byed pa dam pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni padmo bsgom pas so // dbang du byed pa dam pa'o //
translated: This is the excellent control means that by meditating on the lotus,

original: zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dngos po la ltos pa me dpar yid kyi bya ba la rag las pa'i phyir na dam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dngos po la ltos pa me dpar yid kyi bya ba la rag las pa'i phyir na dam pa'o //
translated: the excellent control means that since it is independent of external things, it is excellent because it depends on mental activity.

original: mkha'am yang na phyogs gzhan du //
analyzed: mkha'am yang na phyogs gzhan du //
translated: In the sky or in another direction,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang yang rung bar padmo bsgom pa la gom spar byas la mthong ba'i tshe de blangs na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang yang rung bar padmo bsgom pa la gom spar byas la mthong ba'i tshe de blangs na /
translated: In this and other such passages, having practiced the meditation on the lotus, when one sees it, one takes it up.

original: ci dga' bar ba ni mi snang 'gyur //
analyzed: ci dga' bar ba ni mi snang 'gyur //
translated: Then, as one wishes, one becomes invisible.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the procedure.

original: nyin mo'am mtshan mo rnams su'o //
analyzed: nyin mo'am mtshan mo rnams su'o //
translated: One should practice this at night or during the day.

original: 'dir yang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor goms par byas la ji srid mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de de srid kyi bar du goms par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor goms par byas la ji srid mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de de srid kyi bar du goms par bya'o //
translated: Here, too, one should practice the yoga of one’s deity until one obtains the signs.

original: de nas sgrub pa la zhugs te grub par gyur pa dang / nam sbyor ba'i tshe rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du byas na nyin thog thag gam /🔽nyi ma phyed dam /
analyzed: de nas sgrub pa la zhugs te grub par gyur pa dang / nam sbyor ba'i tshe rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du byas na nyin thog thag gam / nyi ma phyed dam /
translated: Then, having entered into the practice and become accomplished, when one engages in union, one should perform the yoga of one’s deity.🔽Then, at the time of the completion of the rite,

original: gang du rdzogs pa'i dus na mi snang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed de /
analyzed: gang du rdzogs pa'i dus na mi snang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed de /
translated: one should generate the thought, “May I become invisible.”

original: snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la bsgom pa mngon sum du bya'o//
analyzed: snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la bsgom pa mngon sum du bya'o//
translated: One should recite the essence mantra eight thousand times and actualize the meditation.

original: de nas de grub pa dang / padma de mngon sum du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas de grub pa dang / padma de mngon sum du 'gyur te /
translated: Then, when that is accomplished, that lotus becomes manifest.

original: de blangs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de blangs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One should take it up and become invisible.

original: nam rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor btang zhing phyag rgya bkrol ba de'i tshe gdod snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor btang zhing phyag rgya bkrol ba de'i tshe gdod snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When one has given up the yoga of one's deity and released the seal, then it will appear.

original: dngos grub 'di ni rin po che'i @35b rigs kyi sgo nas gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos grub 'di ni rin po che'i @35b rigs kyi sgo nas gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This power is taught from the perspective of the jewel family.

original: rtsig pa'am yang na phyogs gzhan du //
analyzed: rtsig pa'am yang na phyogs gzhan du //
translated: On a wall or in another place,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gzhi can nam gzhi med par padmo rgya gram kha bzhi pa bris nas ni zhes bya ba ni yid kyis sgoms shig ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gzhi can nam gzhi med par padmo rgya gram kha bzhi pa bris nas ni zhes bya ba ni yid kyis sgoms shig ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: one should draw a four-petaled lotus means one should visualize it mentally.

original: bsgom pa mthar phyin pa dang / gang gi mthong ba de'i tshe sgrub pa la zhugs na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgom pa mthar phyin pa dang / gang gi mthong ba de'i tshe sgrub pa la zhugs na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: When one has perfected the visualization and sees it, then if one engages in the practice, one will succeed.

original: de yang sbyor ba'i dus su rang gi lha'i rnal byor du byas nas snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te gang gi gzugs su ston par 'dod na de'i bdag nyid du mngon sum de bya zhing sna tshogs padma'i ting nge 'dzin kyang mngon sum du byas la nam
analyzed: de yang sbyor ba'i dus su rang gi lha'i rnal byor du byas nas snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te gang gi gzugs su ston par 'dod na de'i bdag nyid du mngon sum de bya zhing sna tshogs padma'i ting nge 'dzin kyang mngon sum du byas la nam
translated: Moreover, at the time of practice, having performed the yoga of one's deity, one should recite the essence mantra eight thousand times. If one wishes to display the form of someone, one should manifest as that person, and also manifest the samadhi of the variegated lotus.

original: sna tshogs padma mthong ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: sna tshogs padma mthong ba de'i tshe /
translated: When one sees a variegated lotus,

original: de blangs ba tsam gyis ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de blangs ba tsam gyis ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: by merely taking it, one can assume any form one desires.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di ni las kyi rigs kyi sgo nas gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di ni las kyi rigs kyi sgo nas gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This meditative absorption is taught from the perspective of the karma family.

original: nam mkha'am yang na phyogs gzhan du //
analyzed: nam mkha'am yang na phyogs gzhan du //
translated: “In the sky or in another direction,🔽” and so forth.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di yang gzhi yod pa'am gzhi med pa la rdo rje padmo bsgom pa goms par byas la ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di yang gzhi yod pa'am gzhi med pa la rdo rje padmo bsgom pa goms par byas la ;
translated: Here, too, one should cultivate the vajra lotus, either with a basis or without a basis.

original: gang gi tshe padmo de dbang po'i spyod yul du snang bar gyur pa de'i tshi /
analyzed: gang gi tshe padmo de dbang po'i spyod yul du snang bar gyur pa de'i tshi /
translated: When that lotus appears within the range of the senses,

original: sgrub pa la zhugs te mtshan thog thag tu bzla ba bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa la zhugs te mtshan thog thag tu bzla ba bya'o //
translated: one should commence the practice and recite the mantra throughout the night.

original: de nas nam padmo mthong bar gyur pa de de'i tshe de blangs la /
analyzed: de nas nam padmo mthong bar gyur pa de de'i tshe de blangs la /
translated: Then, when one sees the lotus, one should take it.

original: de nas skad cig ma de kho na nyid kyi tshe padmo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas skad cig ma de kho na nyid kyi tshe padmo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te /
translated: At that very moment, one becomes a lotus awareness holder.

original: 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi dngos grub yin no ;
analyzed: 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi dngos grub yin no ;
translated: This is the spiritual power of the dharma family.

original: / dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du //
analyzed: / dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du //
translated: “In all maṇḍalas and so forth,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la skyil 'khor ram tsig pa'am /🔽ras ris sam /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la skyil 'khor ram tsig pa'am / ras ris sam /
translated: In this way, one should draw the maṇḍala, etc.

original: gzhan gang yang rung bsar sngags pa gang gis dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bcing ba dang / dbab pa la sogs pa'i las khyad par du byed par 'dod na /
analyzed: gzhan gang yang rung bsar sngags pa gang gis dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bcing ba dang / dbab pa la sogs pa'i las khyad par du byed par 'dod na /
translated: In the maṇḍala, etc., means in the maṇḍala, or in the ciṭi, or in the painting, or in any other suitable place, the mantra practitioner who wishes to perform the special activities of summoning, enthralling, binding, bringing down, etc.,

original: des dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bri bar bya ste 'jig rten dan phyug bris na de'i mdun du rta mgrin du rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya chen po las 'di dag byas nas gdod des dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bri bar bya ste 'jig rten dan phyug bris na de'i mdun du rta mgrin du rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya chen po las 'di dag byas nas gdod des dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
translated: should draw the maṇḍala, etc. If one draws the worldly wealth, in front of that, having made these from the great mudrā of Hayagrīva, that will be the spiritual power.

original: dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du //
translated: In all maṇḍalas, etc.,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya chen pos dbang du bya bar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya chen pos dbang du bya bar rig par bya ste /
translated: means one should know that the great mudrā of Amogha-pāśa is for enthralling.

original: bcing ba dang / sgrub pa'i rdzas dang / zhing srung dang / ga ter dang / bcud kyis len dang / srin po dang / sha za la sogs pa dang / lha'i sman la sogs pa bsrung bar rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: bcing ba dang / sgrub pa'i rdzas dang / zhing srung dang / ga ter dang / bcud kyis len dang / srin po dang / sha za la sogs pa dang / lha'i sman la sogs pa bsrung bar rigs par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the protection is for the substances of the fetters, the substances of the accomplishments, the protection of the field, the treasure, the elixir, the rākṣasas, the piśācas, and so on, and the divine medicines, and so on.🔽The rest is easy to understand.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o// padmo zhal bzhi @36a * //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o// padmo zhal bzhi @36a * //
translated: The four-faced lotus hero

original: sems dpa' yang //
analyzed: sems dpa' yang //
translated: is the lord of the world.

original: zhes bya ba ni padmo 'dra ba'i zhal mnga' bas na padmo'i zhal te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padmo 'dra ba'i zhal mnga' bas na padmo'i zhal te /
translated: He who has a face like a lotus is the four-faced lotus hero.

original: padma'i zhal bzhi'i sems dpa' ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
analyzed: padma'i zhal bzhi'i sems dpa' ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
translated: The lord of the world is the four-faced lotus hero.

original: bsgoms te zhes bya ba ni goms par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgoms te zhes bya ba ni goms par bya ba'o //
translated: Meditating means cultivating.

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi las ston pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi las ston pa yin no //
translated: One's own means teaching one's own action.

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: One's own means this is taught.

original: gzhan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not blessed by another.

original: 'o na ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhig ce na /
translated: Then what?

original: bdag nyid nyid kyis so //
analyzed: bdag nyid nyid kyis so //
translated: One's own self.

original: de nas ting nge 'dzin grub na //
analyzed: de nas ting nge 'dzin grub na //
translated: Then, when samādhi is accomplished,

original: zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas yongs su rdzogs na skad cig gis ni gzugs mang por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas yongs su rdzogs na skad cig gis ni gzugs mang por 'gyur ro //
translated: When the meditative concentration is complete, then in an instant there is the transformation into many forms.

original: 'di ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i sgo nas grub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i sgo nas grub pa yin no //
translated: This is the accomplishment by way of the inevitable.

original: padmo'i padma ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug ste /
analyzed: padmo'i padma ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug ste /
translated: The lotus of the lotus is the Lord of the World.

original: bdag nyid dang bsgoms na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: bdag nyid dang bsgoms na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The self and the meditation, etc. have been explained.

original: padmo'i padmo ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na /
analyzed: padmo'i padmo ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na /
translated: How should one meditate on the lotus of the lotus?

original: de'i phyir rdo rje chos kyi ting nge 'dzin gnas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje chos kyi ting nge 'dzin gnas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, the verse, “Abiding in the samadhi of Vajradharma,” etc.

original: ji ltar padma dmar po 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa padmo la lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar padma dmar po 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa padmo la lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o //
translated: “Just as this red lotus,” etc. is abiding in the samadhi of the view of the lotus.

original: ji ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas na zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'thob ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas na zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'thob ces bya ba ste /
translated: How does one attain the state of inexhaustibility by abiding in the samadhi of the Lord of the World?

original: las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhig yin na /
analyzed: las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhig yin na /
translated: If one is a beginner yogin,

original: zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: the “inexhaustibility” is the ultimate bodhicitta.

original: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one will attain the first ground, The Utterly Joyful One.

original: 'on te rnal 'byor pas bdun pa'i bar la zhugs pa zhig yin na des ting nge 'dzin 'dis bsgoms pas zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: 'on te rnal 'byor pas bdun pa'i bar la zhugs pa zhig yin na des ting nge 'dzin 'dis bsgoms pas zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'thob pa ste /
translated: If, on the other hand, the practitioner has entered up to the seventh ground, by cultivating this samādhi, he will attain the state of inexhaustibility.

original: sa brgyad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sa brgyad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The meaning is that he will attain the eighth ground.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa yongs su dag cing mngon par 'du byed pa med pas sa dgu pa la zhugs pas ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgoms na zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'thob pa zhes bya ba kun du bzang po'i sa 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa yongs su dag cing mngon par 'du byed pa med pas sa dgu pa la zhugs pas ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgoms na zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'thob pa zhes bya ba kun du bzang po'i sa 'thob pa ste /
translated: If the practitioner who has entered the ninth ground cultivates this samādhi with completely pure nonconceptuality and without manifest effort, he will attain the state of inexhaustibility.

original: byang chub kyi sems rnam pa thams cad du dag pa mi zad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rnam pa thams cad du dag pa mi zad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning is that he will attain the ground of Universal Radiance, because the bodhicitta that is completely pure in every way is inexhaustible.

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for “Avalokiteśvara,” and so on,

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi gzugs te snang ba mtha' yas su bdag nyid bsgoms na de dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi gzugs te snang ba mtha' yas su bdag nyid bsgoms na de dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should meditate on oneself as Avalokiteśvara with a Buddha image in the middle of the hair, that is, as Amitābha, and one will become like him.

original: 'di ni rin po che'i rigs kyi sgo nas grub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rin po che'i rigs kyi sgo nas grub pa yin no //
translated: This is the accomplishment by way of the Jewel Family.

original: sna tshogs gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug sna tshogs pa'i @36b gzugs can mi bskyod pa'i gnas na gnas pa ste /
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug sna tshogs pa'i @36b gzugs can mi bskyod pa'i gnas na gnas pa ste /
translated: With respect to various forms, etc., the Lord Avalokiteśvara has various forms, and he abides in the abode of Akṣobhya.

original: de'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bdag nyid bsgoms na sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bdag nyid bsgoms na sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If one meditates on oneself as abiding in his samādhi, it is called the samādhi of various forms.

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha'i khyad par rnams 'byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'di dang mnyam par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha'i khyad par rnams 'byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'di dang mnyam par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By means of the samādhi that produces the special mundane and supramundane gods, one will become like him, meaning that one will become like Avalokiteśvara.

original: de ltar dngos grub rnams rigs kyi go rims kyis bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar dngos grub rnams rigs kyi go rims kyis bshad nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the accomplishments in the order of the families,

original: da ni phyag rgya'i ye shes bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: da ni phyag rgya'i ye shes bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Now, in order to teach the gnosis of the seal, [the Bhagavān] declares thereupon, etc.

original: phyag rgya de dag thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa ni phyag rgya chen po yin te /
analyzed: phyag rgya de dag thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa ni phyag rgya chen po yin te /
translated: The great seal is the basis of all those seals.

original: de bas na de dang por ston to //
analyzed: de bas na de dang por ston to //
translated: Therefore, it is taught first.

original: de la dang po ni thams cad kyi mtshan nyid spyir mthun pas sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa 'gres gcig gis thun mong du ston pa ni /
analyzed: de la dang po ni thams cad kyi mtshan nyid spyir mthun pas sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa 'gres gcig gis thun mong du ston pa ni /
translated: Therein, the first is the common characteristic of all, and the meditation on the great seal of all the great beings is taught in common by one recitation.

original: ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni //
translated: In the manner of a painting,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: etc.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni byang chub kyi sems te de'i dbus na gnas pas na /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni byang chub kyi sems te de'i dbus na gnas pas na /
translated: The moon disk is the thought of enlightenment. Since it abides in the middle of that,🔽it is said,

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing //
translated: abiding in the middle of the moon disk.

original: zhes bya'o // sems dpa' rnams bri ba'i phyir rgyud 'di'am rgyud gzhan du gzugs ji lta bu bstan pa de'i rjes su mthun par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // sems dpa' rnams bri ba'i phyir rgyud 'di'am rgyud gzhan du gzugs ji lta bu bstan pa de'i rjes su mthun par bya'o //
translated: In order to paint the beings, one should conform to the form taught in this Tantra or in another Tantra.

original: padmo la gnas zhes bya ba padmo'i gdan no //
analyzed: padmo la gnas zhes bya ba padmo'i gdan no //
translated: The lotus seat is the lotus on which [the deity] stands.

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni bdag rang nyid bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni bdag rang nyid bsgom pa'o //
translated: The self is the self-visualization.

original: 'di'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de ni 'di'i las yin par bshad pas na /
analyzed: 'di'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de ni 'di'i las yin par bshad pas na /
translated: Since the result of this is explained as the function of this,

original: da ni de bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: da ni de bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: now in order to teach that, [the Bhagavān] declares the buddha-empowerment, and so on.

original: padmo'i rigs su sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: padmo'i rigs su sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If one meditates on the great seal of the Buddha in the lotus family, one will become equal to Amitāyus, Infinite Life.

original: tshe dpag tu med pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
analyzed: tshe dpag tu med pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
translated: One will become equal to Amitāyus, Infinite Life.

original: rdo rje padmo ni rdo rje chos ma'i gnas su de bcings shing bsgoms na 'jig rten dbang phyug dang mnyam par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje padmo ni rdo rje chos ma'i gnas su de bcings shing bsgoms na 'jig rten dbang phyug dang mnyam par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: If one binds and meditates on the vajra lotus in the abode of Vajradharma, one will become equal to Lokeśvara, Lord of the World.

original: sangs rgyas dbang gis bcings nas ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dbang gis bcings nas ni //
translated: Having bound with the buddha empowerment,

original: zhes bya ba ni rin chen rdo rje ma'i gnas su sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba nyid de //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rin chen rdo rje ma'i gnas su sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba nyid de //
translated: in the abode of Ratnavajrī is the empowerment of the Buddha.

original: de bcings shid bsgoms na sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bcings shid bsgoms na sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one meditates on it bound, one will receive empowerment from the Buddhas.

original: padmos padmo ni rdo rje chos ma'i gnas su ting nge 'dzin sbyin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: padmos padmo ni rdo rje chos ma'i gnas su ting nge 'dzin sbyin par byed pa'o //
translated: Lotus-lotus is in the place of Vajradharma, and it bestows meditative concentration.

original: sna tshogs mchog ni gzugs sna tshogs sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs mchog ni gzugs sna tshogs sbyin pa'o //
translated: The supreme variety is the bestowal of various forms.

original: sna tshogs gzugs ni gzugs thams cad ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs ni gzugs thams cad ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
translated: The variety of forms is by means of the meditative concentration that displays all forms.

original: 'dul ba'o zhes bya ba ni skye bo thams cad slob mar bya'o //🔽sangs rgyas rin chen @37a * //
analyzed: 'dul ba'o zhes bya ba ni skye bo thams cad slob mar bya'o // sangs rgyas rin chen @37a * //
translated: Subduing is that all beings should be made into disciples.

original: ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su'o //
analyzed: ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su'o //
translated: The Buddha-jewel is in the place of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: dbang bskur ster zhes bya ba ni rgyal por dbang bskur ba la sogs pa sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ster zhes bya ba ni rgyal por dbang bskur ba la sogs pa sbyin pa'o //
translated: Bestowing empowerment is the bestowal of a royal empowerment, and so forth.

original: padmo sems dpa' ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su ste de bcings na 'dod dgu'i ting nge 'dzin sbyin par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: padmo sems dpa' ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su ste de bcings na 'dod dgu'i ting nge 'dzin sbyin par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The lotus hero is in the place of Amitābha, and if one binds it, it will bestow the meditative concentration of the desired mind.

original: padmo khro bo dbang byung dpal ni //
analyzed: padmo khro bo dbang byung dpal ni //
translated: The glorious wrathful lotus lord is in the place of Amoghasiddhi.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug ste //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug ste //
translated: The Blessed One is Lokeśvara.

original: de'i dpal gang yin pa de yang sbyin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dpal gang yin pa de yang sbyin par byed pa'o //
translated: The glory of that is also given.
